NK085(ru)002:1: // kahthoga pa chos rje gtsang ston rin po che'i gsungs /
NK085(ru)002:2: dam tshig gsal bkra'i 'grel rnal 'byor mig gi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK085(ru)002:3: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK085(ru)002:4: rig bdag mnyam nyid rang byung rin po che //
NK085(ru)002:5: cir yang snang ba gdul bya'i grangs bzhin te //
NK085(ru)002:6: yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bzang po'i ngang //
NK085(ru)002:7: mkha' bzhin 'da' ba med la gus par 'dud //
NK085(ru)002:8: lam da nga 'bras bu'i bdag nyid rdo rje che //
NK085(ru)002:9: mchog gi spyod yul mthar thug theg pa yi //
NK085(ru)002:10: gzhi nyid dam pa'i don gyis gsal ba las //
NK085(ru)002:11: don gyi nus chung tshig gi brjed byang bri //
NK085(ru)002:12: spyir shes bya thams cad bsdu na gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:15: dang po la yang gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:16: kun nas nyon mongs pa rten 'brel rgyu 'bras dang //
NK085(ru)002:17: rnam par byang ba rten 'brel rgyu 'bras so //
NK085(ru)002:20: srid rtse'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros //
NK085(ru)002:21: rgyu drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang //
NK085(ru)002:22: gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa //
NK085(ru)002:23: log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med //
NK085(ru)002:25: rnam par byang ba la yang gnyis te //
NK085(ru)002:29: bskal pa grangs med par tshogs bsags pa'i skyes bus gron tshags med par lam nyams su blang ste /
NK085(ru)002:30: lam gyi rtsol ba zad nas /
NK085(ru)002:31: gzhi ci bzhin par son pa nyid 'bras bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:32: de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs //
NK085(ru)002:35: thams cad mkhyen pa gnyis su med pa'i thugs rjes
NK085(ru)002:36: gdul bya 'gro drug la chos kyi sgo mo dpag
NK085(ru)002:39: nyon mongs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por /
NK085(ru)002:40: chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:44: theg pa cig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK085(ru)002:46: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:47: de dag ni lam pa rnams kyis nyams su blangs
NK085(ru)002:48: nas 'bras bu la sbyor bar byed pas na lam
NK085(ru)002:49: mo // brjod byed tshig ni gsang ba'i snying po las /
NK085(ru)002:50: ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs //
NK085(ru)002:51: phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs //
NK085(ru)002:52: 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang //
NK085(ru)002:53: rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni //
NK085(ru)002:54: yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs las //
NK085(ru)002:55: brten pa'i tshig gi rab mtshon te //
NK085(ru)002:57: dngos sam brgyud nas phan pa ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:58: ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs mu rtogs kyi tshogs so //
NK085(ru)002:59: dngos sam brgyud nas phan par byed pa ste theg pa dagu'o //
NK085(ru)002:60: de yang rgyu yi theg pa'i sde snod rin po che gsum /
NK085(ru)002:61: snod dag par byas par lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:62: phyi pa rnams gsum bcud blugs pa lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:63: nang pa rnams gsum ro myong ba lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:64: gsang sngags sde snod gsum du bsdu ba ni rgyal po 'bangs su bsdu ba lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:65: zhes bdag gi bla ma dam pa' gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:66: skabs su ma bab cing yi ges 'jigs pas zhib par mi spro'o //
NK085(ru)002:67: 'dir brjod bya'i ngo bo rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la /
NK085(ru)002:68: 'bras bu'i theg pa'o de yang phyi nang gnyis las nang pa la gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:73: rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang //
NK085(ru)002:74: 'bangs dang rje dang rgyal po'i tshul //
NK085(ru)002:76: gsum po re re'i nang na yang gsum ka tshang bar ston pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:77: 'dir yang rtsa ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa'i dam tshig nyid /
NK085(ru)002:78: a ti yo ga'i dam tshig bzhi ston pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:79: shas che bar bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa gnyis ston
NK085(ru)002:80: te spyod pa srung ba la khyad med pa'iphyira ro
NK085(ru)002:81: // de ltar ston yang 'dir rgyud kyi khung shas
NK085(ru)002:82: che ba ma h+aa yo ga yin pa'i phyir ro
NK085(ru)002:83: // // de la yang bde bar gshegs pas zhal nas gsungs pa'i rgyud sde bco brgyad dang /
NK085(ru)002:84: de la brten te mdzad pa'i chos rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:86: mngon par rtogs pa'i man ngag dang //
NK085(ru)002:87: bslab cing nyams su blang ba'i man ngag go //
NK085(ru)002:89: rgyud kyi don mngon par rtogs pa'i thabs te /
NK085(ru)002:94: slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes //
NK085(ru)002:95: lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang //
NK085(ru)002:96: 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i las rims kyis //
NK085(ru)002:97: gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba bya //
NK085(ru)002:99: bdun las 'di ni mi 'da' ba dam tshig gi man ngag go //
NK085(ru)002:100: de nas gang zag 'jug ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi ngos bzung ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:101: de la bshad pa'i thabs bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:102: bka' dang bstan bcos gnyis las /
NK085(ru)002:103: 'dir bstan chos yin pas rtsis 'go klad nas gzhom zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:105: rtsis mgo lngas bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:106: lnga bo de dkyus nas snyad dus 'byin ngos bzung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:107: spyi'i dbu zhabs kyi rjod bya mdor bsdus ste blo
NK085(ru)002:108: la blang na tshig gang gis don gang ston pa'o
NK085(ru)002:110: khung btsun cing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir slob
NK085(ru)002:111: dpon gang gis mdzad na sgeg pa'i rdo rjes so
NK085(ru)002:112: // de la'ang rgya gar dang bal po gnyis yod pa las 'di rgya gar ro //
NK085(ru)002:113: de la yang snga phyi gsum yod pa las 'di dang po'o //
NK085(ru)002:114: de la spyir bstan chos rtsom pa la rab chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong ba /
NK085(ru)002:115: 'bring yi dam lha yi zhal mthong ba /
NK085(ru)002:116: tha ma rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa cig gis mdzad pa yin pa la /
NK085(ru)002:117: slob dpon 'di ni gsum ka 'dzom pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:118: chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong zhing /
NK085(ru)002:119: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong ste /
NK085(ru)002:120: rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa'i slob dpon des
NK085(ru)002:121: mdzad de spar khab mkhan po dang mthun no gsungs
NK085(ru)002:122: / bstan pa la mtshan nges shing dpe don gyi mdo rtsam zhig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)002:123: mtshan ci las btags nas 'dog lugs lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:125: rnam grangs las btags pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:126: gang zag las btags pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:131: don gyi gtso bo las btags pa /
NK085(ru)002:132: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhus lan dang /
NK085(ru)002:134: don gyi rnam grangs las btags pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:137: don mdor bsdus pa las btags pa skol mdo lta bu la /
NK085(ru)002:138: 'dir ni don rang gi ngo bo las btags pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:139: dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:140: dam tshig chen po mdor bshad bya //
NK085(ru)002:142: de yang dam pa ni chos nyid la bya ste
NK085(ru)002:143: des thams cad la khyab cing mi 'da' bas na
NK085(ru)002:144: dam pa'o // de rtogs na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
NK085(ru)002:145: 'jig la ma rtogs pa na rnam byang gi bde
NK085(ru)002:146: dam pa'o // ba tshig pa'o // de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur bas na rdo rje'o //
NK085(ru)002:147: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngos nas skal ldan gyi rig pa la gsal zhing bkra ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:148: yang na rdo rje slob dpon gyi spyan sngar dbang
NK085(ru)002:149: gi dus su bcas pa'i rtsa ba dang yan lag
NK085(ru)002:150: gi rnam grangs rnams te bsrungs ma srungs kyis 'khor
NK085(ru)002:152: rdo rje ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu
NK085(ru)002:153: rnam gsum da lta nyid nas rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud
NK085(ru)002:154: la gsal zhing bkra bar byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:155: yang na rdo rje ni dpe ltar gzhom du med cing 'da' bar dka' ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:156: 'di nas 'byung ba'i dam tshig rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:158: rtsa ba so sor ma 'dres shing gsal ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:159: yan lag so sor ma 'dres shing bkra ba'am /
NK085(ru)002:160: yang na rtsa ba'i rtsa ba ma 'dres pas gsal ba dang de nyid kyi yan lag bkra ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:161: yan lag gi rtsa ba rnams gsal zhing nying lag rnams ma 'dres par bkra ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:162: yang na rtsa ba dang yan lag rnams rgyud nas
NK085(ru)002:163: 'thor te mi gsal ba rnams 'dir yod tshad kun
NK085(ru)002:164: phyogs gcig tu bkod pas gsal la ma 'dres pas
NK085(ru)002:167: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che zhes pas rdo
NK085(ru)002:168: rje lta bu gsum 'am lnga mngon du gyur pa'i
NK085(ru)002:169: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni dus gsum gyi sangs
NK085(ru)002:170: rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yin la /
NK085(ru)002:171: de'i thugs mkhyen pa'i ye shes de nyid gdul bya
NK085(ru)002:172: blo rab 'bring la rim pa bzhin dam tshig gi
NK085(ru)002:174: des na dbyer med pas rdo rje zhes smos so //
NK085(ru)002:175: dam tshig de dag bsrungs pa la bzod gcig rdo rje 'chang du snang zhes bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:176: drang ba'i don te blo dman gyi ngor nges so //
NK085(ru)002:177: bka' dang mi 'gal zhing theg pa'i gzhung tshugs par
NK085(ru)002:178: bya ba'i phyir na rgyud gang nas btus shing phyogs
NK085(ru)002:179: gar gtogs na gsang ba'i snying po la sogs pa
NK085(ru)002:180: rgyud gsum nas btugs shing phyogs ma h+aa gar gtogs
NK085(ru)002:181: te / de lang rgyud gsum nges par gsal byed pa //
NK085(ru)002:183: sgyu 'phrul rnam bkod ces pa la sogs pas rgyud
NK085(ru)002:184: kyi khungs bstan phyogs kyang rgyud gsum dang 'di nyid
NK085(ru)002:185: kyi gzhung gis brjod bya'i don thams cad ma h+aa
NK085(ru)002:186: yo ga kho na yin pa'i de nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:187: brtsam pa la don yod par bya ba'i phyir gang
NK085(ru)002:188: zag gi don du mdzad na phyi rabs kyi gang
NK085(ru)002:189: zag lam pa rnams kyi don du mdzad de lam
NK085(ru)002:190: gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:191: lam gyi rgyud la zhugs pa rnams kyis zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:192: lta spyod ting 'dzin 'brel dgos pas zhes pa la sogs pas so //
NK085(ru)002:193: shes shing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:194: dbu nas zhabs kyi bar du don dus bstan na gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:195: klad kyi don la sogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:196: de ltar de dag gis ni rtsis 'go lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:197: de dkyus nas snyad dus 'byon ngos bzung ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:199: brjod bya'i don bsdus te blo la blang na dkyus nas /
NK085(ru)002:200: ngo bo rnam grangs bsrungs thabs dang //
NK085(ru)002:201: zhes pa la sogs pa la brjod bya'i don bcu po de nyid /
NK085(ru)002:202: gzhung brjod byed 'di nyid kyis ston pa la skyon bskur bral bar ston pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:203: don de gsum gyis bshad pa'i thabs bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:204: de yi gong mas dam pa'i chos ngos gzung la
NK085(ru)002:205: de gnyis sdom pas dgos pa'i don gyi khog dbub
NK085(ru)002:209: tshig gi 'bru non pa gnyis thun mong du 'khrol du ston te /
NK085(ru)002:210: don gsum gyis sa gcod pa sa gcod kyi gzhung dang mthun te /
NK085(ru)002:214: klad la gnyis kyi dang po phyag 'tshal ba'i gnas tshig don du bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:215: rdo rje 'dzin la zhes pa ste phyag 'tshal ba'i
NK085(ru)002:216: yul rdo rje sems dpa' ni gsang sngags ma h+aa
NK085(ru)002:217: yo ga'i ston pa yang yin /
NK085(ru)002:218: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang yin /
NK085(ru)002:219: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi gzugs kyang yin te /
NK085(ru)002:220: don la 'khor 'das dbyer med kun tu bzang po'o //
NK085(ru)002:221: rdo rje ni mtshon pa dpe dang mtshon bya don gnyis las /
NK085(ru)002:222: mtshon pa la yang gnyis kyi dang po rnam grangs mtshon pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:223: chos thams cad rang byung ye shes gcig gi brdar rdo rje rtse gcig par bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:224: de bzhin du rang byung ye shes sku gsung thugs
NK085(ru)002:225: gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags su rdo rje rtse gsum
NK085(ru)002:226: pa dang / de nyid ye shes lnga'i rtags su rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:227: ye shes dgu'i rtags su rtse dgu bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:228: nus pa mtshon pa ni rdo rje'i pha lam te /
NK085(ru)002:229: de nyid kyis kyang gzhom du med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:230: rin po che gzhan thams cad kyi 'joms byed du gnas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:231: rang gi ngo bo mi phyed pa gsum gyis mtshon pas /
NK085(ru)002:232: don gyi rdo rje chos kyi dbyings dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing nam mkha' lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:233: dngos po gang gis kyang 'gyur du mi btub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:234: de nyid ma 'gags par gsal ba rig pa'i ye shes /
NK085(ru)002:235: chos thams cad kyi dbyings su 'jom pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:236: dbyings nyid mi 'gag par gsal ba ni rig pa'i ye shes so //
NK085(ru)002:237: ye shes dngos po thams cad dang bral ba ni chos kyi dbyings te /
NK085(ru)002:238: nam mkha' dang stong gsal mi phyed pa lta bu ni mi phyed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:239: don de ni chos kyi sku spros pa thams cad dang bral gazhi'o don no //
NK085(ru)002:240: rdo rje lta bu lnga ni /
NK085(ru)002:241: rdo rje sems dpa' ni don dam pa'i chos nyid spros pa dang bral ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:242: ngo bo ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:243: rang bzhin ni dbyer mi phyed de nam mkha' bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:244: de yi mtshan nyid ni skye 'jig med pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:245: yon tan ni rtsal mi dgos par snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:246: 'phrin las ni bdag gzhan gnyis 'dzin thams cad 'joms pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:247: 'dzin zhes pa ni mi gtong ba'am bde blag tu gyur pa te /
NK085(ru)002:248: gong ma'i don de nyid rang rig pa'i mngon gsum
NK085(ru)002:249: du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing sgrib g.yogs thams
NK085(ru)002:250: cad dang bral ba lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:251: don de nyid kyi zhar la dpa' ba'ang grub ste
NK085(ru)002:252: rig pa'i ye shes cir yang mi 'gags pas mya
NK085(ru)002:253: ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' las dpa' ba la /
NK085(ru)002:254: chos kyi dbyings gang du'ang ma grub pas 'khor ba'i mtha' la dpa' ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:255: gong ma lta bu'i rtags mi 'gag par snang ba
NK085(ru)002:256: gzugs kyi skur bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
NK085(ru)002:257: dpa' / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo /
NK085(ru)002:258: rgyud kyi ston pa ni phyag gi yul lo //
NK085(ru)002:259: don des na brjod bya dam tshig gi tshogs thams
NK085(ru)002:260: cad rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs dang dbyer
NK085(ru)002:261: med pas phyag 'tshal ba chos kyi kha byang du
NK085(ru)002:262: gsal te / dam tshig 'chad par mngon no //
NK085(ru)002:263: lan ces pa gzhi'i don ste phyag gi yul lo //
NK085(ru)002:264: nges tshig gi don bstan nas /
NK085(ru)002:265: ngo bo spyi don du bstan pa ni phyag 'tshal zhes pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:267: dang po gang gis 'tshal na slob dpon sgegs pa'i rdo rjes /
NK085(ru)002:268: rjes 'jug du rnal 'byor 'di yi sgor zhugs pa thams cad kyis so //
NK085(ru)002:269: gang la 'tshal na don rtags rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la'o //
NK085(ru)002:270: tshul ci ltar 'tshal na gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:271: mi phyed 'dres pa'i phyag ni rdo rje sems dpa'
NK085(ru)002:272: dang rnal 'byor pa rang bzhin ye nas dbyer med
NK085(ru)002:273: par rtogs nas de la der 'dzin yang ma dmigs
NK085(ru)002:274: pa ste lta ba'i gdeng gis chod pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:275: de yang zhi khro gal 'phreng las /
NK085(ru)002:276: chu la chu dang mar la mar /
NK085(ru)002:277: gnyis med rig pa dang 'dres phyag 'tshal ces so //
NK085(ru)002:278: gnyis pa bsgrub pa thabs kyi phyag ni /
NK085(ru)002:279: 'di na smos pa'i dam tshig rnams dran pa dang
NK085(ru)002:280: shes bzhin gyis mi nyams par bsrung tshul gnyis kyi
NK085(ru)002:281: sgo nas bsrung ba ni bsgrub pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK085(ru)002:282: de nas gang zhig bsgrub pa 'jal ba'i phyag ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:283: spyod pa ya rabs kyi phyag ni lus ngag yid
NK085(ru)002:284: gsum gus pa dang bcas pas 'og ma dang mthun
NK085(ru)002:286: ci yi phyir phyag 'tshal ba'i dgos pa ni gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:287: spyir btsal ba'i dgos pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:288: khyad par du btsal ba'i dgos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:290: dngos su slob dpon nyid kyi phyag dang de nyid yi ge'i dkyus su bkod pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:291: slob dpon nyid kyi phyag gi dgos pa la gnyis
NK085(ru)002:292: kyi dang po 'jig rten pa dang tshul mthun par
NK085(ru)002:293: mos pa can drangs pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:294: dper na 'jig rten na yang rabs dam pa dag
NK085(ru)002:295: 'jig rten gyi bya ba gang bsgrub pa'i sngon du
NK085(ru)002:296: / rang grub pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal na byas pa chud mi za ba bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:297: 'dir slob dpon nyid kyis bstan chos 'di mdzad pa'i sngon du /
NK085(ru)002:298: yi dam gyi lha la phyag 'tshal bas slob dpon nyid ya rabs dam par nges pas /
NK085(ru)002:299: gang zag gang zag gi rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'jug pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:300: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
NK085(ru)002:301: thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas slob dpon
NK085(ru)002:302: nyid mkhyen pa rgya che bar mngon pas /
NK085(ru)002:303: gang zag chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'jug pa'i dgos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:304: gnyis pa bar chad med cing thugs dgongs mthar phyin pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:305: phyag 'tshal bas tshogs rdzogs shing sgrib pa byang ste /
NK085(ru)002:306: bar chad zhi ba snang mun lta bu yin la /
NK085(ru)002:307: de la rtogs pa'i phyag gis shes bya'i sgrib pa byang zhing /
NK085(ru)002:309: sgrub pa'i phyag gi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa byang zhing /
NK085(ru)002:310: spyod pa ya rabs kyi phyag gis las sgrib byang zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs zhes 'chad na /
NK085(ru)002:311: 'dir slob dpon chen po lta bu skal pa ya rabs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:312: rdo rje sems dpa' dang dam tshig dbyer med nyid rang rig pa'i gdeng du chud nas /
NK085(ru)002:313: rim par bsags sbyangs med de nyi ma shar nas mun pa dag pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:314: skad cig ma gcig la tshogs rdzogs pa dang sgrib pa dag pa dus gcig go //
NK085(ru)002:315: don des bar chod rgyu nas dag ste ci brtsam pa thams cad mthar phyin la /
NK085(ru)002:316: khyad par du chos 'di nyid brtsam pa mthar phyin
NK085(ru)002:317: pas ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag 'di yi sgor zhugs
NK085(ru)002:318: pa rnams / mthar 'bras bu la sbyor ba ni
NK085(ru)002:319: slob dpon nyid kyi thugs dgongs mthar phyin pa'i dgos
NK085(ru)002:320: pa rnams / pa'o // yi ge'i dkyus su bkod pa'i dgos pa la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:321: slob dpon ya rabs kyi tshul can du shes par bya ba gong du bstan pa ltar go bas /
NK085(ru)002:322: des mos gus kyi dad pa bskyed pas 'bras bu la sbyor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:323: phyi rabs kyi nyan bshad mkhan rnams mos gus nyams
NK085(ru)002:324: su blangs pas sgra tshad lta bu ma yin ste
NK085(ru)002:325: / tshogs dgos pa nyid lam gyi ngo bor bstan pas bsgrub pa nyams su blang ba'i dgos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:326: des spyir phyag 'tshal ba la bstan nas /
NK085(ru)002:327: khyad par du rdo rje sems dpa' kho na la
NK085(ru)002:328: btsal ba'i dgos ched ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
NK085(ru)002:329: gtso bo yin pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal te /
NK085(ru)002:331: dkyil 'khor gtso bo skyes bu mchog /dam pa'i lha phyir phyag 'tshal nas zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:333: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid de rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo 'khor ces pas so //
NK085(ru)002:334: 'chad pa'i skyes bu yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:335: dam tshig thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:336: rdo rje sems dpa'i bkas bshad pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:337: sdom pa'i rtsa ba ma lus kun //
NK085(ru)002:338: zhes rgyas pa las 'byung bas so //
NK085(ru)002:339: thugs dam gyi lha yin pa'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:340: rgyal po dzas rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong ba'i dus su /
NK085(ru)002:341: sngon tshe gong nas 'brel ba'i las kyis mjal ba'i lha mchog go //
NK085(ru)002:342: bskal pa brgyar yang mi gtong ngo //
NK085(ru)002:344: klad don gyi gnyis pa bshad par dam bca' ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:345: de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas //
NK085(ru)002:346: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:347: de ltar phyag 'tshal nas ci byed ce na bshad par bya ces pas 'brel lo //
NK085(ru)002:348: gang bshad dam tshig chen po ces pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:349: rang bzos ma lags sam zhe na rgyud gsum zhes
NK085(ru)002:350: pas lung bstan rgyud nas yod pa bldabs pas ci
NK085(ru)002:351: dgos she na / rgyud na 'thor ba go bde
NK085(ru)002:352: ba'i don du bsdus nas bsgrigs te bkod pas mdor
NK085(ru)002:353: dgos she na / ces bya'o // 'o na lhag
NK085(ru)002:354: chad du ma gyur ram zhe na nges par gsal
NK085(ru)002:356: tshig bsdus la don rgyas pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:357: gang gi phyir ce na lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir /
NK085(ru)002:359: gsang sngags pa rnams kyi don du'o //
NK085(ru)002:360: 'o na gsang sngags byin rlabs kyi lam pa yin
NK085(ru)002:361: pas sngon du bla ma dang yi dam la dbang
NK085(ru)002:362: mi za ba dgos na de yod dam ce na
NK085(ru)002:363: / de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:364: zhes pas ston pa gnyis la mchod pa byas nas
NK085(ru)002:365: gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang mi 'gal bar bstan to
NK085(ru)002:366: // dam bca' ba slob dpon nyid kyis mdzad pas chog /dkyus su dgod pa ci dgos zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:367: dra ma rnams dam bca' ba sngon du song nas brtsam pa mthar phyin pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:368: slob dpon nyid kyang de ltar bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:369: phyi rabs pa la'ang gdam pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:370: de nas phyag gi skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:371: des dkyus su bkod pa'i dgos pa ste khog don no //
NK085(ru)002:372: tshig gi don ni de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:374: gong du phyag gi skabs su blo rab 'bring rnam
NK085(ru)002:375: pa gsum gyi thabs kyis bstod pa byas pa de
NK085(ru)002:376: ltar ston pa ni gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:377: chos thams cad kyi kho na gab pa gsang ba
NK085(ru)002:378: bzhis chod pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyud ni rdo rje
NK085(ru)002:380: gzu lum ras chod can gyi ched du yi ge'i rgyud la gab pa /
NK085(ru)002:381: sbas pa dang mi bstan pa'i gsang ba rnams ni
NK085(ru)002:382: rdo rje slob dpon gyis ston pa'i gnyis po de
NK085(ru)002:383: thabs ci'i sgo nas kyang mnyes pa ni mchod pa
NK085(ru)002:384: zhes bya ste / don de nyid sngon du song ba la ni byas zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:385: lha rje glan gyis de ltar ces pa rang bzhin rgyud la 'dod skad /
NK085(ru)002:386: spyir rnal 'byor pa gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum ka la 'jug kyang /
NK085(ru)002:387: 'dir lam bkar nas ston pa ni gang zhig lam
NK085(ru)002:388: gyi bgrod pa don du gnyer nas yul du phyir
NK085(ru)002:389: nas don nyams su myong ba bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:390: 'dir 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i thabs lta spyod sgom gsum
NK085(ru)002:391: dbyer med pa nyid chu yi rgyun ltar mi 'bral
NK085(ru)002:392: ba ni 'bras bu thob pa'i thabs ma nor ba
NK085(ru)002:393: stee / rnal 'byor zhes pa'ang don de nyid nyams su lon pa'i rten kyi gang zag go //
NK085(ru)002:394: rnams ni dbre bskol med par bsgrub pa po thams
NK085(ru)002:395: cad don ni lam nyams su blang ba nyid gnas
NK085(ru)002:397: 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa mthar thug gi don ste /
NK085(ru)002:398: de dag thams cad bar ma dor chud mi za
NK085(ru)002:399: zhing mthar phyin par byed pa ni sa gazhi'am ded
NK085(ru)002:400: dpon dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig yin pas de dag
NK085(ru)002:402: rgyud gsum ni gsang ba'i snying po dang /
NK085(ru)002:403: gtor rgyud dang sa ma ya bkod pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:404: gsal byed ces pa ni rgyud na 'thor ba rnams
NK085(ru)002:405: snyigs ma'i dus kyi gang zag gis rtogs sla ba'i
NK085(ru)002:406: phyir / gsang ba'i snying po nas rtsa ba'i dam tshig bco lnga ston pa /
NK085(ru)002:407: 'dir yan lag nying lag dang bcas pa gsal bar ston par byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:408: sa ma ya bkod pa nas bsrung thabs nyams rgyu
NK085(ru)002:409: la sogs pa rnams 'thor nas yod pa rnams 'dir
NK085(ru)002:410: phyogs phyogs su bsdeb nas gsal bar byed pa dang
NK085(ru)002:411: / gtor rgyud nas lus rnam par bzhag pa bcur ston pa nyid de /
NK085(ru)002:412: nyung na mi chog cing mang na mi dgos pas de nyid gsal bar byas pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:414: ces par sgro sku dang bral ba'i rgyud gsum gyi
NK085(ru)002:415: don lhag chad med par skal ldan tshe gcig gis
NK085(ru)002:416: 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i ngo bo mngon gsum du
NK085(ru)002:417: snang bar byas pa la gsal byed ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:418: yang na rgyud gsum ces pas dam tshig gi che ba'ang yin ste /
NK085(ru)002:419: gzhan gzhung gi dam tshig rnams ni lam gyi nang na'ang srung ba'i ngo bo tsam gcig ston la /
NK085(ru)002:420: 'di ni gzhi dam tshig 'di nyid ston pas /
NK085(ru)002:421: gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum ka skal ldan gyi blo la nges par gsal bar byed pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:422: de yang spyi dang bye brag gnyis las 'di'i brjod
NK085(ru)002:423: bya'i don dang tshig gi rnam grangs ma lus pa
NK085(ru)002:424: sems nyid ngang la snang zhing de dang gnyis su
NK085(ru)002:425: med pa gzhi yin la lam du rtogs nas rtogs
NK085(ru)002:426: pa'i don las mi 'da' ba skyed du bya ba
NK085(ru)002:427: dang bcas pa nyid nas lam ste /
NK085(ru)002:428: de nyid mthar phyin nas dam tshig thams cad dbyer
NK085(ru)002:429: med pa'i ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'bras
NK085(ru)002:430: bu'o // de dag nges par gsal byed /
NK085(ru)002:432: bye brag na byang chub sems kyi dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)002:435: lta ba shes cher ston pa thams cad gazhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:436: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig rnams nyams
NK085(ru)002:437: su blangs pa'i ngos nas lam shes pa dang bsgrub
NK085(ru)002:438: pa'am dam tshig mthar phyin pa 'bras bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:439: de dag skal ldan gyi ngo la nges par gsal byed ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:440: des na dam tshig chen po zhes pa dam tshig gi 'bras bu'ang mtshan dang mthun /
NK085(ru)002:441: chen po ces pa yo ga phyi nang kun la dpags pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:443: de yang gsang ba'i snying po las /
NK085(ru)002:444: rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de //
NK085(ru)002:446: dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis //
NK085(ru)002:447: sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlobs //
NK085(ru)002:448: bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs //
NK085(ru)002:449: 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor //
NK085(ru)002:450: ci bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs //
NK085(ru)002:451: ci snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa //
NK085(ru)002:452: ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis grub //
NK085(ru)002:453: nyams na bskang bas rdzogs pa dang //
NK085(ru)002:454: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ces pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:455: 'jig rten gyi gtso bo lha chen po brgyad dang //
NK085(ru)002:456: de'i 'khor rnams kyis bkul ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:457: dam pa mchog sangs rgyas kyis sras su dgongs shing /
NK085(ru)002:458: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spun du dgongs te
NK085(ru)002:459: nyin mtshan dus drug du byin gyis rlob pa dang
NK085(ru)002:460: / tshe 'di nyid la da lta nas bde bar
NK085(ru)002:461: gshegs pa'i dgongs spyod la 'jug ste yul gcig la
NK085(ru)002:462: / rol ba dang / des khams gsum gyi rtsa ba zad ste /
NK085(ru)002:463: rgan mo la bu nad mi sdig pa ltar /
NK085(ru)002:464: gzung 'dzin gyi nyes pa dang bral ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:465: da lta nyid kun tu bzang po'i sku gsung thugs su gser gling ltar dngos su sbyor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:466: 'og ma'i 'dul sdom ma lus pa ril ched du
NK085(ru)002:467: bsrungs pa med par nyes pa rdul phra rab kyang
NK085(ru)002:468: ma dmigs par dag pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub
NK085(ru)002:469: pa dang / nyan thos ni zhig na gsor med /
NK085(ru)002:470: byang sems ni nyams nas gsos na 'phro sobs la /
NK085(ru)002:471: 'dir gsang sngags ni nyams nas bskangs na 'phro sobs
NK085(ru)002:472: pa'i steng du bsgrub par 'gyur te 'bras bu che
NK085(ru)002:473: bar 'byin pa'o // mdor zhes pa rgyud gsum na
NK085(ru)002:474: 'thor bas 'dus dka' ba de brjod byed 'di'i don
NK085(ru)002:475: rgyas la tshig mdor bsdus zhes pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:476: yang na slob dpon sgegs pa'i rdo rje nyid kyis
NK085(ru)002:477: bzhed pa'i dam tshig mdo rgyas 'bring dgu las gong
NK085(ru)002:478: ma rnams la bltos na 'dis nyung bas mdor zhes
NK085(ru)002:479: bya'o // bshad bya ces pa thugs kyi dgongs pa dam bcas pa nyid zhal du phyungs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:480: dam tshig snod kyi bye brag dang sbyar ba'i dgos pa la gsum gyi dang po /
NK085(ru)002:481: rten gyi gang zag gi mtshan nyid ni lam gyi rgyud pa zhugs pa rnams gyis /
NK085(ru)002:482: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:483: gang zhig nyams su blangs nas 'bras bu mngon du
NK085(ru)002:484: snang bar byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa ni
NK085(ru)002:485: lam ste 'dir khyad par gsang sngags bla na med
NK085(ru)002:486: pa'i lam mo // gying zhes pa rgyu gnyis rkyen
NK085(ru)002:487: bzhi ste drug gis r+ts+wa me bzhin du yul mched
NK085(ru)002:488: nas skad cig mas stobs zhugs te thabs shes rab
NK085(ru)002:489: pa'i lam mo // kyi lam dang / bskyed rdzogs
NK085(ru)002:490: gnyis la dgongs pas zag bcas kyi lam che 'bring
NK085(ru)002:491: pa'i lam mo // kyi lam dang / rnams dang
NK085(ru)002:492: / zag med rnams stobs zhugs ste gong nas gong
NK085(ru)002:493: du 'pho ba la ni rgyud ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:494: la ni de nyid gzhir bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:495: yul de nyid la zhugs pa'i skyes bu skal pa mchog dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
NK085(ru)002:496: bslab pa gsum la gnas byas nas //
NK085(ru)002:497: zhes pas spyi'i slab pa gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:498: lhag pa tshul khrims gtso bor ston pa /
NK085(ru)002:500: ting nge 'dzin gtso bor ston pa /
NK085(ru)002:502: shes rab gtso bor ston pa mngon pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:503: sde snod gsum la mkhas pa la ni gnas pa zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:504: theg pas dam sdom pa'i bslab pa gsum ni /
NK085(ru)002:505: nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang /
NK085(ru)002:506: byang sems kyi sdom pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:507: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)002:508: gong ma la 'og ma rdzogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:509: 'og ma gong ma gnas gyur pa'i tshul gyis mi 'bral ba la gnas byas nas zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:510: khyad par gsang sngags kyi bslab pa gsum ni lta spyod sgom gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:511: dper na sems can gcig gi lus kyi yan lag
NK085(ru)002:512: tshang ba dang 'dra bar 'bras bu mngon du snang
NK085(ru)002:513: ba'i nus pa can ste gnas byas nas zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:515: de nas ci byed ce na don gnyis mngon du
NK085(ru)002:516: byed pa yang zhes pa bsgrub pa ngo bo'i ngos
NK085(ru)002:517: nas mchog dang thun mong rnam pa gnyis sam /
NK085(ru)002:518: yon tan gyi ngos nas bdag don dang gzhan don rnam pa gnyis so //
NK085(ru)002:519: 'o na de tsho ni theg pa thun mong pa
NK085(ru)002:520: la yang yod ce na 'dir rgyu mngon du'ang zhes
NK085(ru)002:521: pas dbang po'i mngon gsum du tshe gcig gis byed
NK085(ru)002:522: pa bya'o // des na theg pa mchog gi lam
NK085(ru)002:523: pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa da lta nyid byed
NK085(ru)002:524: pa bya'o // pa ces yang / gcig gis kun
NK085(ru)002:525: 'dul ba ma yin par bstan te gang zhe na
NK085(ru)002:526: theg pa bye brag tu bstan pa'i dgos pa ni
NK085(ru)002:527: nang ris la la mun snang phyir /
NK085(ru)002:528: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:529: 'dir phyi pa las dgar bas nang ba zhes smos
NK085(ru)002:530: la de'i nang tshan gyis ris mi mthun pas na
NK085(ru)002:531: la la zhes bya ba la smos te theg pa
NK085(ru)002:532: dagu'o // de dag kyang mun pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:533: 'dir ma dpe mi gsal ma dpe rnyed na gsab dgos /
NK085(ru)002:534: theg pa la la'i ngo bo la la'i 'gal can du shar ste /
NK085(ru)002:535: 'ug pa'i snang ba gzhan gyi mun pa dang mtshungs
NK085(ru)002:536: pa dang 'dra bar theg pa chen po'i blang bya
NK085(ru)002:537: rnams theg chung gi spang byar gyur pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:538: gsang sngags dang byang chub sems dpa' de dang mtshungs pas /
NK085(ru)002:539: snang ba dang gdul bya'i blo rtog bzhin te /
NK085(ru)002:540: des gdul bya kun gyi rgyud la theg pa gcig gis 'dul bar 'thad pa ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:541: nyan thos dang gsang sngags bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:542: gzhi de lta bu la gdul bya gang dang gang
NK085(ru)002:543: la theg pa gang dang gis gdul bya'i blo dang
NK085(ru)002:544: cha mthun pas 'dul ba'i spyod pa de dang des
NK085(ru)002:546: theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang cha mthun pa'i spyod
NK085(ru)002:547: pa des rten gyi gang zag de dag gi don
NK085(ru)002:548: spyod pa'i rigs te theg pa chen po dang gsang
NK085(ru)002:549: sngags kyang de dang mtshungs so //
NK085(ru)002:550: gdul bya'i blo dang 'tsham par bstan pa'i yon tan ni gdul bya'i skabs kyi rim spyod pa /
NK085(ru)002:551: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:552: theg pa rim pa dgu'i gdul bya'i skabs dang sbyar nas theg pa'ang de bzhin du ston te /
NK085(ru)002:553: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gdul bya'i skabs dang sbyar
NK085(ru)002:554: nas de'i theg pa'i skabs kyis rims kyis don spyod
NK085(ru)002:555: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gdul bya dang
NK085(ru)002:556: sbyar nas de'i theg pa'i skabs kyis rims kyis don
NK085(ru)002:557: pa dang / spyod pa dang / gsang sngags phyi
NK085(ru)002:558: nang drug kyang de dang mtshungs par spyod pa de
NK085(ru)002:559: ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dngos yin te gdul
NK085(ru)002:560: bya'i blo tshad bzhin du shar ba rin po che
NK085(ru)002:561: dbang gi rgyal po lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:563: zhes pa don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rnal
NK085(ru)002:564: 'byor pa ni lus mi yin yang sems sangs rgyas
NK085(ru)002:565: su bzhugs te 'gro ba'i lus la dag pa'i dgongs
NK085(ru)002:566: pa can zhes chos kyi me long las gsungs so
NK085(ru)002:567: // des na theg pa mchog gi lam pas bdag
NK085(ru)002:568: gzhan gyi don thams cad lhun grub du phyogs kun
NK085(ru)002:569: la mkhas na don ngo bos rdzogs pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:571: rdo rje slob dpon kyang phyi nang phyogs thams cad
NK085(ru)002:572: la mkhas par bya ba yin gyi phyogs 'ga' tsam
NK085(ru)002:573: shes par slob dpon gyis sa bzung du mi rung
NK085(ru)002:574: zhes gsungs so // don byed tshul yang gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:575: gnas skabs de nyid du theg pa gang gi snod
NK085(ru)002:576: dang ldan nas de nyid kyi blo tshim par bya
NK085(ru)002:577: ba dang / rim par brgyud nas mchog la sbyor ba ni mthar thug gi don no //
NK085(ru)002:578: de ltar klad kyi don bstan nas gzhung la gnyis
NK085(ru)002:579: kyi mdor bstan pa ni gnyer 'di lung gi lus
NK085(ru)002:580: bzhag na / zhes pa la sogs pa ste gnyer
NK085(ru)002:581: ni rten gyi gang zag gis khas blang nas mi
NK085(ru)002:582: bzhag na / 'da' ba ste / rtsa ba dang yan lag rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:583: 'di la kha cig gis 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i thabs
NK085(ru)002:584: sam nyams su blang ba'i yan lag rgyud kyi dngos
NK085(ru)002:585: po bcu las dam tshig dgar bas so gsung skad
NK085(ru)002:586: / 'di zhes pa dngos po nye bar ston pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:587: brjod bya de nyid ston par byed pa'i brjod byed gzhung 'adi'o //
NK085(ru)002:589: zhes pa kun tu bzang po brjod bya tshad mas
NK085(ru)002:590: gsungs pa'i lung gtor rgyud kyis bstan chos kyi don
NK085(ru)002:591: mdor bsdus te lus rnam par bzhag par /
NK085(ru)002:592: ngo bo rnam grangs la sogs pa bcu ste 'di
NK085(ru)002:593: yang gong dam baca'i skabs su nges par gsal byed
NK085(ru)002:594: ces pas mdo rgyas su bstan pa'i phyi rabs pa
NK085(ru)002:595: blo zhan pa rnams kyis go sla ba'i phyir ro
NK085(ru)002:596: // de yang go rims rnam par bzhag pa ni
NK085(ru)002:597: rten gyi gang zag rnams kyis dam tshig ci lta
NK085(ru)002:598: bu yin pa don spyi yid kyi yul du shes
NK085(ru)002:600: thog mar dam tshig gi don gyi ngo bo bstan
NK085(ru)002:601: te tsam du bzhag na lam gyis rim du song
NK085(ru)002:602: bas don blo dngos 'phrod dka' bas de bsal ba'i
NK085(ru)002:603: phyir rnam grangs rnam par phye ste blo la brda'
NK085(ru)002:604: mjal bar bya rnam grangs tsam shes kyang bsrungs ba
NK085(ru)002:605: nyams su ma blangs na dbul mo'i khyim na gter
NK085(ru)002:606: yod pa dang 'dra bar yon tan mi snang ste
NK085(ru)002:607: / des na bsrung thabs 'chad pa bzhin rnam pa gnyis kyi sgo nas rgyas par bshad /
NK085(ru)002:608: de ltar nyams su blangs kyang sems can log rtog
NK085(ru)002:609: gi rang bzhin bas mi mthun pa nyams pa 'ong
NK085(ru)002:610: bas / de'i rgyu bkags nas 'bras bu nyam pa
NK085(ru)002:611: mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nyams pa'i rgyu bstan
NK085(ru)002:613: de'i skyon tshe 'di la 'byung ba ni tshe phyi
NK085(ru)002:614: ma la ngan song du 'gro ba'i snga rtags yin
NK085(ru)002:615: pas de nyid du snga rtags bstan /
NK085(ru)002:616: nyams pa'i skyon ni phyi nang ma la ngan song du kha 'khor ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:617: dug 'thungs pa'i sdug bsngal shes na rgyu la dug
NK085(ru)002:618: mi 'thung ba bzhin du ngan song gsum gyi sdug
NK085(ru)002:619: bsngal gyis skyo nas skyon spong bar bstan /
NK085(ru)002:620: yon tan ni gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi 'bras bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:621: de la brod pa bskyed pas bsrung ba la nan tan du 'jug pas de'i rjes la bstan /
NK085(ru)002:622: bskang thabs ni rgya la nyams na theg dman dang
NK085(ru)002:623: mi 'dra bas che ba bdun du bshad pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:624: bas de nyid du bskang thabs bstan /
NK085(ru)002:625: dpe ni theg pa mchog gi dam tshig nyid lam gyi dngos gzhi yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:626: 'bras bu bskyed pa'i gzhi yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:627: de la sogs te shin tu gal che bas de mtshon pa'i dpe bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:628: zhes pa dper na za 'og yug la ri mo
NK085(ru)002:629: gzugs ci ltar snang yang za 'og tu gcig pa
NK085(ru)002:630: bzhin / 'dir rnam grangs dgu po'i bsam brjod ci ltar snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:631: mnyam pa nyid sems nyid kyi ngang la snang zhing /
NK085(ru)002:632: de las ma g.yos shing der gnyis su med pa ni mnyam pa'i dam tshig ces bya la /
NK085(ru)002:633: mdor bsdus pa zhes kyang bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:634: dam tshig thams cad de la snang zhing der mi gnyis pas rtsa ba'i rtsa ba zhes bshad do //
NK085(ru)002:635: grangs nges pa ni dper na phyogs thams cad phyogs
NK085(ru)002:636: bcu'i zhing nang du 'dus shing de bas lhag pa'ang
NK085(ru)002:637: mi dgos la / bcu la sogs pa byas kyang gcig la sogs pas ma tshang ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:638: de bzhin du gzhung 'di'i brjod bya'i don rten gyi
NK085(ru)002:639: gang zag gis nyams su blangs pa yang phal cher
NK085(ru)002:640: las dang po pa'i ngos nas bcu bas mang na'ang
NK085(ru)002:641: lhag la de bas nyung na yang ma chog pa
NK085(ru)002:642: ste / 'dir ma dper ldeb gcig chad yod pas rjes su rnyed na gsab dgos zhu /
NK085(ru)002:643: sems rgyud kyi log rtog kyang grangs med de sangs rgyas nyiid kyis mi mkhyen phyir /
NK085(ru)002:644: zhes pa la dor ba'i tshig ste gong gi grangs
NK085(ru)002:645: gnyis po sangs rgyas nyid kyis brjod pa las dbang
NK085(ru)002:646: thob pas kyang brjod pa mi rdzogs pa'i phyir mi
NK085(ru)002:648: de bas ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su gyur nas brjod na'ang mi lang zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:649: rtog 'dul gnyen por dam tshig grangs //
NK085(ru)002:650: zhes pa gdul bya'i rtog pa 'dul ba'i gnyen por
NK085(ru)002:651: dam tshig /snang ba yin pas rtog pa brjod las
NK085(ru)002:652: 'das pa'i dbang gis dam tshig gi grangs kyang dus
NK085(ru)002:653: gsum gyi rgyal ba nyid kyis kyang brjod pa las
NK085(ru)002:654: 'das te brjod kyi mi lang zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:655: don de nyid gsang ba'i snying po las /
NK085(ru)002:656: dam tshig 'di nas rmad po che //
NK085(ru)002:657: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NK085(ru)002:658: srid gsum 'gro ba ci snyed pa'i //
NK085(ru)002:659: rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spros //
NK085(ru)002:661: rtog pa 'dul ba'i thabs ni gnyen pos 'dul ba lha dang mi yi theg pa dge bcu dang /
NK085(ru)002:662: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:663: sbyangs pas 'dul ba rgyu yi theg pa chen po'o //
NK085(ru)002:664: bsgyur bas 'dul ba ni phyi pa gsum mo //
NK085(ru)002:665: ma spangs gnas su dag pa ni nang pa rnam pa gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:666: ngo shes pas 'dul ba ni a ti yo ga'o //
NK085(ru)002:667: des na theg pa rim dagu'ang dam tshig gi rnam grangs ste /
NK085(ru)002:668: dam tshig rgyas par sa ma ya 'bum sde la sogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:670: theg pa mchog gi dam tshig rnams ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal khrims dang 'dra ste /
NK085(ru)002:671: gdul bya'i dbang gis rgya chad pa med de grangs ma nges pa kho na'o //
NK085(ru)002:673: dam tshig bkod pa las kyang /
NK085(ru)002:674: sa ma ya 'bum sde'i bsrung ba'i rim pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:675: ci snyed du brjod kyang brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das
NK085(ru)002:676: ste chu thams cad thigs pa nas bgrang bar nus
NK085(ru)002:677: kyi / dam tshig gi grangs 'di brjod par dka' ste /
NK085(ru)002:678: bskal pa dpag tu med par brjod kyang mtha' med do //
NK085(ru)002:680: de ni dam tshig rnam grangs rgyas pa'i rgyas par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:681: grangs dngos la gsum gyi dang po rtsa ba'i grangs
NK085(ru)002:682: ni byang sems rnam gnyis slob dpon drug ces pa
NK085(ru)002:683: la sogs pa ste byang chub kyi sems rnam pa
NK085(ru)002:684: gnyis don dam dang kun rdzob ste 'og ma dag
NK085(ru)002:685: gis stong pa dang snying rje zhes 'dogs la /
NK085(ru)002:686: shes rab gtso bor ston pa rnams kyis kun rdzob khams kyi dwangs ma dang gnyis su byas kyang /
NK085(ru)002:687: 'dir ni kun rdzob ma 'gag par snang ba phung
NK085(ru)002:688: po dang khams dang skye mched rnams gser gyi rdzas
NK085(ru)002:689: ltar lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du ye nas
NK085(ru)002:690: dag pa'o // don dam ni de nyid sems nyid
NK085(ru)002:691: rang byung gi ye shes su yul yul can ma
NK085(ru)002:692: dmigs pa ni byang chub sems zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:694: don dam du ni nor bdun la //
NK085(ru)002:695: kun rdzob du ni nyams rdzogs ste //
NK085(ru)002:696: lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo //
NK085(ru)002:698: slob dpon drug ces pa gzhan dag la gsum ldan zhes 'chad kyang /
NK085(ru)002:704: man ngag lung ste drug go //
NK085(ru)002:705: 'dir rnam grangs bstan pa'i skabs yin pas zhib par
NK085(ru)002:706: bsrung thabs kyi skabs su bstan par bshad pa dang
NK085(ru)002:707: / 'chad pa kun las shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:709: zhes pa spyi yi mched khams gsum gyi sems can dang /
NK085(ru)002:710: mdzes pa'i mched nang pa sangs rgyas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:711: nye ba'i mched gsang sngags su zhugs pa tsam dang /
NK085(ru)002:712: 'brel pa'i mched dkyil 'khor gcig tu dus gcig dbang
NK085(ru)002:713: thob pa dang bzhi ste gong ma drug dang bcu
NK085(ru)002:714: sku'o // sngags gsum ni rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
NK085(ru)002:715: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags dang /
NK085(ru)002:716: bskul ba las kyi sngags gsum mo //
NK085(ru)002:717: phyag rgya bzhi ni sku phyag rgya chen po /
NK085(ru)002:720: 'phro 'du phrin las kyi phyag rgya bzhi dang bdun ni gsung ngo //
NK085(ru)002:721: gsang bcu zhes pa spyir gsang bzhi /
NK085(ru)002:723: 'os pa dang gnyer gtad pa gnyis dang bcu ni thugs so //
NK085(ru)002:724: rtsa bar zhes pa gong gi yan lag bzhi las
NK085(ru)002:725: nyid lag nyi shu rtsa dgur phyes pa ni thub
NK085(ru)002:726: ma thub kyis legs nyes kyi rtsa bar gyur pa
NK085(ru)002:727: dang 'bum sde thams cad 'di nyid las 'phros pas
NK085(ru)002:728: shes par bya zhes gdams pa brjod pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:729: thun mong ma yin pa'i yan lag gi grangs ni spyad bya lnga dang mi spang lnga /
NK085(ru)002:730: zhes pa la sogs pa ste spyad pa lnga ni sbyor grol ma byin len pa /
NK085(ru)002:731: rdzun smra ngag barlangasa lnga yul dang phrad nas 'og
NK085(ru)002:732: ma dang mi 'dra bas spyad pa nyid kyi don
NK085(ru)002:733: gnyis grub cing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa la ni spyad
NK085(ru)002:735: ma spangs pa lnga ni 'og ma dag gi 'ching byed kyi dngos po dug lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:736: 'dir yang dag pa dang log pa'i dbang gis lta
NK085(ru)002:737: sgom gyi gdeng dang ldan pa chos mthun pa tsam
NK085(ru)002:739: log dug lnga rang rig rang snang du shes pas
NK085(ru)002:740: spang rgyu yul du ma grub pas mi spang lnga
NK085(ru)002:741: zhes bya'o // dang du blang dang /
NK085(ru)002:742: zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga ste grub pa bzhis brgyan
NK085(ru)002:743: pa las mchog thun thams cad snang ba'i spyod pa'i
NK085(ru)002:744: dngos po'o // bsgrub ces pas rigs lnga ye shes
NK085(ru)002:745: lnga yab yum la sogs pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo
NK085(ru)002:746: nyid la da lta nyid nas bsgrub pa nyams su
NK085(ru)002:747: blangs pas 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:748: de bzhin zhes pa gong ma nyid dper blang ste
NK085(ru)002:749: bsgrub pa lnga yod pa de bzhin du bsgrub pa'i
NK085(ru)002:750: sngon du 'gro ba'i lta ba la'ang 'khor ba'i chos
NK085(ru)002:751: kyi lnga tshan rnams spangs pa med par ye shes
NK085(ru)002:752: lnga la sogs pa'i ngang du snang ba la ni
NK085(ru)002:753: grangs mang yang lnga tshan du bsdus pas shes bya
NK085(ru)002:755: 'di dag ni theg pa 'di nyid kho na'i spyod yul te /
NK085(ru)002:756: yo ga man chad kyis dben pas thun mong ma
NK085(ru)002:757: yin pa'i yan lag ces ston pa kun tu bzang
NK085(ru)002:759: yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la'ang zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:760: dam tshig bkod pa las kyang /
NK085(ru)002:761: yan lag gi dam tshig 'di dag ni /
NK085(ru)002:762: snod du ma gyur pa rnams la bston na zhes gsungs pas so //
NK085(ru)002:763: yan lag skabs su shes par bya //
NK085(ru)002:764: zhes pa yan lag ni gong du lnga tshoms su bstan pa rnams yin la /
NK085(ru)002:766: lnga tshom re re yang zhib tu gses pa'i bye
NK085(ru)002:767: brag rnams bsrungs thabs brjod pa'i skabs su shes par
NK085(ru)002:768: bya zhes so // thun mong gi yan lag gi grangs ni thun mong dam tshig mtha' yas pa /
NK085(ru)002:769: zhes pa la sogs pa ste yo ga phyis chod
NK085(ru)002:770: nas nyan thos kyi bar ste thams cad kyi bsrung
NK085(ru)002:771: bya thun mong du gyur ba'i dam tshig ni mtha'
NK085(ru)002:772: yas pa ste / gong du rnam grangs kyi skabs su bstan pa ltar yin la /
NK085(ru)002:773: 'dir de dag gal che ba dang thag nye ba
NK085(ru)002:774: rnams mdor bsdus na bdag don nyi shu rtsa gcig
NK085(ru)002:775: dang gzhan don bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:776: rnam grangs skabs su shes par bya //
NK085(ru)002:777: zhes pa nyid lag gi rnam grangs ni bsrung thabs
NK085(ru)002:778: rgyas par bstan pa'i skabs su 'og tu shes par
NK085(ru)002:779: bya zhes so // spyi don gsum pa bsrungs ba'i
NK085(ru)002:780: thabs la gsum gyi dang po mdor bstan pa ni
NK085(ru)002:781: bya zhes so // / bsrung ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste //
NK085(ru)002:782: zhes pa gong du rnam grangs nyid shes par byas
NK085(ru)002:783: kyang bsrung ba nyams su ma blang na mi phan
NK085(ru)002:784: te lha yul gyi bdud rtsi brjod pa dang mtshungs
NK085(ru)002:785: pas de nyams su lon pa'i thabs ni 'di nyid
NK085(ru)002:786: du bstan pas na 'di lta ste /
NK085(ru)002:788: 'di dag la yang rten gyi gang zag gang gi srungs ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:789: yul gang la bsrung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:790: tshul ji ltar bsrung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:792: rgyud mtho dman gang gi tshe ngo bo gang dang ldan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:793: dus dang drug gis ston la /
NK085(ru)002:794: skyon yon la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams ni lus rnam bzhag gis bstan pa nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:795: de la rten gyi gang zag ni lta spyod dam
NK085(ru)002:796: tshig 'brel ba yin zhes pas thams cad du mthun
NK085(ru)002:797: no // yul la sogs pa rnams ni glo bur sbyar bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:798: rgyas par dbye ba la gnyis kyi rtsa ba'i dam
NK085(ru)002:799: tshig /de la lngar dbye ba'i dang po byang chub
NK085(ru)002:800: sems dpa' de la gsum du dbye ba'i kun rdzob
NK085(ru)002:802: rang lugs rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che zhes pa rang
NK085(ru)002:803: ni rten gyi gang zag ste mtshan nyid smos pa
NK085(ru)002:804: de nyid do // lus ni rgyu rkyen gyi gcig tu 'dus pa'i phung po lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:805: gzugs kyi phung po la gzugs chen bco lnga /
NK085(ru)002:806: tshor ba la bde sdug btang snyoms gsum la dus gsum gyis bco brgyad /
NK085(ru)002:807: 'du shes rgya che chung tshad med pa gsum /
NK085(ru)002:808: 'du byed la lnga bcu gcig /phyi nang gi chos
NK085(ru)002:809: thams cad la de nyid du ma 'dus pa rdul
NK085(ru)002:810: phra rab tsam yang med pa la ni phung po
NK085(ru)002:811: khams dang skye mched ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:812: de nyid ma rtogs pa'i dus su log rtogs rang snang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:813: skal ldan gyis rtogs pa'i ngo la ye shes rang snang ste /
NK085(ru)002:814: rnam par mi 'gag pa stong pa'i mtha' las rgyal la /
NK085(ru)002:815: ngo bo ma dmigs pas rtag pa'i mtha' las rgyal ste /
NK085(ru)002:816: de nyid snang ba dang grags pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:817: dran rig gsum sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yin la rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang mtshung ste /
NK085(ru)002:819: de las mi 'da' bas kyang phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)002:820: che zhes pa don de nyid ma 'dres la yongs
NK085(ru)002:821: su rdzogs pa nyid yo ga phyin chad kyi spyod
NK085(ru)002:822: yul du ma gyur bas so //
NK085(ru)002:823: de nyid rgyas par bshad pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:825: e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
NK085(ru)002:826: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK085(ru)002:827: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK085(ru)002:828: byang chub sems pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK085(ru)002:829: sa chu spyan dang ma ma ki //
NK085(ru)002:830: me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
NK085(ru)002:831: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
NK085(ru)002:832: zhes pa dang phung po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas /
NK085(ru)002:833: de nyid bskyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid 'byung ba
NK085(ru)002:834: lnga phung po dang dbyer med pa ni yum lnga'i
NK085(ru)002:835: bdag nyid mig nas lce yi bar gyi rnam shes
NK085(ru)002:836: bzhi ni thugs kyi rang bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:841: rnam shes kyi yul du gyur pa'i gzugs sgra dri
NK085(ru)002:842: ro bzhi bltos pa'i dbang gi mtshungs par grub pa
NK085(ru)002:843: dbyer med pa nyid sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o
NK085(ru)002:844: // mig la sogs pa'i dbang po bzhi ma 'gags par snang ba sku'i rang bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:845: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:847: kun bzang 'jam dpal dang bzhi dbang po la brten te dus su snang bas /
NK085(ru)002:848: gsum mthun pa las phyis 'byung ba dang bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:849: yon tan gyi bdag nyid bdug spos ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:850: lus kyi chos dbang po dang /
NK085(ru)002:853: reg shes bzhi ni gshen rjee gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bzhi /
NK085(ru)002:854: lta ba'i nang na dman pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:856: stobs che ba'i rtag lta chad lta /
NK085(ru)002:858: khro mo lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:859: de dag kyang lus dang chos la mthun pas yab yum du bzhugs so //
NK085(ru)002:860: de ltar bshad pa'i rtog pa sum bcu rtsa bzhi nyid /
NK085(ru)002:861: yid kyi shes pa'i rtsal nyid snang la /
NK085(ru)002:862: yid rang byung ye shes su dag nas rgyal ba sum cu rtsa bzhir gsal bas /
NK085(ru)002:863: thams cad rang rig ye shes su gcig pa nyid /
NK085(ru)002:864: drug pa kun du bzang po'o //
NK085(ru)002:865: de nyid na yid dang kun gzhi dbyer med te /
NK085(ru)002:866: rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi nyid /
NK085(ru)002:867: dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i bdag nyid las chos kyi dbyings zhes smos la /
NK085(ru)002:868: gzung 'dzin phra ba'ang mi gnas pa'i bzang mo'o //
NK085(ru)002:869: de lta bu'ang gzhan pa dag gis dper na 'jim
NK085(ru)002:870: pa la 'der so'i rgyu gnas pa dang 'dra bar
NK085(ru)002:871: / phung khams skye mched la byin rlabs kyis bsrangs na de ltar yin gyis /
NK085(ru)002:872: med na rang rgyud smra ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:873: khre 'bru thu bas sa gzhi chen po mi mthong ba bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:874: dngos po'i chos gcig la mthong snang drug skad cig la rdzogs pas kyang gsal lo //
NK085(ru)002:875: rten gyis gang zag nyid de ltar yin pa ma zad de sems can khams kyang der shes shing /
NK085(ru)002:876: zhes pa sems can gyi khams mtha' thug pa med
NK085(ru)002:877: pa rnams kyang log rtogs rang snang gi rtog tshogs
NK085(ru)002:878: rnams gong du bstan pa'i lha dang lha mo'i dkyil
NK085(ru)002:879: 'khor der shes shing snang stong gnyis med ye shes
NK085(ru)002:880: sku / zhes pa 'ja' dang nam mkha' ltar lha
NK085(ru)002:881: yi skur ma 'gag par snang yang ngo bo chos
NK085(ru)002:882: kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pas stong /
NK085(ru)002:883: de nyid lha yi ma 'gag pas snang /
NK085(ru)002:884: de gnyis su med pa rtogs pa gdeng du gyur pa ni ye shes te /
NK085(ru)002:885: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa ste /
NK085(ru)002:886: de nyid chos thams cad la khyab cing /
NK085(ru)002:887: dus gsum du mi 'gyur la yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas sku'o //
NK085(ru)002:888: rgyu rkyen gyis bskyed pa ltar snang ba'i ma 'gag pa ni kun rdzob bo //
NK085(ru)002:889: de nyid sems su gsal bas spros pa mi mnga'
NK085(ru)002:890: bas byang chu'i gzugs brnyan ltar mi gnyis cing sems
NK085(ru)002:892: gsal la mi 'gag ngos bzung med pas sems so //
NK085(ru)002:893: don dam byang chub sems ni byas mthong zos pa thams cad la /
NK085(ru)002:894: zhes pa dbang po drug gi yul du gyur pa
NK085(ru)002:895: thams cad rang byung gi ye shes su shar bas
NK085(ru)002:896: yul yul can ma grub ste /
NK085(ru)002:897: de la gzung 'dzin rang rgyud mi mnga' bas /
NK085(ru)002:898: de nyid dus na dus gsum du mi 'gyur bar bstan te /
NK085(ru)002:899: byas pa ni lus kyi cha /
NK085(ru)002:901: thams cad kyi khongs su rna ba dang sna ste dbang po lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:902: de'i yul gzugs la sogs pa lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:904: la ni de dag lta gzhir bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:905: de yang thabs kyi zhags pa las /
NK085(ru)002:906: mthong ba med pa'i tshul du mthong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:907: thos pa med pa'i tshul gyis thos pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:908: dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis snom pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:909: ro thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis myong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:910: reg thams cad bral ba'i tshul gyis reg pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:911: zhes pa byas pa lus kyi dbang po dang /
NK085(ru)002:912: yul dang 'dzom nas rnam shes kyis nyams su myong ba ltar snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:913: gsum po sems nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:914: byas gzung 'dzin du snang ba med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:915: mthong ba mig gi dbang po dang /
NK085(ru)002:916: yul gzugs su grub nas rnam shes kyis myong ba ltar snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:917: sems nyid ngang las ma g.yos pa'i phyir yul dang yul can du snang ba med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:918: zos pa lce yi dbang po dang yul ltar snang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:919: rnam shes kyis myong ba dang sems kyi phyir /
NK085(ru)002:920: yul yul can ma grub pas /
NK085(ru)002:921: gang yang myong ba med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:922: thos pa rna ba'i dbang po ltar snang nas yul
NK085(ru)002:923: dang 'dzom ste rnam shes kyis myong yang sems nyid
NK085(ru)002:924: kyi phyir / yul yul can ma bral bas thos pa ma grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:925: snom pa sna yi dbang po yul ltar snang la /
NK085(ru)002:926: rnam shes kyi myong yang sems nyid phyir /
NK085(ru)002:927: yul yul can du ma grub pas myong ba med de /
NK085(ru)002:928: rang byung la gi ye shes nyi ma'i snying po ltar /
NK085(ru)002:929: gzung 'dzin ka nas dag pa ni rig pa byang chub sems zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:930: de bas bcud dam pa nyid cha shas dang bral bas don dam pa byang chub kyi sems te /
NK085(ru)002:931: sems nyid spros pa ngang gi bral ba nyid shes
NK085(ru)002:932: sgrib kyi don la cha shas dang bral zhing mi
NK085(ru)002:933: 'gyur bas dam / gzung 'dzin mi mnga' bas byang /
NK085(ru)002:935: dngos gzhi dang bral zhing gsal la mi 'gag pas sems so //
NK085(ru)002:936: de yang rten gyi gang zag gong du smos pas
NK085(ru)002:937: kun rdzob ma 'gag par snang ba lha'i dkyil 'khor
NK085(ru)002:939: don dam pa rig pa rang gsal gyi ye shes /
NK085(ru)002:940: 'og ma'i spyod yul du ma gyur pas na lhag pa'i byang sems rnam pa gnyis zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:941: tshul ci ltar bsrung na dran dang shes bzhin sngon btang na /
NK085(ru)002:942: zhes pas dran pas ma yeng par bya /
NK085(ru)002:943: shes bzhin gyis de'i bya ra byas nas de nyid
NK085(ru)002:944: sngon du song bas byang sems rnam gnyis lta ba'i
NK085(ru)002:945: ngo bo la dus gsum rgyun du ma dran na
NK085(ru)002:946: / zhes pa dus gsum spyod lam bzhir ma nyams
NK085(ru)002:947: pas na bsrung tshul bsrung ba'i ngo bo dang bcas
NK085(ru)002:948: / pa'o // rgyud la ci ltar ldan pa ni
NK085(ru)002:949: las dang po pas skabs su dran pa dang shes
NK085(ru)002:950: bzhin gyis tshig gis mos pa'i dbang gis ma yeng
NK085(ru)002:951: / pa'o // bar bya ba'o // de nyid rig
NK085(ru)002:952: pa la nyams su len nas yul dag yul can
NK085(ru)002:953: med pa ltar snang yang ched 'dzin dang bcas pa
NK085(ru)002:954: ni zag bcas kyi mthong lam zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:955: snga na ma mthong ba mthong yang ched 'dzin gyi dbang gi zag bcas so //
NK085(ru)002:956: de nyid bstas pa med par rang spyi'i chos /
NK085(ru)002:957: dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:959: rtogs pa mngon sum du gyur te ched 'dzin phra ba'ang mi gnas pas /
NK085(ru)002:960: zag med rang gi mtshan nyid de mthong lam mo //
NK085(ru)002:961: de nyid rim par stobs su gyur nas byang sems
NK085(ru)002:962: gnyis po ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa nyid
NK085(ru)002:963: nam mkha' bzhin mtha' thug pa med pa rang byung
NK085(ru)002:964: gi ye shes gsal ba nyid thar lam pa rtsal
NK085(ru)002:966: des 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa'i tshe lam gyi
NK085(ru)002:967: rnams spang byar brtags pa ni 'dzin pa gting nas
NK085(ru)002:968: ma grol bas blo phebs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:969: chu bo brgal ba'i gru bzhir 'dor //
NK085(ru)002:970: zhes pa ni 'dzin pa zad pa tsam dang blo zhan zhes pa'i thabs so //
NK085(ru)002:971: des na dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje zhes gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:972: de dag dang mi ldan pa'i nyes dmigs ni /
NK085(ru)002:973: dus gsum bcas pa la gong ma'i don nyid dus 'das pa la sogs pa gsum dang /
NK085(ru)002:974: rgyun zhes pa spyod lam rnam pa bzhir mi brjed par bya rgyu yin pa la /
NK085(ru)002:975: de las gzhan pa ma dran na rten de las
NK085(ru)002:976: rang sems rtog pa med pas theg mchog sngags par
NK085(ru)002:977: ci zhig chud ces pa theg pa rnams kyi mchog
NK085(ru)002:978: ngo bo med bzhin yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i
NK085(ru)002:979: bdag nyid du ci zhig chud de mi chud ces
NK085(ru)002:980: bya'o // dus ni da lta nas thar lam bar ro //
NK085(ru)002:981: gzhan las kyang rnal 'byor ye shes mi shes par /
NK085(ru)002:982: nga ni sngags pa yin zer ba zhes gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:983: sku la gsum gyis bstan pa'i rten gyi gang zag gi lta spyod dam tshig 'grel pa yis /
NK085(ru)002:984: zhes pas lta ba'i chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pa man ngag gi don dang /
NK085(ru)002:985: phung khams lhar rtogs pa rgyud kyi don gnyis dang ldan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:986: spyod pas zag bcas zag med kyis spyod pa rnams ma nor bar gnas skabs 'byor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:987: dam tshig ste rtsa ba dang yan lag rnams ma tshang pa med par rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:988: 'o na byang chub sems kyi dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)002:989: lta ba la khyad ci yod zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:990: ngo bo la khyad med kyang rtogs pa nyid gces
NK085(ru)002:991: pas dam par 'dzin pa'i ngos nas mi 'bral bas
NK085(ru)002:993: de nyid yul yul can med par rang gsal gyi ngos nas lta ba zhes brjod de /
NK085(ru)002:995: spyod pa yang blo dman gyi ched du bdag don gzhan don te thun mong gi yan lag dang /
NK085(ru)002:996: thun mong ma yin pa'i yan lag nyer lnga las
NK085(ru)002:997: ma gtogs pa'i spyod pa la logs su med pas
NK085(ru)002:998: / spyod pa'i ngo bo gang la bgyi zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:999: yan lag gnyis po yul dang phrad nas bsrung ba
NK085(ru)002:1000: las mi 'da' ba la ni dam tshig ces bya
NK085(ru)002:1001: la / mi 'gogs par nyams su blang ba'i ngos nas spyod pa zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1002: de dag kyang dbyer med pas na 'brel ba rnam
NK085(ru)002:1003: pa gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i rten gyi gang zag
NK085(ru)002:1004: la ni 'brel pa yis zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1005: lta spyod sgom gsum ces kun la bshad na /
NK085(ru)002:1006: 'dir sgom pa ma smos pa ni sku'i skabs su spyod pa gtso che bas so //
NK085(ru)002:1007: 'o na lta ba smos pa ci zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:1008: sgrub pa'i dam tshig bskyang ba'i phyir zhes pas lta
NK085(ru)002:1009: ba'i rlan gyis spyod pa'i srog tu 'gyur bas so
NK085(ru)002:1010: // 'on kyang 'dir sku la kha thag nye yang
NK085(ru)002:1011: gsum ka'i rten gyi gang zag du yang smos so
NK085(ru)002:1012: // // bsrung ba'i thabs la gnyis kyi dang po yul slob dpon bstan /
NK085(ru)002:1013: de la bzhi yi dang po grangs bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1014: spyi dang 'dren dang dam tshig dbang //
NK085(ru)002:1015: nyams chag skong dang shes rgyud grol //
NK085(ru)002:1016: man ngag lung gi slob dpon rnams //
NK085(ru)002:1018: dang po spyi'i ni theg pa thams cad spyi gzhi rgyu yi theg pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1019: de'i slob dpon ni skyabs su 'gro ba thun mong
NK085(ru)002:1020: yan chad nas sems bskyed pa dang sde snod gsum
NK085(ru)002:1021: gyi thos bsam bgyis pa'i bar che 'bring thams cad
NK085(ru)002:1022: do // 'di la kha cig slob dpon zhes 'chad na /
NK085(ru)002:1023: dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i zhal nas /
NK085(ru)002:1024: bla ma'i bla ma ni nyid dang khyad med te
NK085(ru)002:1025: nyams pa byung na yang bla ma dngos mi bzhugs
NK085(ru)002:1026: de la bshags par bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1027: de ma rnyed na mnyes pa gsum 'am brgya la sogs pa 'gyur ldab du brtsis pas dang /
NK085(ru)002:1028: slob dpon drug yon tan gyi gral rims kyis bzhag
NK085(ru)002:1029: pa la bar du 'dren slob byung bas kyang mi
NK085(ru)002:1030: 'thad pas so // de bas na dam tshig bkod
NK085(ru)002:1031: pa las kyang mkhan po slob dpon zhes gsungs pa
NK085(ru)002:1032: 'thad pas so // dang / yang de nyid las
NK085(ru)002:1033: spyi yi slob dpon ston pa'i skabs su mkhyen pa
NK085(ru)002:1034: can tha dag dang tha na tshig gi le'u gsum
NK085(ru)002:1035: gsungs pa yan chad ces gsungs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1036: gsang ba'i snying po las kyang /
NK085(ru)002:1037: theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la //
NK085(ru)002:1038: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1039: dpe'i skabs su yang yul la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:1040: mtshan nyid kyi slob dpon yin par shin du'ang 'thad do gsungs /
NK085(ru)002:1041: gzhan las kyang gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te /
NK085(ru)002:1042: byang chub sems sogs sdom pa ni //
NK085(ru)002:1043: gal te bdag la phan 'dod na //
NK085(ru)002:1044: sngags pas 'bad de gzung bar bya zhes pas so //
NK085(ru)002:1045: 'on kyang gong ma ye phyogs snga mar bzhag pa'ang ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:1046: dam pa gong ma rnams kyi bzhed pa yin pas blo spyi bor bzhag go //
NK085(ru)002:1047: 'dren zhes par 'dren pa'i slob dpon ste dbang bskur
NK085(ru)002:1048: ba'i dus su rdo rje slob dpon gyi drung du
NK085(ru)002:1049: khrid pa'i las kyi slob dpon te /
NK085(ru)002:1050: 'khor ba'i khams nas 'das par khrid pa'i brda' yin pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1051: 'di la'ang kha cig gis ma rig sgo 'dren 'dri klog slob pa'i slob dpon la gsung na /
NK085(ru)002:1052: 'dri klong ni thun mong yin ste /
NK085(ru)002:1055: 'jig rten pa thams cad la yod pas gang du'ang ma nges pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1056: 'dir spyi'i slob dpon gyi steng la byung bas de spangs mi rigs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1057: yi ge mkhan la slob dpon gyi sgra mi 'jug ste /
NK085(ru)002:1058: mkhan po zhes rgya cher rol pa las bshad pas so //
NK085(ru)002:1061: lus srog skyed dang 'jig rten ston //
NK085(ru)002:1062: mkhan po slob dpon rdo rje mched ces pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1063: pha mas byis pa ma rig pa 'jig rten gyi bya ba la dbang po'i sgo 'dren pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1064: mkhan po slob dpon gyis 'das pa'i bya ba ma
NK085(ru)002:1065: rig pa la dbang po'i sgo 'dren pa gnyis 'char
NK085(ru)002:1066: du bston to // dam tshig dbang zhes pas dbang
NK085(ru)002:1067: gi bla mas phyi nang gi dam tshig rnams rim
NK085(ru)002:1068: pa bzhin du phogs nas rgyud la theg tshad kyi
NK085(ru)002:1070: chags nyams bskong ba ni dam tshig srung ba las 'das te nyams na chag nyams zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:1071: byang chub sems dang gsung gi dam tshig dus las 'das na chags pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1072: dam tshig gzhan ma rnams gzhung du ma srongs pa la ni nyams pa zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:1073: 'dir theg pa mchog gi dam tshig gi yon tan
NK085(ru)002:1074: ni nyams na bskang bas rdzogs pa dang zhes pas
NK085(ru)002:1075: / de skong ba'i dpang po'i mdun du bshags dgos pas nyams chag bskang ba'i slob dpon zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1076: shes rgyud grol ba ni lung zab mo'i gzhung nyan
NK085(ru)002:1077: nas phyi nang gi chos la rig pa bde blag
NK085(ru)002:1078: du dbang bsgyur ba la ni rgyud grol zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:1079: ste / tha mal bas shes rgyud rtsa ba nas dag pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1080: man ngag lung zhes pa bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi dgongs pa ste bungs chung la don che /
NK085(ru)002:1081: thabs sla la dpag dka' ba'i man ngag gi don
NK085(ru)002:1082: zab mo bde bar gshegs pa'i lung zab mos zin
NK085(ru)002:1083: pa'o // de ltar bu'i don ston pa la ni
NK085(ru)002:1084: slob pa'i khrid mkhan du gyur pas na slob dpon
NK085(ru)002:1085: pa'o // zhes bya'o // rnams ni gong ma lnga po la yang sbyar te drug go //
NK085(ru)002:1086: tshul mtshon pa dpe'i grangs ni /
NK085(ru)002:1087: yul la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang //
NK085(ru)002:1088: khu bo ma dang pha dang mig /snying bas lhag pa'i tshul lta ste //
NK085(ru)002:1089: ces ste spyi'i slob dpon bkur ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:1090: dper na rgyal po'i mnga' ris la longs spyod pa'i
NK085(ru)002:1091: 'bangs sam 'khor gyis khrims dang 'gal ba mi byed
NK085(ru)002:1093: dus gsum du phyag dang mchod pa 'bul ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1094: de bzhin du rgyu yi theg pa'i slob dpon yang
NK085(ru)002:1095: khrim dang 'dra ba'i dkon mchog gsum gyi ba slab
NK085(ru)002:1096: pa dang 'gal ba mi bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1097: dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi las mi 'da' ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1098: khas blangs pa'i sdom pa gnyis bsrung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1099: 'gro ba la byams pa dang snying rje'i sgo nas phan 'dogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1100: dus dus kyi phyag dang mchod pa las mi 'da' ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1101: khu bo zhes pa 'dren pa'i slob dpon gyi dpe ste /
NK085(ru)002:1102: rgyal khrims can gyi yul na rgyal sar phyung ba
NK085(ru)002:1103: la khrid mkhan khu bos byed pa dang don des
NK085(ru)002:1107: phyag dang zhe sa rnams rgyal khrims dang mi 'gal bar bya ba bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:1108: 'dir 'dren pa'i slob dpon la yang rgyal khrims dang
NK085(ru)002:1109: 'dra ba'i dam tshig gi gzhung nas smos pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:1110: lus ngag yid gsum gyis mnyes par bya ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1111: ma ni dbang gi slob dpon gyi dpe ste rgyal
NK085(ru)002:1112: khrims can gyi ma ma rnams 'tshogs nas rgyal bu'i
NK085(ru)002:1113: lus brtan pa dang shed skye ba dang stobs dang
NK085(ru)002:1114: ldan nas rgyal khrims kyi rten du rung ba bzhin
NK085(ru)002:1115: dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon gyis dam tshig dang
NK085(ru)002:1116: dbang rnams rim pa bzhin phog cing bskur nas snod
NK085(ru)002:1117: dang rten dag par byas te rgyal khrims dang 'dra
NK085(ru)002:1118: ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi snod
NK085(ru)002:1120: pha zhes pa nyams pa skong ba'i slob dpon gyi dpe ste /
NK085(ru)002:1121: rgyal khrims dang 'gal nas chad pa byung na de las bslu ba'i thabs ni phas byed de /
NK085(ru)002:1122: nor la sogs pas rgyal po mnyes par byas nas nyes pa sobs te /
NK085(ru)002:1123: slar rgyal khrims dang mthun pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1124: des na pha la rim 'gro che bar byed pa
NK085(ru)002:1125: 'di bzhin du nyams chag skong ba yang bshags pas
NK085(ru)002:1126: skong ste / rgyal khrims dang 'dra ba'i theg pa mchog gi rigs su nges par byed do //
NK085(ru)002:1127: de bkur ba yang 'chad pa rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1128: mig ces pas shes rgyud grol ba'i slob dpon kyi
NK085(ru)002:1129: dpe ste mig la brten te phyi nang gi lag
NK085(ru)002:1130: nyes thams cad brda' sprod pa dang 'dra bar /
NK085(ru)002:1131: shes rgyud dgrol bas kyang 'khor 'das kyi spang blang dang lam gyi rtsol sgrub dang /
NK085(ru)002:1132: 'bras bu'i dngos gzhi rnams rig dang 'jal bar byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1133: des na mig ni shin du gces te /
NK085(ru)002:1134: bsrung ba dang mi 'bral ba bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:1135: slob dpon la gdung ba dang mi 'bral cing bsrung thabs rnams nyams su blang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:1136: snying ni man ngag gi slob dpon gyi dpe ste /
NK085(ru)002:1138: skyes bu rkang lag bcad de nyams kyang 'tsho //
NK085(ru)002:1139: ci ltar snying phyugs 'tsho ba'i glags med ltar //
NK085(ru)002:1140: zhes pas yan lag gang nyams kyang 'tshor btub la snying phyung na 'tsho ba'i glag med pa ltar /
NK085(ru)002:1141: bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gnyes kyi man ngag med na /
NK085(ru)002:1142: lnga po ci ltar byas kyang brjod byed tshig gi tha snyad du bab ste /
NK085(ru)002:1143: bu ram mngar ba'i lo rgyus brjod pa dang mtshungs
NK085(ru)002:1144: pas 'bras bu mngon du man ngag gi stobs te
NK085(ru)002:1145: / des na snying dang 'dra bas bkur bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1146: lhag pa'i tshul blta ste zhes pa bshad pa'i slob
NK085(ru)002:1147: dpon drug nyid so so'i dpes drug pas kyang lhag
NK085(ru)002:1148: pa'i tshul du bla ma rnams la blta'o zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:1149: 'o // ste zhes pa lhag ma ste gang zhe na bkur thabs 'chad pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:1150: slob dpon drug rgyud gcig la ldan pa'i tshul ni
NK085(ru)002:1151: slob dpon gcig gis dbang bskur na des rgyu'i theg
NK085(ru)002:1152: pa sems bskyed skyabs 'gro byas pa spyi'i slob dpon
NK085(ru)002:1153: / nyams pa byung na skong ba'i yul yin na de nyid tshang /
NK085(ru)002:1154: rgyud zhus na shes rgyud dgrol ba tshang /
NK085(ru)002:1155: man ngag zhus na de nyid tshang /
NK085(ru)002:1156: 'dren slob gzhan la rag ste yul la gang ldan
NK085(ru)002:1157: rnams brtsi ba so so'i snang ba yang yod de
NK085(ru)002:1158: dpyad do // bsrung thabs dngos ni /
NK085(ru)002:1159: sgo gsum zol sgyu med par ni //
NK085(ru)002:1160: yi dam lha ltar rgyun du bsam //
NK085(ru)002:1161: zhes pas sgo ni lus ngag yid gsum ste yul la 'gro ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1163: yon tan ma sbyor ba'i sgor gyur la /
NK085(ru)002:1165: zol sgyu zhes pa lus kyi sgo nas zol ni nor gtong yang ltad bcug pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1166: lus gtong yang mi na pa na bar bcos pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:1167: sgyu ni nor mi shor ba'i thabs lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:1168: lus kyang nyam stobs che yang chung ba ltar bcos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1169: ngag gi sgo nas zol ni rdzun spyod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1170: shes rdzun pa lta bu la ni sgyu zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1171: de dag kyang lus ngag gi rjes su 'gro ba la ni zol sgyu zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1172: de dag gis ma gos pa ni med pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1173: yid dam zhes pa lha rgyun du bsgom pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1174: dad mos mi phyed pa dang gnyan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1175: yon tan thams cad kyi byung khungs su gyur pa ltar /
NK085(ru)002:1176: dus gsum spyod lam bzhir bla ma la yang de ltar bya bas na rgyun du bsam zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1177: sku yi dam tshig spyir bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1178: bsrung rim 'chad bzhin shes par bya //
NK085(ru)002:1179: zhes pa ste gong du bsrung thabs mdor bstan nas /
NK085(ru)002:1180: bsrung ba'i rim pa rgyas par bshad pa ni grogs
NK085(ru)002:1181: po dang mtshungs par 'og nas 'chad pa bzhin shes
NK085(ru)002:1183: mched kyi dam tshig la gnyis kyi mched du 'brel ba'i bye brag la lnga'i dang po /
NK085(ru)002:1185: mtha' yas sems can rang rig phyir //
NK085(ru)002:1186: zhes pa ste 'jig rten gyi khams dang nang bcud
NK085(ru)002:1187: kyi sems can la mthar thug pa med pas mtha'
NK085(ru)002:1188: yas zhes bya / sems dngos po dang bral ba
NK085(ru)002:1189: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba las 'khrul pas gcig
NK085(ru)002:1190: la gnyis su mthong ste brtags pa la can zhes
NK085(ru)002:1191: yas zhes bya / bya'o // de dag rten kyi
NK085(ru)002:1192: gang zag gi mched du gyur pa'i rig pa ni
NK085(ru)002:1193: gnyis ste dang po gsang sngags ltar na rang rig
NK085(ru)002:1194: yas zhes bya / bya'o // phyir / gang yang bdag las gzhan min dang //
NK085(ru)002:1195: ces pa drug gi 'gro ba thams cad rang rig
NK085(ru)002:1196: nyid ma 'gags pa de dag du snang zhing rang
NK085(ru)002:1197: rig nyid du gcig pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:1198: gang yang zhes pa 'gro ba drug thams cad rang
NK085(ru)002:1199: gi sems rang rig las ma gtogs pa gzhan du
NK085(ru)002:1200: grub pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med pas bdag
NK085(ru)002:1203: bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing /
NK085(ru)002:1204: skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang zhes pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1205: rgyu yi theg pa'i gtan tshigs ni bder gshegs snying
NK085(ru)002:1206: por spun yin phyir zhes pas khams gsum pa thams
NK085(ru)002:1207: cad la bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po chos nyid
NK085(ru)002:1208: kyis ma khyab pa med pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1209: 'gro ba'i 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas rgyu //
NK085(ru)002:1211: bde gshegs snying pos 'gro kun yongs la khyab ces pas so //
NK085(ru)002:1212: des na 'gro ba gang yang sangs rgyas su rung bar bstan to /
NK085(ru)002:1213: gtan tshigs gnyis kyis 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin mtshungs pas spun yin pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:1214: ma 'ong sangs rgyas rang bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:1215: zhes pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'gro ba thams
NK085(ru)002:1216: cad sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa yin
NK085(ru)002:1217: no // don de nyid la ni spyi'i mched ces bya ste byams pa dang snying rje'i yul lo //
NK085(ru)002:1219: sangs rgyas chos zhugs ring ba dang //
NK085(ru)002:1221: nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa'i chos kyis sgor zhugs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1222: de nas skyabs gnas dam pa gcig pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1223: sems kyi phugs bdag med la bca' ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1224: 'khor 'das gnyis spang bsgrub kyi bsam pa can du mthun pas mched yin yang /
NK085(ru)002:1225: gsang sngags la bltos pas ring ba zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1227: lta spyod mthun par nye bar bshad //
NK085(ru)002:1228: ces pa lta bas mnyam pa nyid kyi don ston par mthun pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1229: spyod pa blang dor med par mthun pa ni gsang
NK085(ru)002:1230: sngags chud pa ste gong gi ring ba la bltos
NK085(ru)002:1232: dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud nas dang po 'jug pa'i sgo dang /
NK085(ru)002:1233: bar du bsgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)002:1234: tha ma grub pa'i 'bras bu thams cad gcig pas zhes pas so //
NK085(ru)002:1236: pha gcig dam tshig gang 'dres na //
NK085(ru)002:1237: zhes pas pha ni don ston par byed pa'i rdo
NK085(ru)002:1238: rje slob dpon te gcig gi spyan sngar dbang dang
NK085(ru)002:1240: man ngag 'bogs pa gsum gyi gnas skabs kyis dkyil
NK085(ru)002:1241: 'khor gcig dam tshig dus gcig thob pas nang 'dres
NK085(ru)002:1242: na / tshe skabs kyi don ste de dag gi
NK085(ru)002:1243: dus skabs na tshul mtshon pa'i dpe bstan pa ni
NK085(ru)002:1244: na / / spyi'i mched de nang mtshan bzhin zhes
NK085(ru)002:1245: pa spyi'i mched kyi dpes ni rgyus gcig gi mtshan
NK085(ru)002:1246: na nang mtshan bzang po bzhin du bskur ste byams
NK085(ru)002:1247: pa dang snying rje'i gzhi bzung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1248: tshad med bzhis don bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1249: tha na sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bden pa dang ldan pa'i smon lam 'debs pa la sogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1250: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1251: thams cad bdag nyid kyi bu dang 'dra bar nyes na bcos pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1252: legs pa'i lam bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1253: byas pa thams cad bar chad med par 'grub cing
NK085(ru)002:1254: mthar phyin par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab po
NK085(ru)002:1255: zhes so // zhang tshan zhes pa ring ba'i mched
NK085(ru)002:1256: kyi dpe ste yang myes spun lta bu la sogs
NK085(ru)002:1257: pa'i zhang tshan bzang po bdun ma gcig par bya
NK085(ru)002:1258: zhes so // ba dang / srog srid rgya skyong
NK085(ru)002:1259: ste thams cad dang mthun cing 'jam bar bya ba
NK085(ru)002:1260: ltar 'dir chos sgor zhugs pa tsam la chos dang
NK085(ru)002:1261: 'gal ba'i las mi bya zhing bstan pa gcig du
NK085(ru)002:1262: zhes so // ba dang / skyob ste / de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1263: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa tsam la gnas pa la nang mthun pa la dbyen mi bskyal /
NK085(ru)002:1264: mi mthun pa la ris mi gzung /
NK085(ru)002:1265: rtsod pa can la zur mi gsos zhes pa la sogs pa gsung ba bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:1266: pha spun zhes pa nye ba'i mched kyi dpe nye
NK085(ru)002:1267: ba spun bzang po ni dgra phyogs gcig na btul
NK085(ru)002:1268: gnyen phyogs gcig na skyong ba dang 'dra bar /
NK085(ru)002:1269: 'dir lta spyod mthun pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis
NK085(ru)002:1270: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig dang mi 'gal bar byas
NK085(ru)002:1271: na 'khor ba'i dmag dpung tshogs shing 'das pa'i phyogs
NK085(ru)002:1272: dar ba ste / dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1273: dgongs pa can la 'phyas mi gdags //
NK085(ru)002:1274: dge ba can gyi thugs mi dkrug ces so //
NK085(ru)002:1275: spun bas kyang zhes pa 'dres pa'i mched kyi dpe ste /
NK085(ru)002:1276: dper na pha gcig gi bu ni gcig gi dgra kun btul ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1277: rgyun kun gyis bskyang ba dang yo byad thun mong du byed pa ltar /
NK085(ru)002:1278: rdo rje slob dpon gcig la dam tshig dus gcig tu mnos pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1279: da ni bzung ste sangs rgyas pa'i bar du mi 'bral bas grogs po dam pa yin te /
NK085(ru)002:1280: des na dgos pa la bab na srog gis kyang 'thud par lta bur bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1281: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1282: mched lcam la khyad par du brtse gdung gi gzhi
NK085(ru)002:1283: bzung ste mi 'bral cing log pa'i lam bkag cing
NK085(ru)002:1284: pa'i lam bkag cing dge ba la bskul ba dang
NK085(ru)002:1285: / 'bras bu dus gcig thob pa'i smon lam gdab ces so //
NK085(ru)002:1286: bsrung thabs thun mong ba la gsum gyi lus kyi
NK085(ru)002:1287: sgo nas drug gi dang po mchod sbyin gyi sgo
NK085(ru)002:1288: nas mnyes par bya ba ni lus kyi zas nor
NK085(ru)002:1289: mnyes bya la / sbur ma lta bur 'phang ba med //
NK085(ru)002:1291: 'di yang rten gi gang zag sngon du bstan la /
NK085(ru)002:1292: slob dpon mched gnyis sku'i dam tshig ste lus kyi bsrung ba shes che la /
NK085(ru)002:1293: ngag yid gnyis kyi de'i grogs su bstan pas sku'i dam tshig ste de ni yul lo //
NK085(ru)002:1294: bsrung ba'i tshul ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas 'chad pa bzhin te /
NK085(ru)002:1295: rten lus kyi kha zas kyi bye brag dang /
NK085(ru)002:1296: nor gyi bye brag rnams kyis yul mnyes pa'i thabs
NK085(ru)002:1297: gang yin pa byas pa la ni mnyes byas zhes
NK085(ru)002:1298: so // gsang ba'i snying po las /
NK085(ru)002:1299: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
NK085(ru)002:1300: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces
NK085(ru)002:1301: dang yid 'thad 'bul zhes pa la sogs pa rgyud
NK085(ru)002:1302: thams cad la rgyas par 'byung ngo //
NK085(ru)002:1303: de dag kyang ser snas ma gos pa /
NK085(ru)002:1304: khro len nas sbur ma lta bur 'phangs med pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1305: gnyis pa zhabs 'breng bya ba'i tshul yang /
NK085(ru)002:1306: gdan bting zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1307: bla ma dang grogs dam pa la bzhugs sa gar dgos la gdan bting ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1308: 'dam rdzab dang chu 'phrang la khur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1309: btsogs khong su zhabs 'breng thams cad bsdus te gzim mal dang /
NK085(ru)002:1311: gshegs bzhud kyi grogs dang na bza' gsol gshegs la sogs pa thams cad do //
NK085(ru)002:1312: de lta bu'i las kyi bya ba ci byed kyang /
NK085(ru)002:1313: rang don gyi sgo na sa bla ma mnyes pa'i
NK085(ru)002:1314: thabs gcig pu las ma gtogs pa barloma pa dang
NK085(ru)002:1315: 'khengs sems gtan med pa ni stan gyi tha ma
NK085(ru)002:1316: bzhin no // dang du blang bar bya zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:1317: ngo so'am drin che ba lta bu ma yin par
NK085(ru)002:1318: yul gnyis kyi zhabs 'bring rnams zhe thag pa nas
NK085(ru)002:1319: rang gnyer gyis dang du blang pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1320: bla ma'i nye 'khor la blta tshul ni /
NK085(ru)002:1321: bla ma'i nye 'khor zhes pa khyim pa lta bu
NK085(ru)002:1322: ni bu tsha'i rigs rgyud dang khyim bral na thugs
NK085(ru)002:1324: de bzhin zhes pas bla ma bzhin nam yang na grogs po de bzhin du zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1325: gnang ba med pa'i nor rdzas mi blang ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:1326: nor rdzas blang ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1327: bla mas ma gnang bar nor rdzas kyi bye brag rnams 'dod zhen gyis blang na /
NK085(ru)002:1328: rten gnyen bas rnam smin shin tu che ste /
NK085(ru)002:1329: ngan song kha brgyud pa'i phyir tha na til 'bru tsam la yang mi 'bag ste /
NK085(ru)002:1330: grogs la'ang de dang mtshungs so //
NK085(ru)002:1331: bla ma'i gdan la sogs la spyad pa'i nyes pa ni mal gos zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1332: gzims bzhugs gnyis kyi chas dang /
NK085(ru)002:1334: chas ste gdugs dung la sogs pa lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:1338: rta dang btsun mo lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:1339: de dag bgom par mi bya ba ni bsrung tshul lo //
