NK085(ru)002:1340: bgoms na ci nyes she na mchod rten bshigs pa dang 'dra bar gsungs /
NK085(ru)002:1341: zhes pas de nyid nye ba lnga yi gcig ste de dang nyes pa mnyam zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:1342: gar gsungs na dgongs pa 'dus pa dang gsang ba'i spyi rgyud las so //
NK085(ru)002:1343: dman pa'i spyod pa lnga yang spang bar bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1344: brdeg bsad rku 'phrog spyod pa ni //
NK085(ru)002:1345: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1346: brdeg pa ni mtshon cha dang tshog dbyug dang thal mo dang khu tshur lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:1347: bsad pa ni srog gi 'tsho ba dang phral ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1349: 'phrog pa ni dngos su btsan thabs so //
NK085(ru)002:1351: las dag dngos su bya ba ni ci smros kyi
NK085(ru)002:1352: rtse mo'am ku re tsam gyi las su bya ba
NK085(ru)002:1353: min ste shin du spangs bar bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:1354: grogs po la yang mtshungs so //
NK085(ru)002:1355: lus kyi las de dag kyang slob dpon nyid kyi 'phra rgyas su gsal ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:1356: lus kyi bsrung ba'ang brdeg sogs las /
NK085(ru)002:1357: mthong smad tsam du bya ba min /
NK085(ru)002:1359: gsang ba'i snod du dug mi spyod //
NK085(ru)002:1360: ces pa ste yum la barlama pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1361: 'gro ba drang po'i phyogs spangs zhes pas rgyab kyi g.yon phyogs su 'gro ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1362: gdan sa gdan sogs mi barlama pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1363: 'gro 'dug ces pas bla ma bzhengs na rang 'dug pa ma yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1364: ngan spyod spang zhes pas snabs lud dang gshang ci
NK085(ru)002:1365: la sogs pa bla mas gzigs sar mi bya ba
NK085(ru)002:1366: dang / bla ma'i spyan sngar rgyan 'byed pa ste sgeg chos spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1367: ze'u lder ste gdugs mi dbub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1368: skye bo ma rabs kyi spyod pa kun spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1369: spyod lam thams cad du bla ma la bag zon che bar bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1370: bkur sti'i mchog bya bar bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:1371: don de nyid dam tshig bkod pa las kyang bla
NK085(ru)002:1372: ma mnyes pa'i thabs sgo gsum gyi bya ba rgyas
NK085(ru)002:1373: par gsungs pas de ltar blta bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1374: ngag gi sgo nas bsrungs thabs ni ngag gis skyon sba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1375: brten ngag gi sgo nas bla ma dang mched la skyon yod na thabs cis kyang sba ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1376: yon tan gzhan la bsgrag par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1377: bla ma dang grogs po'i tshul zhes pa 'dra snang ste /
NK085(ru)002:1378: gzigs pa dang bzhud pa dang gsung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1380: skyon gyi tshogs mngon nam sbags su brjod pa ni nyams par 'gyur bas spang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1381: skyon med pa la btags pa'i sgro dang /
NK085(ru)002:1382: yon tan yod kyang bcas pa'i bskur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1383: sogs khongs su skyon brjod pa'i bye brag thams cad
NK085(ru)002:1384: brjod pa'i mtshan nyid dag dngos su bya ba lta
NK085(ru)002:1385: ci smos kyi bre mo'am ku re tsam du yang
NK085(ru)002:1387: yang thil gyis brjod pa lta ci smos te zur
NK085(ru)002:1388: tsam yang mi bya ba ni ngag gis bsrung ba'i
NK085(ru)002:1389: tshul lo // de nyid kyang 'phra rgyas 'byed pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1390: rdzun dang 'phra ma ngag rtsub dang //
NK085(ru)002:1391: 'khyal pa nam yang mi bya ste //
NK085(ru)002:1392: be phog ma yin rta gad dor //
NK085(ru)002:1393: rkog tu tshul brjod nyams par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)002:1394: yon tan brjod cing snyan par smra //
NK085(ru)002:1395: ca co la sogs ma yin pa zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1396: yid kyi bsrung ba ni yid kyis g.yo sgyu 'phrag dog dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1397: rten yid kyi sgo nas bla ma dang grogs la
NK085(ru)002:1398: g.yo dang sgyu dang bdag 'thob par 'dod pa'i 'phrag
NK085(ru)002:1399: dog dang / yul gnyis dman par 'dod pa'i rngan sems dang dpyas gdag pa'i sems dang /
NK085(ru)002:1400: nor la skam chags kyii sems rnams tha na yun
NK085(ru)002:1401: thung ba se gol tsam gyi yun du'ang mi bya
NK085(ru)002:1403: dad pas mi phyed pas shin tu gdung zhing phan
NK085(ru)002:1404: 'dogs pa'i ngos nas brtse bar bya zhes pas sems
NK085(ru)002:1407: chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //
NK085(ru)002:1408: phrag dog dug lnga'i sems mi bya //
NK085(ru)002:1409: ngan du mi sems lci bar sems //
NK085(ru)002:1410: pha ma yi dam 'dra bar sems //
NK085(ru)002:1411: rtag tu gdung ba rgyun mi bcad //
NK085(ru)002:1412: byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin //
NK085(ru)002:1414: de dag dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mi nyams par bsrung ba ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
NK085(ru)002:1415: 'di dag dus skabs gang gi tshe rgyud la ci ltar ldan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1416: zag bcas dang po'i dus su gnyen po go cha bgos nas bsrung ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1417: sbyor lam la nye nas chu gzhol phyogs su 'bab
NK085(ru)002:1418: pa bzhin brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid du zhugs
NK085(ru)002:1419: so // zag med nas mthar lam gyi bar du sems nyid du rtogs la /
NK085(ru)002:1420: nyes pas ma gos pa nyid gang nas gang du stobs su gyur pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1422: 'dun pa nas bzungs las rung ba'i bar du de las ltos dgos so zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1423: bla med snying por 'gro ba'i grogs zhes pas las dang po nas mtha' lam gyi bar du'o //
NK085(ru)002:1424: yon tan gyi ngos nas zhabs bsdu ba ni spyod lam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1425: bla ma dang grogs po mnyes pa'i thabs kyi spyod
NK085(ru)002:1426: lam gyis dngos po rnams de bzhin du nyams su
NK085(ru)002:1427: blang ba dang / gzhan yang mnyes pa'i thabs zas dang nor dang lus 'bul ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1428: dad pa dang shes rab dang bsgrub pa la sogs
NK085(ru)002:1429: su ci byas kyang bla ma dang grogs mnyes par
NK085(ru)002:1430: byed cing bka'i thil gcog pa lta bu ga la'ang
NK085(ru)002:1431: srid de / zur tsam yang mi gcog pa'i rnal
NK085(ru)002:1432: 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rgyud la zhugs
NK085(ru)002:1433: pa las 'khor bar phyir ldog par rgyal ba kun
NK085(ru)002:1434: du bzang pos ma gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:1435: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1436: dam tshig ma nyams par bsrungs na kun du bzang
NK085(ru)002:1437: po dang skal pa mnyam pa yin no zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:1438: dang / gsang ba'i snying po las /
NK085(ru)002:1439: bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs //
NK085(ru)002:1441: 'on kyang theg pa chen po ni gnang bkag gi bye brag gis bsrung ba yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:1442: bka' bcag kyang mi sto ba'i skabs ni dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1443: bdud dang bar chod slob dpon gyi cha byad du byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1446: gdon dbang du song ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1447: legs pa'i lam la 'gog cing dge ba'i gegs byed de sdig pa'i las la bskul ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1448: bka' bden par mi ston cing mu stegs dang log
NK085(ru)002:1449: pa'i phyogs ston par byed na bka' bcag pa mi
NK085(ru)002:1451: grogs po yang dkar po la smad cing nag po la bstod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1452: dad pa can gyi tshogs gcog cing /
NK085(ru)002:1453: dge ba can gyi thugs dkrug pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1454: bka' dang dam tshig las 'gal zhing mched la brtse gdung med cing 'khu ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1455: chos la mi dad cing dge ba la mi gus na bka' bcag pa mi sto ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1456: don des na bla ma ni yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa ba'am gzhi yin gyi /
NK085(ru)002:1457: grogs po ni yon tan thams cad bsgrub pa'i grogs yin pas sku yi dam tshig gal che ste /
NK085(ru)002:1459: rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya //
NK085(ru)002:1460: byang chub stan pa'i 'dren pa po //
NK085(ru)002:1462: nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skem yin zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1463: mched kyang rdo rje mched dang lcam bral ni /
NK085(ru)002:1464: bla med byang chub 'gro ba'i spun //
NK085(ru)002:1465: chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthun //
NK085(ru)002:1466: byang chub rig 'dzin sar nges pas //
NK085(ru)002:1469: slob ma go 'phang mchog brnyes kyang //
NK085(ru)002:1470: sems can gnas pa'i bla ma bkur //
NK085(ru)002:1471: lha yi sku 'bum sgom pas kyang //
NK085(ru)002:1472: bla ma mchod pa'i char mi nye //
NK085(ru)002:1473: zhes gal che bar gdam pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1474: gsung gi dam tshig la bzhis bstan pa'i dang po sngags gsum ni 'chad bskyed dang /
NK085(ru)002:1475: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1476: 'dir yi dam gyi lha yi sku la brten te
NK085(ru)002:1477: ngag gi las la shes che bas ni gsung dam
NK085(ru)002:1479: de yang rten gyi gang zag ni gong du ston la /
NK085(ru)002:1480: yul sngags gsum dang phyag rgya bzhi 'ched pa 'di nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:1481: rtsa ba ni rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags ste gzhi'i snying po'o //
NK085(ru)002:1484: lha rnams kyi mi sngags so //
NK085(ru)002:1485: bskyed dang zhes pa sngags brjod pa'i rkyen gyis lha'i
NK085(ru)002:1486: sku bskyed pa ste 'dir na h'u ha he phata
NK085(ru)002:1487: dang sngags brjod pa nyid kyis lha'i sku bskyed pa
NK085(ru)002:1488: thams cad do // las sngags ni thugs dam bskul
NK085(ru)002:1489: bas 'phrin las su gyur pa ste b+h+yi sha badz+ra
NK085(ru)002:1490: kro d+has khro bo 'chol ba spros pa dang ta
NK085(ru)002:1491: ka ha na da ha pa tsa la sogs gzhan
NK085(ru)002:1492: yang thugs dam bskul ba'i tshig thams cad kyis ni
NK085(ru)002:1493: byed pa'i tshig de gang zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:1495: de nyid bstan pa'i dam tshig las dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1496: gzhung 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK085(ru)002:1497: las zhes pa 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK085(ru)002:1498: chos ni gsung chos kyi phyag rgya dang bsdus pa'i
NK085(ru)002:1499: don ni sku nyid phyag rgya chen po dang bzhi'o
NK085(ru)002:1500: // de la sku'i phyag rgya bshad pa la'ang bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:1501: ma skyes pa chos kyi sku dang /
NK085(ru)002:1503: de la ma skyes pa ni chos kyi sku mtshan ma'i spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:1504: de yang chos thams cad la rgyas theb shing mi 'da' bas phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1505: ma 'gag pa gzugs kyi sku la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:1506: 'bras bu lhun grub bder gshegs kyi sku dang /
NK085(ru)002:1507: lam pas bsgrub byeed kyi gzugs sku'o //
NK085(ru)002:1508: de la 'bras bu lhun grub ni longs sku dang
NK085(ru)002:1509: sprul sku'i bye brag zhi khro mtha' yas pa sku
NK085(ru)002:1510: phyag rgya'i rnam par snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1512: ting 'dzin dag pa'i gzugs sku rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1513: mtshon par byed pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sku'o //
NK085(ru)002:1518: rdul mtshon gyi dkyil 'khor rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:1519: gsung chos kyi phyag rgya la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:1520: ma skyes pa gsung chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK085(ru)002:1522: ma skyes pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo
NK085(ru)002:1523: bo nyid chos sku spros pa dang bral ba nyid
NK085(ru)002:1526: brjod bya don gyi gsung dang /
NK085(ru)002:1527: brjod byed tshig gi gsung ngo //
NK085(ru)002:1528: don ni phyi nang gi chos thams cad brda' sprod
NK085(ru)002:1529: par byed pa yi ge 'khor lo'i 'phring bar gnas
NK085(ru)002:1530: pa'i phyir ming gi mtshan nyid kyis so so'i nus
NK085(ru)002:1531: pa mi 'gag par brda' sprod par byed pa'i phyir
NK085(ru)002:1532: gsung chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bsnyad do //
NK085(ru)002:1535: sbyong byed lam gyi gsung ngo //
NK085(ru)002:1536: 'bras bu'i gsung ni chos kyi sku'i gsung nam mkha' lta bu la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK085(ru)002:1538: bsam pa chos kyi phyag rgya yig 'bru bsgom pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1539: rgyu yi yi ge dang thugs ka nas sgom pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:1540: brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya ngag gi las thams cad de sngags brjod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1543: de ni sngags gsum gyi khongs su yang 'gro bas
NK085(ru)002:1544: sngags dang phyag rgya 'brel ba nyid gsung gi dam
NK085(ru)002:1545: mo // thugs dam tshig la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:1547: sbyong byed lam gyi thugs so //
NK085(ru)002:1552: de la ma skyes pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
NK085(ru)002:1553: ma 'gag pa ni me long lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:1556: dbyer med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
NK085(ru)002:1558: bsam pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bca' ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK085(ru)002:1559: mtshon byed dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1560: bsam pa ni thugs ye shes sems dpa' dang /
NK085(ru)002:1562: bca' ba ni 'khor lo la sogs pa gang dang gang bca' ba'i dngos gzhi nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:1564: rdo rje dril bu dang phur bu la sogs pa bcang ba rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:1565: gong du de ltar ma skyes pa la sku gsung
NK085(ru)002:1566: thugs kyi dbye bar bstan pa ni mtha' dang bral
NK085(ru)002:1567: ba'i ngo bo chos thams cad kyi dngos gzhi rang
NK085(ru)002:1568: bzhin du gnas pa'i ngos nas chos sku de nyid
NK085(ru)002:1569: go mi 'gag pa'i ngos nas nam mkha' lta bu'i
NK085(ru)002:1570: gsung rig pa yul bral rang byung ye shes su
NK085(ru)002:1571: snang ba'i ngos nas rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong
NK085(ru)002:1572: chen ste chos dbyings ye shes so //
NK085(ru)002:1573: 'phro 'du 'phrin las kyi phyag rgya ni mi 'gag
NK085(ru)002:1574: pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ma skyes pa dang
NK085(ru)002:1575: mi sbyar te / de yang 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK085(ru)002:1576: gdul bya lam pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1578: rtag pa rgyun du thugs rje skye ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1579: rang bzhin shugs kyis skye ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1580: yul dang phrad na skye ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1581: bskul zhing gsol ba btab pas thugs rjes skye ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1582: gdul bya'i phyag rgya la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:1583: bsam pa las kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK085(ru)002:1585: bsam pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du ste /
NK085(ru)002:1589: bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa'i thugs rgyud bskul /
NK085(ru)002:1590: sems can gyi don byas pa la sogs pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:1591: bca' ba ni dngos su lus kyi 'gyur stangs dang /
NK085(ru)002:1592: lag pa'i bca' bar phyag rgya gang dang gang bca' ba'i dus su g.yas su gsum bstod /
NK085(ru)002:1595: de nas dngos po bcing mkha' la dkrol /
NK085(ru)002:1596: snying khar bsdu ba dang bzhi /
NK085(ru)002:1598: 'phyo ba'i tshul dang drug 'phrugs su byas pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:1599: de dag gi 'phro 'dus bdag gzhan gyi don thams cad bsgrub pa ni las so //
NK085(ru)002:1600: de yang phrin las bzhi lhun grub dang lnga /
NK085(ru)002:1601: gnas skabs kun tu sbyar bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1602: de ltar gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos thams cad phyag rgya bzhir bsdu /
NK085(ru)002:1603: de rang rig dang dbyer med par rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1604: de dag las mi 'da' bar bya ba ni bsgrub
NK085(ru)002:1605: pa dam pa yin pa'i phyir gsung gi dam tshig
NK085(ru)002:1607: spyir phyag rgya'i nges tshig ni mi 'gyur ba'i don dang /
NK085(ru)002:1610: 'chang ba'i don du shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1611: yang snang ba thams cad sku phyag rgya chen po /
NK085(ru)002:1612: rang bzhin med pa'i gsung chos kyi phyag rgya /
NK085(ru)002:1613: dbyer med pa thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK085(ru)002:1614: bya ba byed pa las kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1615: de ltar rnal 'byor pa'i rigs pa las gsal ba ni phya rgya bzhi dbyer med pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1616: de yang 'dir nyin nyams su len na /
NK085(ru)002:1617: rtog pa'i blo can gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi skabs
NK085(ru)002:1618: su lha yi sku bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po
NK085(ru)002:1619: yig 'bru bsgom pa dang sngags brjod pa gsung chos
NK085(ru)002:1620: kyi phyag rgya / thugs mtshan bsgom pa dang thugs
NK085(ru)002:1621: ka na bsgom pa thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya
NK085(ru)002:1622: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'du thams cad 'phrin las
NK085(ru)002:1623: kyi phyag rgya / kyi phyag rgya'o // de dag
NK085(ru)002:1624: gi bsgrub tshul ni rang gi sgo gsum yi dam
NK085(ru)002:1625: gyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1626: rnal 'byor pa rang gi lus ngag yid gsum yi
NK085(ru)002:1627: dam gyi lha yi sku gsung thugs su sngags gsum
NK085(ru)002:1628: dang phyag rgya bzhir dbyer med par sbyar la /
NK085(ru)002:1629: dus gsum du spyod lam bzhir rtag tu yang dang
NK085(ru)002:1630: yang du ting nge 'dzin gyi bzlas pa byed pa
NK085(ru)002:1631: dang / sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa ni bla
NK085(ru)002:1632: na med pa'i 'bras bu'i gzungs kyis zin pa yin
NK085(ru)002:1633: dang / la / phyir mi ldog nges pas zhugs pa'i yin zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1634: thun gyi tshad bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1635: rab kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1636: rab kyi ya rab kyis chu bo'i gzhung bzhin bar 'tshams med par bsgrub pa'am /
NK085(ru)002:1637: rab kyi 'bring gis nyin gsum mtshan gsum ste thun drug gam /
NK085(ru)002:1638: rab kyi tha mas nyin gcig ste zhal gcig la lan gcig bsgom pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1639: de yang yid ting nge 'dzin la ma yengs pa
NK085(ru)002:1640: tsam gyis ngang gis bzlas zhes pas rgyun du ma
NK085(ru)002:1641: yengs par bya ba dam tshig gi man ngag go
NK085(ru)002:1642: // 'bring gis zhes pa 'bring gi rab kyis zla
NK085(ru)002:1643: ba gcig la dus drug ste gsum gyi thog du
NK085(ru)002:1646: yang na tshes gcig gnam stong nyi shu dgu zhes 'chad do //
NK085(ru)002:1647: 'bring gi tha mas dus bzhi zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:1648: gsum gyi thog tu nyi shu dagu'am tshes gcig bstan
NK085(ru)002:1649: pas gnas skabs der bsgrub pa la bar chad par
NK085(ru)002:1650: mi bya ba la ci zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1651: rnal 'byor tha ma ni brtson 'grus la sogs pa gong ma gnyis las zhan pas /
NK085(ru)002:1652: le lo dang nga rgyal chung ba la dpya' ba zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:1653: de nyid bsgrub pa la zhan pas gzhan gyis dpya' bar yang gyur pas so //
NK085(ru)002:1654: de ltar bu'i rnal 'byor bas zla re 'am zhes
NK085(ru)002:1655: pa tha ma'i rab kyis zla ba re re la
NK085(ru)002:1656: lan re'am / yang na tha ma'i 'bring gis rab bzhi ste lo gcig la lan bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:1657: de lta bu'i dus tshigs dag tu yi dam gyi
NK085(ru)002:1658: sgom bsgrub la brtson par 'bad pa ni gsung gi
NK085(ru)002:1659: dam tshig bsrung ba'i thabs so //
NK085(ru)002:1660: de ltar mi byed nas khas blangs nas 'phyal bar
NK085(ru)002:1661: bor ba ni byang chub sa bon brlan pa yin
NK085(ru)002:1662: / zhes pa rang gi byang chub sa bon rang gis brlag pa yin te /
NK085(ru)002:1663: khas blangs nas 'das pa'i nyes pa rang rgyud gtan brlag pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1664: dper na sa bon btab nas lad yur dang bsrung
NK085(ru)002:1665: bran ma byas pa mes bsreg pa dang mtshungs so
NK085(ru)002:1666: // 'o na bsrung dam la sngags dang phyag rgya
NK085(ru)002:1667: min pa gzhan ci yang mi dgos sam zhe na
NK085(ru)002:1668: // / 'grub byed kyi yan lag du dgos te /
NK085(ru)002:1669: gang zhe na tshogs dang zhes pa tshogs kyi mchod pa yan lag dang bcas /
NK085(ru)002:1670: de bzhin du zhes pa'ang phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad bsdus te /
NK085(ru)002:1671: de yang bsnyegs pa nyid dper blangs pas bsgom bzlas
NK085(ru)002:1672: rab chu bo'i rgyun la sogs pa dus bzhag rnams
NK085(ru)002:1673: smos pa de bzhin du tshogs gtor yang bya ba'o
NK085(ru)002:1674: // gzhan yang tha ma'i tha mas kyang lo zla mi 'ada'o //
NK085(ru)002:1675: zhes pas rnal 'byor pa g.yeng ba can gyis lo
NK085(ru)002:1676: re la zla ba re la zhag bdun la sogs
NK085(ru)002:1677: pa dam tshig gi rgyud nas smos pa bzhin du
NK085(ru)002:1678: 'bad pa dang / tshogs dang gtor ma'ang de dang mtshung pas so //
NK085(ru)002:1679: yang na tha ma ni 'byor pa chung ba'i gang
NK085(ru)002:1680: zag gis bsgrub pa gong gi rab 'bring smos pa
NK085(ru)002:1681: rnams ci ltar nyams su blangs kyang tshogs lo mi
NK085(ru)002:1682: 'da' ste / lo gcig la lan re /
NK085(ru)002:1683: gtor ma zla ba re la yang mi 'da' ba zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1684: spyir gsung gi dam tshig 'grub byed kyi yan lag
NK085(ru)002:1685: la tshogs dang sbyin sreg gtor ma gsum smos pas
NK085(ru)002:1687: gsum dang bsrung ba rang gi ngo bo ni /
NK085(ru)002:1688: dus tshod smos pa rnams las ma 'das pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1689: rten gyi rgyud la ldan pa'i tshad ni zag bcas
NK085(ru)002:1690: kyi dus su brtson 'grus dang go chas ched du
NK085(ru)002:1692: zag med mi gtong ngo bo nyid kyis rgyud la ldan te /
NK085(ru)002:1693: chu dang gsher mi gtong ba bzhin yin kyang /
NK085(ru)002:1694: na 'phar zhing stobs su gyur pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1695: dus ni las dang po nas mthar lam gyi bar du'o //
NK085(ru)002:1696: de dag gi bya ba dang dus tshig rnams kyang /
NK085(ru)002:1697: dam tshig bkod pa las smos te /
NK085(ru)002:1698: rab kyis chu bo gzhung bzhin du bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1699: nyin mtshan dus drug tu bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1700: yang dus bzhi zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1701: tha ma zhag grangs bdun nam /
NK085(ru)002:1702: yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig gam zhes pas rgyas par ston to //
NK085(ru)002:1703: don de nyid ni 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i lam gyi rtsa gzhi yin te /
NK085(ru)002:1704: bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyar na /
NK085(ru)002:1705: yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1706: lha spang dge spyad don med 'gyur zhes pa la
NK085(ru)002:1707: sogs pa rgyas pa brgyad cu ba las gsungs so
NK085(ru)002:1708: // thugs kyi dam tshig la gnyis kyis gsang bya'i nga bo'i dang po /
NK085(ru)002:1709: spyir gsang bzhi nas lta zab zhes pa la sogs
NK085(ru)002:1710: ste lta ba zab mo ni chos mnyam pa nyid
NK085(ru)002:1711: kyi don theg pa 'og ma'i yul du ma gyur
NK085(ru)002:1712: pa / nam mkha' che las bsam brjod las 'das par bstan pa lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:1713: spyod pa ni bdag gzhan gyi don du mi 'gags pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1714: barlanga po ni mo rigs sbyor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1715: pho rigs sgrol ba la sogs pa nang pa'i lta sgom gyis bdag gzhan gyi don du 'gyur zhing /
NK085(ru)002:1716: de theg don blo la mi shong bas mi mos pa 'di yi dkyus su 'chad pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:1717: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1718: rnal 'byor sngags kyi spyod pa dag /chos ma mthong ba lta ci smos //
NK085(ru)002:1719: dam ma 'dres pa rnams la yang //
NK085(ru)002:1720: zur yang bstan par mi bya zhing //
NK085(ru)002:1721: dngos su bstan pa ci smos kyi //
NK085(ru)002:1722: tshig gi zur du'ang gleng mi bya //
NK085(ru)002:1724: lha zhes pa yi dam gyi lha ste /
NK085(ru)002:1725: de yang gsung dam ni nyams su blang ba'i ngos yin la /
NK085(ru)002:1726: 'dir ni de gsang bya'i yul gyi grangs so //
NK085(ru)002:1727: de gsum lta spyod sgom gsum brtsi ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1728: ming ces pa gsang mtshan dang /
NK085(ru)002:1729: dbang dang bsgrub pa'i dus kyi yum gzugs ma dang /
NK085(ru)002:1730: bsgrub pa'i dus kyi rmi lam dang /
NK085(ru)002:1731: dngos su snang ba'i grub rtags rnams te bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:1732: 'di la gong ma la la dag lta ba zab mo dang /
NK085(ru)002:1734: yi dam gyi lha yi ming dang /
NK085(ru)002:1735: gzungs dang grub rtags gnyis gcig du brtsis pa dang bzhir bzhed skad de /
NK085(ru)002:1736: lung rgyud kyi dbye ba so so bas 'gal ba mi bsam mo //
NK085(ru)002:1737: des ni spyir gsang sngags su zhugs pa thams cad
NK085(ru)002:1738: kyis dus skabs thams cad du gsang bar bya ba'i
NK085(ru)002:1739: rnam pa'i grangs bzhi zhes ston pa rdo rje 'chang
NK085(ru)002:1740: gis lung rgyud thams cad du bshad do //
NK085(ru)002:1741: khyad par gsang ba bzhi ni bsgrub pa'i gnas dus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1742: mchog gi bsgrub pa dpal yang dag dang /
NK085(ru)002:1743: thun mong gi bsgrub pa bdud rtsi dang /
NK085(ru)002:1744: de la sogs pa'i che 'phra gang la yang /
NK085(ru)002:1747: grogs gang dang gang yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1748: rdzas gang dgos pa dang bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:1749: de yang gsang sngags gsang bas 'grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1750: gsang ba dam tshig yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1751: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar chad dgos pa'i ngos nas gsang ste /
NK085(ru)002:1752: sngon 'byung ma gsang pas bar chod gnas su zhugs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1755: rdzas ma grub pa la sogs pa'i lo rgyus kyang du ma gsungs /
NK085(ru)002:1756: des na brtson 'grus drag pos bzhi po rab tu gsang la bsgrub pa bskur bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1757: de bzhis ni bsgrub pa brtsam nas ma tshar gyi bar du gsang ba'i bar gsang zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1758: tshar nas ma zhugs kyi bar du gsang ba'i gzhi med pas rang gsang zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1759: gsang ba 'os pa'i rnam grangs ni /
NK085(ru)002:1760: gsang bar 'os pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1761: de yang mthong thos kyi chos rnams dang po ni /
NK085(ru)002:1762: 'dir grogs dang slob dpon nyid kyis gnyer gtad pa'i gsung med kyang /
NK085(ru)002:1763: gsang sngags su zhugs nas gsang bar 'os pa'i rnam
NK085(ru)002:1764: grangs rnams yang yang 'dir mdor bsdus te bstan na
NK085(ru)002:1765: dkyil 'khor dang nang gi mchod pa lnga la bsngosa
NK085(ru)002:1766: pa'i bza' btung gi bye brag rnams kyi phud de
NK085(ru)002:1767: rgyu lta bu dang gtor ma ni 'bras bu ste
NK085(ru)002:1769: khyad par gyi gtor ma la bsngosa pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1770: tshogs dag zhes pas tshogs kyi yo byad tshogs bca' ba dang bcas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1771: bsgrub pa la bsngosa pa'am go cha bzhis bsgral ba'i zhing tshogs dang /
NK085(ru)002:1772: mtshan dang ldan zhing yon tan 'byung nus pa'i b+han d+ha dang /
NK085(ru)002:1773: lha yi thugs kyi rten dkyil 'khor la bkod pa'i phur pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1774: mar me'i snod ni yang dag gi bsgrub pa la bkod pa'i skong bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:1775: rdzas ni bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas ste bam gyi dbang po lnga la sogs pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:1776: lag cha ni bsgrub pa'i dus su dgos pa'i rdo rje dril bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:1778: nyil le bzlog pa'i zhing lpags dang /
NK085(ru)002:1779: gtor ma gtong ba'i rnge'u chung dang de la sogs pa thams cad do //
NK085(ru)002:1780: 'o na dril bu dang rnge'u chung gnyis 'og du yang smos la /
NK085(ru)002:1781: 'dir yang smos pa ci zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:1782: 'dir ni mthong bya'i dbyibs gsang la /
NK085(ru)002:1783: 'og tu ni thob bya'i sgra gsang bas las gnyis smos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1784: dkyil 'khor ni bris pa dang bskod pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1785: rnams kyis ni gong ma rnams bsdus pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1786: yul ni las kyi kha lo bsgyur ba'i sa pa
NK085(ru)002:1787: bas de nyid so so las skyes pa'i skye bo
NK085(ru)002:1788: ste 'chad pa'i gsang ba'i yul rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:1789: des rnam pa thams cad du mthong bar longs su ma bya zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1790: sgra ni nang gi bsgrub pa la bsngosa pa'i dril bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:1791: ban d+he'i rnge'u chung sogs khong du rkang pa'i dung dang /
NK085(ru)002:1793: thod pa'i cha lang la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:1794: sgra thams cad skye bo zhes pa yul 'og ma nyid kyis thos pa yongs su mi brdung ste /
NK085(ru)002:1795: des na dgon pa yang grongs yul las dpag tshad dang rgyang grags kyis dben par gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:1796: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1797: rdzas dang lag cha la sogs dang //
NK085(ru)002:1798: phud dang gtor ma tshogs rnams dang //
NK085(ru)002:1799: phur pa me mar snod la sogs //
NK085(ru)002:1800: de dag mthong bar mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1801: rnga dang dril bu la sogs sgra //
NK085(ru)002:1802: skye bos thos par yong mi bya //
NK085(ru)002:1803: gang zhig nyan cing lta 'dod pa'i //
NK085(ru)002:1804: rdul phyag skyes bu'i phyag go zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1805: gnyen gtad pa ni grogs po zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1806: 'dir theg pa mchog la zhugs pa'i dus su dbang
NK085(ru)002:1807: la sogs pa dus gcig blangs pas kyang grogs po
NK085(ru)002:1808: la sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi 'bral ba'i kyang
NK085(ru)002:1809: grogs po ste / de dag gi spyod lam ngan
NK085(ru)002:1810: pa gzhan gyi tshor na mi mos pa rnams dang
NK085(ru)002:1811: grogs po ste / / gzhan yang skyon dang 'tshangs gzhan gyis tshor na /
NK085(ru)002:1812: yul de nyid la gnod par gyur pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)002:1813: spyir sems can kun gyi spyod tshul ngan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1815: kun la gnod pa'i ngan spyod ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:1816: 'gro ba rigs gang la'ang gnod par 'gyur ba'i las te /
NK085(ru)002:1817: rngon gyi bye brag rlubs dang /
NK085(ru)002:1818: thu dang snyi dang sa mda' la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1819: sems can gyi rigs gang dang gang bsad pa'i thabs
NK085(ru)002:1820: kyi sbyor ba rnams ni 'jig rten 'dir yang rigs
NK085(ru)002:1821: ngan gyi spyod pa yin la /
NK085(ru)002:1822: phyi ma ngan song du 'gro ba'i spyod pa yin
NK085(ru)002:1823: pas de dag shin tu gsang ba ni bla na
NK085(ru)002:1824: med pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gsang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1825: gnyer gtad pa ni zhes pa spyir gsang ba bcu spyi yang yin la /
NK085(ru)002:1826: sgos su bshad pa'i tha ma gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:1827: gzhan yang smras pa'i gal med de gzhan gnod par mi 'gyur yang /
NK085(ru)002:1828: bla ma dang mched kyis ma smra gsung na de gnyer gtad pa'i dam tshig dam pa yin te /
NK085(ru)002:1829: sngar sku yi dam tshig skabs su bshad pa'i slob
NK085(ru)002:1830: dpon dang mched rnams kyis mnyes gtad pa'i bsrung ba
NK085(ru)002:1831: la ni rnams kyis zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1832: gsang ba'i thabs la gsum gyi dang po /
NK085(ru)002:1833: gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te //
NK085(ru)002:1834: zhes pa la sogs pa theg pa mchog la skyon yod na gzhan gyis mthong thos mi rung bas /
NK085(ru)002:1835: gsang ba lta bu ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:1836: 'gro ba sems can rnams sbyangs ba chung blo zhan
NK085(ru)002:1837: de'i dbang gis gsang sngags kyi spyod pa barlanga po
NK085(ru)002:1838: rnams mthong na rang gi blo la mi shong bas
NK085(ru)002:1839: mi mos / de tsam du ma zad de bkur
NK085(ru)002:1840: pa btab ste yul khyad par can la bskur ba
NK085(ru)002:1841: btab pas rnam smin shin tu che bas dpyang thag
NK085(ru)002:1842: chad pa bzhin du ngan song du ltung ba'i phyir
NK085(ru)002:1843: mi mos / / de lta bu'i sems kyi don
NK085(ru)002:1844: gyi phyir rab tu gsang zhes pa ste gzhan don
NK085(ru)002:1845: mi mos / / no // bdag don du gsang
NK085(ru)002:1846: thub na gsang ba'i dam tshig la gnas pas dngos
NK085(ru)002:1847: grub mi yal ba'i dus su 'grub pa'i phyir dang
NK085(ru)002:1848: mi mos / / no // / yang dngos grub yal ba'i rgyu ni gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:1849: phyi bag chags rdul gyi gos pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1850: nang mtshan ma'i 'dzin rtogs skyes pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1851: de la gsang bya rnams yul rnams kyi mngon du gyur la /
NK085(ru)002:1852: de dag la dpyad ra dang 'phya slon dang /
NK085(ru)002:1853: tha snyad mang po 'dag pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1854: kun la ma yod pa'i brnyas sems dang 'phya sems byas pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:1855: dper na mdzod gting na yod pa'i nor mchog phyi rol du phyungs pas dri ma dang /
NK085(ru)002:1857: rdul gyis gos pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:1858: nang mtshan ma'i 'dzin rtog skyes pa ni bsgrub pa po nyid blo thag ma chod nas /
NK085(ru)002:1859: the tshom dang som nyis gsang gram pa'i rgyu byas
NK085(ru)002:1860: ste de nyid kyis dngos grub yal bas de las
NK085(ru)002:1861: bzlog pa'i phyir gsang bar gsungs pas dgos pa de'i
NK085(ru)002:1862: phyir gdam ngag zhes kyang bya /
NK085(ru)002:1863: brda' dag zhes kyang bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:1864: gsang ba'i gdam ngag gi phyir lus brda' dang ngag brda' la mi 'dra ba sna tshogs /
NK085(ru)002:1865: glog gi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams su ston pas gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:1866: yul ni ngam nyams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1867: sngags pa gar mnos te nang na 'dug kyang rtsa
NK085(ru)002:1868: ba dang yan lag spyi nyams pa dang rtsa ba
NK085(ru)002:1869: nyams pa dang / yan lag nyams pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1870: zlas nyams te nyams pa dang 'grogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1871: zhar nyams te nyams pa'i mgon byas pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1872: dam las log zhes pa gang dang gang nyams nas
NK085(ru)002:1873: kyang sngags pa'i tshul nas kyang log ste skye bo
NK085(ru)002:1875: dam med de dam tshig ma blangs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1876: des dkyil 'khor ma mthong zhing dbang ma thob ste
NK085(ru)002:1877: skye bo ni rgyu yi theg pa chen po'i bar
NK085(ru)002:1879: 'dres dang zhes pa thob cing ma nyams pa dang dbang dang dam tshig dus gcig mnos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1880: ma 'dres nas dam tshig dang ldan yang rang dang
NK085(ru)002:1881: dus gcig dbang thob pa ma yin pa lta bu'o
NK085(ru)002:1882: // thams cad ni gsang bya'i yul tsam bsdus pas la zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1883: 'di la lha rje yang kheng na re /
NK085(ru)002:1884: dam tshig ma nyams na rnam pa thams cad du gsang ba ma yin ste /
NK085(ru)002:1885: 'chad pa'i gsang thabs kyi nang kas 'dres nas nyams pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1886: yang rjes nas nyams pa'o gsung skad do //
NK085(ru)002:1887: 'on kyang de gnyis nas gong gi dam nyams kyi
NK085(ru)002:1888: khongs su 'dus pas des na dpyad pa rigs so
NK085(ru)002:1889: // thabs ni sems kyis bstan pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:1890: gsang bya'i ngo bo rnams sems kyi sgo nas yul gang la yang bstan par mi bsam zhing /
NK085(ru)002:1891: lus kyi sgo nas dngos po thams cad yul gang
NK085(ru)002:1892: la'ang thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas sba ba la
NK085(ru)002:1893: 'bad nas kyang ngag gi rdo rje lce yod kyang
NK085(ru)002:1894: / zhes pa thams cad mkhyen pa la mnga' ste /
NK085(ru)002:1895: 'khor ba'i chos ci ltar brjod kyang ye shes su
NK085(ru)002:1896: shar bas nyes pas mi gos pa ni rdo rje'i
NK085(ru)002:1897: lce ste / de lta bu'i dgongs pa yod kyang
NK085(ru)002:1898: gsang bya rnams brjod par bya ba dag du min
NK085(ru)002:1900: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis lta ga la brjod ces la dor ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:1901: de yang rten thun mong ba gong du bstan pa
NK085(ru)002:1902: des yul gsang ba bcu la tshul spyir gsang ba
NK085(ru)002:1903: dang / gnas skabs su gsang ba nyid kyis nyams su len pa ngo bo'o //
NK085(ru)002:1904: dus las dang po nas mthar lam gyi bar du'o //
NK085(ru)002:1905: rgyud la ldan pa'i tshul ni /
NK085(ru)002:1906: dang po'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsten pa'i sgo nas
NK085(ru)002:1907: bsrung ba nyid nyams pa dang bcas las thob nas
NK085(ru)002:1908: ched byas med par bsrung ba las ngo bo nyid
NK085(ru)002:1910: nyams pa gzhi bral ba nyid rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i bar du stobs su gyur pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1911: 'di yang dam tshig bskod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1912: kun bzang bka' dang nges pa'i lung //
NK085(ru)002:1913: gsang ba chen po bcu po dag /man ngag gzhan las mi spel ba //
NK085(ru)002:1914: de yang ngag lus sems rnams te //
NK085(ru)002:1915: lus kyi spyod pa barlanga po gsang //
NK085(ru)002:1916: ngag gis rdo rje'i lce yod kyang //
NK085(ru)002:1917: brjod pa dag tu bya ba min zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1918: 'o na ye mi bshad dam zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:1920: dbang bskur gnang ba gang thob nas //
NK085(ru)002:1921: snod dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la //
NK085(ru)002:1922: thabs kyis smra ba gang byed pa //
NK085(ru)002:1923: de ni bsrungs pa'i rim pa ste //
NK085(ru)002:1924: dngos grub 'bras bu chud mi za zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:1925: rtsa ba gsum spyi yi zhabs bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:1926: de dag rtsa ba bzhir bshad de //
NK085(ru)002:1927: zhes pa gang du smos pa'i bzhi po de dag
NK085(ru)002:1928: rtsa ba bcas pa 'bru gang du bshad pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:1929: pas grangs bzhir gang gis na kun du bzang pos
NK085(ru)002:1930: so // gang du na rgyud gzhung rnams te /
NK085(ru)002:1931: gsang snying las kyang rtsa ba zhes smos pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1932: dam tshig bkod pa las kyang /
NK085(ru)002:1934: 'di ma nyams na yan lag rnams shugs kyis tshang
NK085(ru)002:1935: ste gal te sgos su nyams pa yod kyang rtsa
NK085(ru)002:1936: ba'i stobs kyis shugs kyis bskongs par 'gyur ro zhes
NK085(ru)002:1937: 'chad do // de ltar rtsa ba'i bsrung thabs rgyas
NK085(ru)002:1938: par brten nas yan lag la gnyis kyi khyad par
NK085(ru)002:1939: la mdor bstan pa'i tshul gyis dam bca' ba ni
NK085(ru)002:1940: thun min yan lag bshad bya ba zhes pas nyan
NK085(ru)002:1941: thos dang yo ga'i bar gyi theg pa rnams kyis
NK085(ru)002:1942: spyod yul du ma gyur cing nang pa 'ba' zhig
NK085(ru)002:1943: gi smin pas thun min ste /
NK085(ru)002:1944: tshig nyid dngos su bstan pa yang thun mong gi yan lag rnams 'chad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1945: theg pa mchog phal gyi spyod yul ma yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:1946: bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs mdzad nyid dngos su snang ba ste snod dkon par bstan no //
NK085(ru)002:1947: yan lag ni rtsa ba'i shugs la 'di nyid grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1948: rtsa ba ma grub na med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1949: bsrung thub ma thub kyis yag nyes stobs chung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:1950: nyams kyang bskang sla bas na yan lag go //
NK085(ru)002:1951: de nyid 'chad pa'i nyid lag dang bcas pa'i sngar
NK085(ru)002:1952: byung ba la yang yan lag ces bya ste de
NK085(ru)002:1954: rgyas pa la lnga yi spyad pa'i dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)002:1955: de la yang mdor bstan pa ni sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1956: rdzun smra ngag barlanga spyod pa lnga //
NK085(ru)002:1957: zhes pa theg pa mchog gi lugs kyis thabs dang
NK085(ru)002:1958: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don nyid rtags su
NK085(ru)002:1959: sbyor ba dang / zhing bcu thugs rje'i zhing du
NK085(ru)002:1960: byas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi thar pa'i sa la
NK085(ru)002:1961: sbyor ba dang / sgrol ba dang / thugs rjes kun nas bslang ste zhing bcu'i nor dang /
NK085(ru)002:1962: gsang sngags kyi grub rdzas rnams gzhan gyis ma byin par thabs kyis 'phrin las kyis len pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1963: gsang ba bcu sbed pa'i thabs kyi rdzun dang /
NK085(ru)002:1964: log brtags can la mi bden pa'i rang rigs gang
NK085(ru)002:1965: du'ang ma grub cing cir yang snang ba'i rdzun smra
NK085(ru)002:1966: ba dang / bstan pa'i dgra dang /
NK085(ru)002:1967: slob dpon gyi sku dgra dang /
NK085(ru)002:1968: 'khor dang slob ma rnams zhi des kyis mi 'dul na ngag barlanga pa'i 'chos pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1969: lnga ni 'tshoms kyi yul lnga dang phrad pa'i dus
NK085(ru)002:1970: su dngos su nyams su blangs nas don bzhi'i phyir
NK085(ru)002:1972: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:1973: zhing bcu thugs rjes bzung nas /
NK085(ru)002:1974: gnas ting nges spor ba ni sgrol ba'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)002:1975: de ma yin pa srog la mi 'dzem pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:1976: snying rje dang bral ba ni dam nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:1977: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas bshad sgrol ba'i dam tshig la bdun gyi dang po /
NK085(ru)002:1978: rang bzhin lta bu'i sgrol ba ni rang bzhin gyi ni sbyor sgrol dang /
NK085(ru)002:1980: rang bzhin ni sems kyi chos nyid rgyu rkyen dang
NK085(ru)002:1981: bral zhing du ma med pa gzhan pa ngang gis
NK085(ru)002:1982: ma dmigs pa la ni rang zhes ste /
NK085(ru)002:1983: don de nyid byas chos dang bral ba gnas tshul
NK085(ru)002:1984: nyid dbri bsnan bral bar rigs pa la lhun gyis
NK085(ru)002:1985: grub pa ni bzhin zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:1986: gyi ni zhes pa byed pa'i tshig ste lcags kyi
NK085(ru)002:1987: s+t+wa re zhes pa ste rang bzhin zhes pas ngo
NK085(ru)002:1988: bo ston la / sbyor sgrol ni de nyid kyi las so //
NK085(ru)002:1989: 'dir a ti'i sbyor sgrol yang yin la /
NK085(ru)002:1990: lta ba'ang yin te snang srid kyi chos thams cad
NK085(ru)002:1991: rtogs pa'i ngo la rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings su
NK085(ru)002:1992: sbyor zhing / don de nyid kyis rtogs pa'i ngo
NK085(ru)002:1993: la gzung 'dzin ka nas dag pa la ni sgrol
NK085(ru)002:1994: sbyor zhing / ba zhes bya'o // don de nyid
NK085(ru)002:1995: ni spyad pa lnga yi gzhi yin te de yang
NK085(ru)002:1997: sbyor ba nyid la sgrol ba ste //
NK085(ru)002:1998: sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba rdzogs zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:1999: gang ltar na yang sbyor sgrol dbyer med par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:2000: goms pa'i sgrol ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor sgrol dang /
NK085(ru)002:2001: zhes pa ting nge 'dzin ni g.yos byed lam gyi ngo bo yin te /
NK085(ru)002:2002: gzhal bya snang srid thun mongs ma yin pa'i tshad mas gzhal bas /
NK085(ru)002:2003: lha dang chos nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te bsgom pas /
NK085(ru)002:2004: dgongs pa nyid la sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na tha
NK085(ru)002:2005: mal gyi zhen pa mi gnas pa la sgrol ba
NK085(ru)002:2006: zhes bya'o // thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba ni dbang po yul gyi sbyor sgrol dang /
NK085(ru)002:2007: zhes pa 'dir ma h+aa yo ga rang gzhung gi lta ba rtogs /
NK085(ru)002:2008: tshogs lhar shes pa ste phung po lnga yab lnga /
NK085(ru)002:2010: dbang po lnga sems dpa' dang khro bo yab /
NK085(ru)002:2012: yang na dbang po lnga rigs lnga /
NK085(ru)002:2014: kun rdzob byang sems kyi skabs su bshad pa bzhin la /
NK085(ru)002:2015: de ltar dbang yul thabs dang shes rab du ldan
NK085(ru)002:2016: pa'i dgongs pa dang ldan pa'i dus su tha mal
NK085(ru)002:2017: pa'i dbang yul gtan nas dag pa la sgrol ba
NK085(ru)002:2018: zhes bya'o // ru tra sgrol ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:2019: thabs chen po'i sbyor sgrol dang /
NK085(ru)002:2020: zhes pa thabs che ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:2021: ru tra nag po las ngan pa stobs rgyas pas ngan song kha brgyud pa las thar yang /
NK085(ru)002:2022: khams gsum log pa'i lam du btsud pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa de /
NK085(ru)002:2023: rang la bsags pa med pas zhi rgyas dbang gis
NK085(ru)002:2024: kyang mi 'dul ba nyid dpal chen pos drag po'i
NK085(ru)002:2026: lus sems tshar gcod pa nyid 'og ma'i spyod yul min te /
NK085(ru)002:2027: thabs la de bas che ba med pa'i de lta
NK085(ru)002:2028: bu'i spyod pa'i sgo nas ru tra rang gi bsags
NK085(ru)002:2029: pa med par shes pa zag med la sbyor ba
NK085(ru)002:2030: dang / phung po dus gsum gyi mchod pa dpal
NK085(ru)002:2031: chen pos gsol ba la ni sbyor sgrol zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:2032: dang / ste / yang na mo rnams sbyor bas 'dul ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2034: sdud pa'i tshig rnams ni don lnga la so sor bzhi po rnams 'dul ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2035: 'phrin las kyi sgrol ba ni mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lnga'o //
NK085(ru)002:2036: zhes pa sngon byung sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa nyid rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pa'i lam ste /
NK085(ru)002:2037: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu lta bu la /
NK085(ru)002:2038: rdzas dang sngags dang 'khrul 'khor dang ting nge 'dzin
NK085(ru)002:2039: gyis dbang po'i mngon gsum du snang ba'i lus sems
NK085(ru)002:2040: dbral ba'i cho ga nas phyung zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:2041: lus sems dbral ba'i cho gas bsgral nas ra ma
NK085(ru)002:2042: na'i mda' bzhin shes pa zag med du sbyor nus
NK085(ru)002:2043: pa'o // lta ba gnyis shes bya'i yul thun mong
NK085(ru)002:2044: du bstan pa ni gnyis ni shes bya thun mong
NK085(ru)002:2045: pa'o // / zhes pa bshad pa'i grangs lnga las /
NK085(ru)002:2046: rang bzhin dang dbang yul gnyis shes par bya ba'i yul lta ba yin te /
NK085(ru)002:2047: de ni lam pa rnams kyi gzhi thun mong yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2048: sbyor sgrol lnga po yang de nyid kyi ngang du
NK085(ru)002:2049: rdzogs pas rnal 'byor pas bya ba gang byed kyang
NK085(ru)002:2050: thams cad kyi sngon du gzhi lta ba dgos pas
NK085(ru)002:2051: bshad ces bya'o // 'di la'ang lha rje yang khong gi zhal nas /
NK085(ru)002:2052: spyad pa lnga yi skabs su lta ba thun mong
NK085(ru)002:2053: du bshad pa la dgos pa med de yi ge
NK085(ru)002:2056: zhes pa mthun pa las rtsa ba dang yan lag gi thun mong ste /
NK085(ru)002:2057: byang sems lta dang gnyis mthun pa'i phyir ro ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:2058: 'o na mtshon tshul ma 'dres pas ma nges so zhe na ma 'dres ste /
NK085(ru)002:2059: gong du ni shes bya'i yul lta ba bzhir bstan nas /
NK085(ru)002:2061: sbyor sgrol gyi ngo bo nyid tsam du bshad pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2062: ting 'dzin lam la kun gyi thun mong du gsungs pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:2063: ting 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2064: ting 'dzin ni don dang yi ge gnyis ste /
NK085(ru)002:2065: bslab pa ni gnyis po lam gyi ngo bo yin pas 'dris goms su bya ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2066: thun mong gi de nyid 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor da
NK085(ru)002:2067: lta nas rtsal chen rdzogs pa ltar lam gyi bar
NK085(ru)002:2068: du lam pa mtho dman kun gyi thun mong ste
NK085(ru)002:2069: / lam mthar phyin pa nyid 'bras bu'i ngo bo'o //
NK085(ru)002:2070: 'di la yang gong ltar gsung gi dam tshig rtsa
NK085(ru)002:2071: ba dang yan lag thun mong ngo zhes gsung ste
NK085(ru)002:2072: / de ltar na'ang mtshon tshul ma 'dres pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:2073: gsung dam ni nyams su blang ba'i ngos nas bzhag la /
NK085(ru)002:2074: 'di nyid nas nus pa tsam gyi ngos nas 'jog ste /
NK085(ru)002:2075: rig pa ting nge 'dzin gnyis po la sbyor zhing tha mal las sgrol zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2076: mngon phyung la gnyis kyi mdo ni /
NK085(ru)002:2077: mngon phyung zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2078: de yang mngon phyung ni bshad par bas la /
NK085(ru)002:2079: dam tshig ni yul dang phrad na de las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2080: chen po ni theg pa mchog gi don /
NK085(ru)002:2081: skal pa yang rab gyi yul /
NK085(ru)002:2082: barlanga ba'i las kyis tshogs gnyis gcig char du rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2083: gzhi de nyid la 'phrin las kyi ngo bo mngon du snang ba'i tshig lnga te /
NK085(ru)002:2084: gang gi gang la ci ltar ci'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:2085: rtsod pa spang bar 'chad pa bzhin shes par bya zhes gdams pa brjod pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2087: zhes pas rten gyi gang zag bstan te /
NK085(ru)002:2088: de yang kun kyi gzhi lta ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:2089: rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul zhes pa mya
NK085(ru)002:2090: ngan las 'das pa rang snang gi chos thams cad
NK085(ru)002:2091: ni rang byung gi ye shes su rgyu gcig la
NK085(ru)002:2092: / phyin gyi log gi rgyun las snang ba'i 'khor
NK085(ru)002:2093: ba'i chos ni ma rigs pa rgyu gcig de gnyis
NK085(ru)002:2094: kyang zhen pa dang bsam pas tha dad kyang /
NK085(ru)002:2095: sman ga bur bzhin ngo bo dbyer med ste /
NK085(ru)002:2097: phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste //
NK085(ru)002:2098: ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal //
NK085(ru)002:2099: nyon mong sdug bsngal byang chub mchog /zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:2100: log rtog nyid du snang na'ang rig pa rang snang
NK085(ru)002:2101: bas gser gyi dpes rang byung gi ye shes kho
NK085(ru)002:2102: na ste de nyid kyi ngo bo bstan du med
NK085(ru)002:2103: de / yul dang bral ba nyid /
NK085(ru)002:2104: gsal la 'gag pa med pa ni mnyam pa'i dbyings su gsal bas /
NK085(ru)002:2105: gtan tshig dang grub mtha' thun mong pa ste rgyu gcig pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2106: yig 'bru ni don de nyid dpe te /
NK085(ru)002:2107: bshad pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir /
NK085(ru)002:2108: 'khor 'das thams cad sems nyid kho na bas de nyid las dngos gang du'ang ma grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2109: sems nyid kyi snang stong gi phyogs gang du yang
NK085(ru)002:2110: ma nges pa ni a nyid yi ge thams cad
NK085(ru)002:2111: du snang yang / a nyid la grub pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2112: a nyid yi ge gang du yang ma nges pas
NK085(ru)002:2113: yi ge thams cad mi 'gag par snang ba ste
NK085(ru)002:2115: sems ngo bo nyid du grub pa med pa nyid
NK085(ru)002:2116: rtogs ma rtogs kyis rig pa nyid 'khor 'das kyi
NK085(ru)002:2117: chos cir yang snang ba ni a la na ro
NK085(ru)002:2118: snang ba lta bu ste sku'i rang bzhin dang bshad
NK085(ru)002:2119: pa'i snang stong gnyis tshig la snga phyi snang yang
NK085(ru)002:2120: don dbyer med par rtogs pa'i rig pa nyid ye
NK085(ru)002:2121: shes lngar gsal ba ni +amo gyis mtshon pa ste
NK085(ru)002:2122: thugs kho na'o // byin gyis brlabs dang mngon gsum pa zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:2123: 'dir byin gyis brlabs pa ni brlabs bya dang rlob byed ste /
NK085(ru)002:2124: yul ni phung khams dang skye mched kyi dngos po'o //
NK085(ru)002:2125: barloba byed ni bshad pa'i gtan tshig gnyis kyis kun
NK085(ru)002:2126: rdzob byang chub sems su bshad pa ltar byin gyis
NK085(ru)002:2128: mngon gsum par zhes pa mngon gsum bzhi las theg pa mchog gi rang rig pa'i mngon gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:2129: don ci lta ba nyid rig pa la gdeng du
NK085(ru)002:2130: gyur nas yul dang yul can med da nam mkhas
NK085(ru)002:2131: la nam mkha' mi sems pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2132: de lta bu'i don rtogs pa la ni lta bya
NK085(ru)002:2133: lta byed med par rang gsal ba ni lta ba
NK085(ru)002:2134: zhes brjod do // bltas pa med par rang spyi chos /
NK085(ru)002:2135: dbyer med phyogs lta'i 'dod bral ba zhes pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2136: de lta bu min pa'i lta ba tha snyad legs
NK085(ru)002:2137: pa ni lha yul gyi bdud rtsi brjod pa dang
NK085(ru)002:2138: mtshungs te / 'on kyang gtan 'gog pa'ang ma yin te brgyud pa'i thabs so //
NK085(ru)002:2139: spyod ces pa spyir lam mtho dman gyi bye brag
NK085(ru)002:2140: gis spyod pa'i grangs mang yang 'dir spyod pa lnga'i
NK085(ru)002:2141: don yul dang phrad nas nyams su blangs kyang bdag
NK085(ru)002:2142: gzhan gyi don rnams pa gnyis su 'gyur ba dang
NK085(ru)002:2143: / sgos su sgrol ba 'phrin las kyi spyod pa rnams byas la mi btsog pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2144: 'bras bu'i nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2146: byas pa mi bgos sdom pa rdzogs //
NK085(ru)002:2148: ting 'dzin gnyis las dmigs su med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rig pa glang po /
NK085(ru)002:2149: smyon pa dang 'dra ba btul te snang stong gang du yang dbang thob pa la bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:2150: phrin las kyi skabs 'dir de nyid gal che bas
NK085(ru)002:2151: rab ting nge 'dzin gyis gso bsad la dbang ba
NK085(ru)002:2152: dang / 'bring ting nge 'dzin dang sngags gnyis /
NK085(ru)002:2153: tha ma ting nge 'dzin dang 'phrul 'khor gsum gyi
NK085(ru)002:2154: dus su yang ting nge 'dzin gtso che ba dang
NK085(ru)002:2155: / ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig gi 'phro 'dus sbyang ba rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin gtsor smos so //
NK085(ru)002:2156: 'brel zhes pa de dag kyang ya cha ma yin te gcig la gnyis tshang bas /
NK085(ru)002:2157: lhun gyis grub pa'i de'i khongs su dam tshig kyang 'dus pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2158: gom zhes pa rab ni ting nge 'dzin nus pa
NK085(ru)002:2159: gzhan snang du gsal ba ste zag med kyi lam
NK085(ru)002:2160: pa'o // 'bring ni sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyis lus sems phral nus pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2161: tha ma ni sems ting nge 'dzin /
NK085(ru)002:2164: gcig la gcig mi sgrib par 'bras bu mngon du snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2165: yul gang la na bcu ste /
NK085(ru)002:2166: dkon mchog zhes pa la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la 'gal bar byed pa'i sku dgra dang /
NK085(ru)002:2167: rdo rje slob dpon gyi 'tsho ba gsum 'phrog pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2168: gnyis zhes pa bshad pa'i yul gyi ngos nas so //
NK085(ru)002:2169: dam las logs zhes pa dam tshig mnos kyang de'i nang na mi gnas nas nyams te log pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2170: 'khus pa ni tshur la gnod pa byed pa ste shes che bar bla ma dang grogs po la'o //
NK085(ru)002:2171: 'dus pa 'ong zhes pa phyi nang gnyis te phyi nang chos nyan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2174: thar pa la gzhol ba'i phyogs su 'ong ba rnams
NK085(ru)002:2175: la gnod de bar bcad nas mi 'grub par byed
NK085(ru)002:2176: pa'o // nang ni bsgrub pa chen po la 'dus
NK085(ru)002:2177: pa'i sar 'ong ba ste bla ma'i zhal las shes
NK085(ru)002:2178: pa'o // so // yongs la gnod ces par spyir
NK085(ru)002:2179: sems can che 'phra gang la'ang srog dang bde ba'i
NK085(ru)002:2180: bar du gcod pa'i thabs sna tshogs byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2181: dam dgra ni dam tshig can gcig pu'i dgra sha stag byed pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2182: gong du ni slob dpon dang /
NK085(ru)002:2183: grogs po la shas cher yin la 'dir ni dam tshig can thams cad kyi dgra byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2184: ngan pa'i ngang tshul can zhes pa zhi rgyas gang gis kyang /
NK085(ru)002:2185: 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi chibs bya rog dang /
NK085(ru)002:2186: sngags rje la srog lta bu nus stobs dang ldan
NK085(ru)002:2187: pa lus kyi rtsal 'bras bu ngan par song ba'i
NK085(ru)002:2188: grangs dang ldan pa zhi ba'i chos bshad kyang de
NK085(ru)002:2189: nyid sdug bsngal las sbyor ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2190: de dang bdun pa ni rgyu la sgrol ba bdun zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2191: 'bras bu gsum ni ngan song gsum dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2192: de yang rgyu mi dge ba las ngan pas dmyal ba yi dwags byol song gsum dang /
NK085(ru)002:2193: gong gi bdun dang bcu pa ni rnal 'byor zhes
NK085(ru)002:2194: par bshad pa'i lta spyod sgom gsum rigs la lhun
NK085(ru)002:2195: gyis 'grub pa'i gsang sngags pa kun gyis yul dang
NK085(ru)002:2196: phrad pa'i thad song yal bar mi dor bar bya
NK085(ru)002:2197: ba'i phyir dang du blang zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:2198: 'o na zhing bcu yang khams gsum sems can gyi
NK085(ru)002:2199: khongs su gtogs la de dag bsgral na spyi'i mched
NK085(ru)002:2200: yin pa'i grogs kyi dam tshig dang 'gal bar mi
NK085(ru)002:2201: 'gyur ram zhe na bsgral ba'i yon tan 'chad pa
NK085(ru)002:2202: bzhin yin pas 'gal bar mi 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:2203: phan 'dogs pas dam tshig rdzogs ste /
NK085(ru)002:2204: dper na mi nag mdung thung can bsad pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2205: grangs ni rtsa ba bcu bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:2206: zhes pa spyi grangs bstan ste /
NK085(ru)002:2207: sgrol ba'i grangs kyi rtsa ba yul bcu gong ma la bzhi dang bcu bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:2208: 'di la lha rje yang khong gis /
NK085(ru)002:2210: slob dpon sku dgra dang bzhi /
NK085(ru)002:2211: dam las logs pa dang lnga 'khus pa dang drug /
NK085(ru)002:2212: 'dus pa 'ong ba la gnod pa dang bdun /
NK085(ru)002:2213: yongs la gnod pa da nga brgyad /
NK085(ru)002:2214: dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can gnyis dang bcu /
NK085(ru)002:2215: ngan song gsum dang bcu gsum /
NK085(ru)002:2216: sku dgra gnyis zhes pas grogs po'i sku dgra dang bcu bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:2217: mngon phyung gcig pu'i grangs su bzhed skad do //
NK085(ru)002:2219: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya rnams //
NK085(ru)002:2220: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2223: phyag rgya lus kyi las rnams shin du goms te
NK085(ru)002:2224: rig pa la dbang thob pa ni rtogs pas bdag
NK085(ru)002:2226: de nyid kyi byin brlabs gzhan la snang du rung ste /
NK085(ru)002:2227: shin du goms pas bsgral bya nyid dbang bskur te
NK085(ru)002:2228: rnam par shes pa byang chub kyi zhing du dgod
NK085(ru)002:2229: par bya zhes mdor bstan nas /
NK085(ru)002:2232: zhes pa 'di te thams cad yang blo rab 'bring
NK085(ru)002:2233: gi bye brag ste rab ting nge 'dzin gcig pu
NK085(ru)002:2234: la dbang thob nas bsgral bya'i dngos po la snying
NK085(ru)002:2235: ka chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa pad+ma 'dab brgyad la
NK085(ru)002:2236: sngags zhes bya ste dag pa'i sa bon sku gsung
NK085(ru)002:2238: ma dag pa'i sa bon rigs drug ste a n+ri su tre pre du gnas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2239: dbus na srog mi shigs pa'i thig le'i ngo bo
NK085(ru)002:2240: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid h'u gnas pas h'u
NK085(ru)002:2241: las 'od zer 'phros pas rigs drug gi sa bon
NK085(ru)002:2242: bsregs nas / +amo ahmh'u gsum la thim de nyid
NK085(ru)002:2243: kyang srog mi shigs pa'i thig le h'u la thim
NK085(ru)002:2244: pa la ni bag chags sbyangs zhes bya la /
NK085(ru)002:2245: rgyas zhes pas bdag nyid las kyi lha yi ting
NK085(ru)002:2246: nge 'dzin gsal ba'i thugs las 'od zer spros pas
NK085(ru)002:2247: bag chags sbyang ste dag nas nyi ma'i snying po
NK085(ru)002:2248: lta bur gyur te ye shes lnga'i ngo bo rtsa
NK085(ru)002:2249: lnga'i h'u las rnam shes lhar bskyed ces pas h'u
NK085(ru)002:2250: rnam par shes pa las sems kyi chos nyid rang
NK085(ru)002:2251: snang ba'i brda' rdo rje sems dpar bskyed de ye
NK085(ru)002:2252: shes lngas dbang bskur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2253: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa man ngag ltar
NK085(ru)002:2254: byas nas 'og min rnam par snang mdzad kyi pho
NK085(ru)002:2255: brang du 'phang ste rgyal ba'i sras su bya ba
NK085(ru)002:2256: ni ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig gi las ste dbang
NK085(ru)002:2257: po rab kyi spyod yul lo //
NK085(ru)002:2258: dbang po 'bring gis sngags dang ting nge 'dzin dang
NK085(ru)002:2259: 'khrul 'khor gsum ka la brten te gsang sngags kyi
NK085(ru)002:2260: tshe ba rten 'brel gyi stobs la snang bas rgyud
NK085(ru)002:2261: kyi gzhung na smos pa' rgyu rnams la gzugs bca'
NK085(ru)002:2262: ba dang mtshon cha phur pa mtshan nyid dang ldan
NK085(ru)002:2263: pa dang / gzugs kyi snod gru gsum e'i snod dang /
NK085(ru)002:2264: ye shes kyi lha mnyes pa'i yan lag nang gi mchod pa rnam pa gsum dang /
NK085(ru)002:2266: rnal 'byor pa rang nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin gsal ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2267: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nas smos pa bzhin du nyes pa bsgo ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2269: kha sbyor dbye ba rnams bya ste gzugs dang mi
NK085(ru)002:2270: gnyis par ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar byas nas
NK085(ru)002:2271: / lus sems dbral ba'i mtshon cha byin gyis brlab pa'i phur pas gdab ste /
NK085(ru)002:2272: sems gdab pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK085(ru)002:2273: ngag de nyid kyi sngags dang /
NK085(ru)002:2275: rnam pa gsum gyi 'phro 'dus bsgral zhing gi lus
NK085(ru)002:2276: la yod pa'i 'gro drug gi sa bon bsreg pa
NK085(ru)002:2277: dang / phur pas ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis
NK085(ru)002:2278: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags med par byas pa la
NK085(ru)002:2280: rnam par shes pa a'i ngo bo phur pa'i rtse
NK085(ru)002:2281: mos blangs nas las kyi lha yi thugs kar bstim
NK085(ru)002:2282: ste / sku la brgyud nas yum gyi mkhar h'u
NK085(ru)002:2283: las rdo rje sems ma dkar po mtshon gang bar
NK085(ru)002:2284: bsgom pa la ni rnam shes lhar bskyed zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:2285: ste / ste / de nyid la ni ye shes
NK085(ru)002:2286: lngas dbang bskur dang sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab
NK085(ru)002:2288: shes rab zla ba'i steng du bzhag nas /
NK085(ru)002:2289: thabs mchog nyi mas bkab ste /
NK085(ru)002:2290: sam ma ra na phata kyis 'og min du 'phang ba snga ma ltar ro //
NK085(ru)002:2291: de las gzhan pa bsgrub pa chen po'i lugs ni zhal las blang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:2292: de'i phan yon ni bsgral zhing snang ba ste ye
NK085(ru)002:2293: shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par 'gyur zhes pa khos bsod
NK085(ru)002:2294: nams kyi bsags pa med par gsang sngags kyi rten
NK085(ru)002:2295: stobs kyis shes pa zag med kyis la ma sbyor
NK085(ru)002:2296: ba ni / ye shes tshogs kyi 'bras bu snang ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2297: kyang ni ma bsags par rang rdzogs par 'gyur bas so //
NK085(ru)002:2298: 'o na bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs sam zhe na de nyid bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:2299: 'byung ba'i phung po sha khrag rus pa gsum dug
NK085(ru)002:2300: gsum du byin gyis brlab nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK085(ru)002:2301: la mchod par bsngosa pa ni kho nyid kyis bsod
NK085(ru)002:2302: nams kyi tshogs su gcig car du rdzogs pas 'di
NK085(ru)002:2304: des na thabs kyi zhags pa ra ma na'i mda' dang mtshungs so zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:2305: rgyal po ra ma nas mda' gang 'phang 'phog shi
NK085(ru)002:2306: nas lhar skye ba las mi 'da' ba bzhin 'dir
NK085(ru)002:2307: gsang sngags rten 'brel 'tshogs pa'i stobs kyis 'phrin las
NK085(ru)002:2308: grub nas gnas spar nus pa'ang dpe de bzhin no
NK085(ru)002:2309: // 'on kyang phyi rol ba thun mong gi rigs sngags rnams ni ma gtogs so //
NK085(ru)002:2310: de ltar bsgral bya'i tshogs gnyis su 'gyur bas /
NK085(ru)002:2311: don des rnal 'byor pa'i yang tshogs gnyis gcig car
NK085(ru)002:2312: la rdzogs ste ma bkag pa dang mi 'jig pa
NK085(ru)002:2313: gnyis kyis dam tshig gi 'od po lhun gyis grub
NK085(ru)002:2314: pa'o // rgyu la grub pa bdun po spyod yul
NK085(ru)002:2315: du gyur pas bshad pa ltar yin kyang 'bras bu
NK085(ru)002:2316: la bsgral ba ngan song gsum po yul du ma
NK085(ru)002:2317: gyur pas ci ltar zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:2318: de ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas te /
NK085(ru)002:2319: rnal 'byor pa las kyi lhar gsal ba'i thugs ka
NK085(ru)002:2320: nas ram spros pa las ye shes kyi me byung
NK085(ru)002:2321: bas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal bsregs nas sems
NK085(ru)002:2323: grangs kyi ar gyur pa nyid a gcig du 'dus nas 'og min du 'phang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2324: lkog gyur gyis don ci ltar 'gyur zhe na lung gis bstan te /
NK085(ru)002:2325: gdos bcas yul na mi snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:2326: chu khams bltas pa bzhin du snang /
NK085(ru)002:2327: yid gzugs mngon shes can gyis mthong zhes dgongs 'dus nas gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:2329: ram srid gsum bsregs pa'i me yin te //
NK085(ru)002:2330: yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar //
NK085(ru)002:2331: ram dbang po dwangs ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK085(ru)002:2332: spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas su //
NK085(ru)002:2333: lhan ne lhang nge don du ni //
NK085(ru)002:2335: dgos ched ni de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2336: gong du bstan pa'i don de kho na bzhin yul
NK085(ru)002:2337: dang phrad nas lus sems dang bral te shes pa
NK085(ru)002:2338: zag med kyi sa la dgod pa'i dgos ched kyang
NK085(ru)002:2340: spyi brtsan du bsgral ba'i zhing bcu bstan pa la
NK085(ru)002:2341: gnod pa rnams bsgral bas blo dman rnams chos bden
NK085(ru)002:2342: par yid ches nas byang chub spyod pa 'phel ba
NK085(ru)002:2343: dang / dam tshig can la gnod pa med pas
NK085(ru)002:2344: byang chub bsgrub pa'i bar ched nyung bas kyang spyod
NK085(ru)002:2346: sems can yongs la gnod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2347: ngan pa'i ngang tshul can bsgral bas sems can thams cad bde ba ste spyi'i don no //
NK085(ru)002:2348: dgos kyi bdag don la lha mnyes zhes pas bsgral
NK085(ru)002:2349: ba de nyid kyis dam tshig rdzogs pas lha mnyes
NK085(ru)002:2350: pa dang / yul gyis bsags pa med par zag med la sbyor ba'i nyes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2351: phung po dug gsum gyis mchod par phul ba'i mnyes pa dang gsum mo //
NK085(ru)002:2352: rnal 'byor pa bdag la dam tshig gi chag nyams
NK085(ru)002:2353: yod kyang de nyid kyis skongs par 'gyur bas so
NK085(ru)002:2354: // gzhan don du las ngan bar chad sdug yun
NK085(ru)002:2355: thung zhes pa tshe 'dir yul gyi gong du smos
NK085(ru)002:2356: pa'i las ngan pa rnams bsags pa'i bar chad nas
NK085(ru)002:2357: tshe phyi ma la sdug yun thung ni rnal 'byor
NK085(ru)002:2359: phur pa bcu gnyis kyi rgyud las /
NK085(ru)002:2360: thabs kyi tha ma'i tha ma ni //
NK085(ru)002:2361: ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal chung yang //
NK085(ru)002:2362: dmyal ba'i gnas su yun thung 'gyur zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:2364: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bshad pa bzhin dang /
NK085(ru)002:2365: 'chad pa'i gtan tshigs nyid kyis gsal lo //
NK085(ru)002:2367: rang gis bsags med ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2368: bsgral zhing kho rang gis shes pa'i rgyud la bsod nams kyi bsags pa 'phra ba yang med de /
NK085(ru)002:2369: sdig pa che 'phra ther slang gi rag pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:2370: du bsags pas ngan song gsum du 'gro ba las
NK085(ru)002:2371: ma togs pa gzhan med pa las gsang sngags kyi
NK085(ru)002:2372: gdul byar gyur pas zag med kyi sa la dgod
NK085(ru)002:2373: pa'i bde ba'i thabs kyi lam theg pa 'di nyid
NK085(ru)002:2374: las ma gtogs gzhan med ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:2375: rtsod pa spong ba ni gsum ste thabs kyi spyod pas mi 'ching pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:2376: thabs kyis spyod pas 'ching 'gyur na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2377: 'og ma dag gis 'dir 'gro ba'i lus sems dang
NK085(ru)002:2378: dbral na zhes pas mchog de dbral bas ltung bar
NK085(ru)002:2380: 'dir thabs ni btsan dug srog gcod pa'i bdag nyid yin yang /
NK085(ru)002:2381: sngags dang sman gyis bsgyur bas bcud len gyi mchog
NK085(ru)002:2382: tu 'gyur pa bzhin 'og ma dag gi spang bya'i
NK085(ru)002:2383: las barlanga ba'i spyod pa sbyor sgrol lta bu btsan
NK085(ru)002:2385: sngags sman dang 'dra ba'i lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sdeng du gyur nas /
NK085(ru)002:2386: bcud len dang 'dra ba bdag gzhan gyi don gnyis su 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:2387: 'bras bu rdzogs na 'og ma bzhin des 'chi bar 'gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:2388: rgyu'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas gzhan don snying
NK085(ru)002:2389: rje tsam gyis bslang nas gdul bya 'dul ba'i dbang
NK085(ru)002:2390: gis bcom ldan 'das kyis rngon pa bya ba dkar
NK085(ru)002:2392: smad 'tshong ma nang pa la mi dga' phyi rol
NK085(ru)002:2393: pa la dga' ba 'dul ba'i ched du ston pas
NK085(ru)002:2394: skyes bur sprul nas 'dul ba mdo sde nas bshad
NK085(ru)002:2395: pa kun yang ltung bar 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:2396: de dag kyang mi ltung ste /
NK085(ru)002:2397: bdag gzhan gyi don rdzogs na 'dir lta sgom gyi
NK085(ru)002:2398: gdeng gis zin pa ni ci smos zhes bstan pa
NK085(ru)002:2399: dang / dman spyod kyi dbang du mi gtang ba ni khe dang ches pas /
NK085(ru)002:2400: gong ma'i 'phrin las de yang bdag gzhan mnyam pa
NK085(ru)002:2401: nyid du rtogs pas khe grags kyis ma yin pa
NK085(ru)002:2402: dang / spyod pas zhes pas dug gsum gyis kun
NK085(ru)002:2403: nas bslangs pa'i rang ga ma'i spyod pa'i 'phrin las
NK085(ru)002:2404: de ched du blangs pa med pa'i phyir thabs mkhas
NK085(ru)002:2405: kyi lta bas zin pa ni thabs chen zhes te
NK085(ru)002:2406: dang / / rtogs pa dang bdag bsgral nas thugs
NK085(ru)002:2407: rjes gzhan pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
NK085(ru)002:2408: gzhan don gyi thabs la de bas che ba med
NK085(ru)002:2409: pas yo ga man chod kyi spyod yul du ma
NK085(ru)002:2410: gyur pas na chen po ste /
NK085(ru)002:2411: gsang sngags kyi lam la gnas pa ni rten gyi
NK085(ru)002:2412: gang zag gi blo tshad kyi mtho dman gyi bye
NK085(ru)002:2413: brag ste / 'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor pa
NK085(ru)002:2414: tshogs lam pa rnams la skye bo zhes bya ste
NK085(ru)002:2415: brag ste / / dbang thob la ma nyams pa kun gyis ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK085(ru)002:2416: sngags dang 'khrul 'khor rnam pa gsum la brten te bya bar 'byung /
NK085(ru)002:2418: dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor mthong lam la gnas
NK085(ru)002:2419: pa'i rten gyi skye bo kun gyi ting nge 'dzin
NK085(ru)002:2421: lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom lam pas ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'dus bya bar 'byung ngo //
NK085(ru)002:2422: don des gsang sngags kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i
NK085(ru)002:2423: spyod pa 'og ma'ii gzhal bya min par bstan no
NK085(ru)002:2424: // sbyor ba'i dam tshig la gnyis kyi dang po
NK085(ru)002:2425: mdor bstan pa ni ga na'i dam tshig ces pa
NK085(ru)002:2427: de yang spyir gong du sbyor sgrol dbyer med par
NK085(ru)002:2428: bstan kyang 'dir skad cig snga phyi dbang gis zhing
NK085(ru)002:2429: bcu sgrol ba las 'bras bu zag med la sbyor
NK085(ru)002:2431: 'dir thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par sbyor ba
NK085(ru)002:2432: las tha mal pa'i gzung 'dzin las sgrol ba snang
NK085(ru)002:2434: ga na'i zhes te thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par 'tshogs pa'am /
NK085(ru)002:2435: yang na ra ga na zer la lar ra ga ces pa chags pa zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:2437: ma chags pa la chags pa dang //
NK085(ru)002:2438: chags pa nyid na'ang chags pa med //
NK085(ru)002:2439: de nyid tshangs mchog rgyal po yin //
NK085(ru)002:2440: ces pas yul dang yul can chags bya chags byed ltar snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:2441: sems nyid kyi dbyings su gsal bas /
NK085(ru)002:2442: gnyis pa ngang gi mi gnas pa la ni /
NK085(ru)002:2443: yul yul can gtan nas bral bas nyi ma'i snying po ltar te /
NK085(ru)002:2444: mtha' gnyis pas rgyal bas rgyal po zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2445: don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas
NK085(ru)002:2446: 'chad pa bzhin yul gnyis 'dzom pa'i dus su nyams
NK085(ru)002:2447: blang ba las mi 'da' bas dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)002:2448: yo ga man chad kyis dben pas chen po'o //
NK085(ru)002:2449: rgyas pa la bzhi'i dang po rten gyi gang zag ni chos gnyis ste /
NK085(ru)002:2451: log par chags yid g.yos spang ba zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:2452: pha la dgrar mthong ba la ni logs pa zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:2453: thams cad sems nyid kyi dbyings su gcig pa la
NK085(ru)002:2454: yul yul can rang rgyud pa 'dzin pas chags bya
NK085(ru)002:2455: dang chags byed du snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2456: yid g.yo zhes pa bar skabs kyi tshig ste mnyam pa nyid gdeng du gyur nas /
NK085(ru)002:2457: nam mkha' dngos por mi snang ba ltar /
NK085(ru)002:2458: yid g.yo ba btsal gyis mi rnyed pa la spangs pa zhes bya la /
NK085(ru)002:2459: dang po rnal 'byor ting nge 'dzin las su rung
NK085(ru)002:2460: bas kyang tha mal ba'i shes pa phra ba'ang mi
NK085(ru)002:2461: gnas par bya ba la g.yos sbang zhes bya ste
NK085(ru)002:2462: / slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas //
NK085(ru)002:2463: chags pa khams 'grub gcig shos kyis //
NK085(ru)002:2464: rang byung ye shes 'grub byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2466: ldan pa ni don gnyis zhes te bsgrub pa'i dus su bdag don la /
NK085(ru)002:2467: dbang gyi dus su gzhan don no //
NK085(ru)002:2468: bdag don la yang mchog dang thun mong gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:2469: theg pa 'og ma dag gis brgyud nas bsgrub la /
NK085(ru)002:2470: khyad par gyi theg pa 'di nyid kyis thabs khyad
NK085(ru)002:2471: par can 'di nyid la brten nas tshe gcig gis
NK085(ru)002:2472: dbang po'i mngon gsum du snang bar 'dod pa'i rten
NK085(ru)002:2473: gyi gang zag la mi zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2474: yul la gnyis kyis bstan pa'i rig pa ni pad can dung can zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2475: de yang rigs dang mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis las
NK085(ru)002:2476: pad can zhes der kha dog ni dmar po mtshon
NK085(ru)002:2477: pa dang / 'phrin las bzhi la na dbang gi yum yin te /
NK085(ru)002:2478: de yang chos gang dang ldan na /
NK085(ru)002:2479: bzhin mdog dmar mo sogs ka la //
NK085(ru)002:2480: mig ring thags dam so zho chag /sked 'phra lus la dri zhim 'byung //
NK085(ru)002:2481: pad ma can gyi bud med do //
NK085(ru)002:2483: dung can zhes pa dbyibs ni dkar po /
NK085(ru)002:2485: bong chung lus mdzes zla ba'i mdog /g.yas 'khyil lus kyang de bzhin shes //
NK085(ru)002:2486: skad gsal sngags zlos yid mi skyo //
NK085(ru)002:2487: 'gro spangs pa de zhi bar sbyar zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:2488: ri mo can zhes pa phrin las na drag po /
NK085(ru)002:2489: lus la khro gnyer mang ba lta bu ste //
NK085(ru)002:2490: bzhin mdog nag po gru gsum la //
NK085(ru)002:2491: khro gnyer can la ger bag chags //
NK085(ru)002:2492: rtsid mgo'i ri mo can du bshad zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:2493: ban glang can zhes pa kha dog na ser ba 'phrin las na rgyas pa ste //
NK085(ru)002:2494: ban glang ser po gru bzhi la //
NK085(ru)002:2495: skra khams smin tshogs che mig 'bur //
NK085(ru)002:2496: 'gram spang rna ba ring sha rgyas //
NK085(ru)002:2497: skra 'tshams dma' ba ban glang can zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:2498: de tshe rigs bstan nas mtshan nyid bzhi ni 'di
NK085(ru)002:2499: dag mngon rtogs kyi le'u gnyis pa na gsal lo
NK085(ru)002:2500: // lcug phran can zhes pa zhi bas yum ste /
NK085(ru)002:2501: zla'am zhes pas rigs rgyud 'phan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2502: stong gcig ces pas mes tshig 'dra zhes zhes ste /
NK085(ru)002:2503: yan lag med pa na dbang gi las la shes so //
NK085(ru)002:2504: me rig ces pa zla bral mya ngan gyis gdungs pa ni drag po'i yum mo //
NK085(ru)002:2505: phyal ba ni rang bzhin gyis mi sdom pa ste rgyas pa'i yum mo //
NK085(ru)002:2506: brgyad ces pa rigs bzhi mtshan nyid bzhi dang brgyad do //
NK085(ru)002:2508: mnyen drang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2509: lus kyi mtshan nyid rked pa dang yan lag rnams
NK085(ru)002:2510: dang mnyen pas cir yang bsgyur du btub pa dang
NK085(ru)002:2511: drang zhes pa mdun nas bltas na dgye ba /
NK085(ru)002:2512: rgyab nas bltas na dgur ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2513: rked ring zhes pa gzhu'i 'chang gzung lta bu ste
NK085(ru)002:2514: dpyi dang rtsis bu thung gi bar na sor bzhi
NK085(ru)002:2515: yod pa'o // 'di la ske ring zhes pas mgrin pa bya ngang pa ltar ring la sgu ba /
NK085(ru)002:2516: skad ngang pa'i skad lta bu zhes kyang 'chad do //
NK085(ru)002:2517: stod smad phyed ni mtshan nyid so sor rdzogs nas 'chi gu'am grod pa lta bu ma yin pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2518: 'di la yang gong ma dag gis pad ma'i mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'o gsung /
NK085(ru)002:2519: yan lag 'phra 'jam zhes pa yan lag dang nying
NK085(ru)002:2520: lag rnams rtsa 'jag bzhin song ba la ni mi
NK085(ru)002:2521: bya ste so sor bshan la 'byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2522: 'jam pa ni mthong bya dang reg bya gnyis kyi ngos nas so //
NK085(ru)002:2523: gang du yan lag gi chos bshad pa nyid kyis
NK085(ru)002:2524: sor mo rnams kyi tshig pa mi mngon pa la
NK085(ru)002:2526: 'phral ba ni glad pa bde chen gyi 'khor lo
NK085(ru)002:2527: ste dbyes che ba zla ba gam pa lta bu'o
NK085(ru)002:2528: // dmig dkyus ring zhes pa dmigs 'phral ring ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2529: shes rab che ba'i rtags so //
NK085(ru)002:2530: dpe la las mig dkyus ring zhes pas smin ma 'dres pa la bzhed do //
NK085(ru)002:2531: dmig dpral dkyil na zhes pa mig gnyis kyi ste /
NK085(ru)002:2532: dpral ba'i dkyil na smyin ma 'dres pa nyid kha dog nag pas ut+pala mdog ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2533: la shan las dmig 'phra dkyil nag ud pal mdog ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:2534: mig 'phra ba ni ring la 'dzum pa ste dkyil
NK085(ru)002:2535: nag pa ni na yud mchog gi mig ces pa
NK085(ru)002:2536: dang mtshungs la / kha dog de nyid ud pal gyi mdog lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2537: chu zheng gnyis ka 'bring du bshad ces pa bong mthon dman dang 'phra sbom ste /
NK085(ru)002:2538: de gnyis ka 'bring ba ni gnas skabs de nyid na kun gyi yid la ran pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2539: ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min //
NK085(ru)002:2540: de bzhin sbom min 'phra ba'ang min //
NK085(ru)002:2541: zhes ston pas gsang ba'i rgyud rnams su bshad pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2542: lus la chu klung ga bur dri //
NK085(ru)002:2543: zhes pa chu la ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma
NK085(ru)002:2544: med pa dang 'dra bar lus la dri ma mi
NK085(ru)002:2545: chags pa chu klung lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:2546: ga bur gyi dri zhim po bro ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2547: yang lus la chu rlung ga bur dri zhes pas chu ni rdul yin la /
NK085(ru)002:2548: rlung ni kha'i dbugs te de gnyis dri zhim po ga bur lta bu bro ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2549: gsang thub pa'i gsang bya'i dngos po rnams chu 'dzag su mi 'gro ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2550: shes rab che bas mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs te /
NK085(ru)002:2551: don des rtog 'dzin gyi shes chung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2552: spyod pa dal te brdabs bag tu ma yin pas yid du 'ong ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2553: dad pa dang ldan te las dang lha dang bla
NK085(ru)002:2554: ma la yid ches zhing mi phyed pa'i dad pa
NK085(ru)002:2556: dam tshig can bla ma dang grogs po dang 'grogs
NK085(ru)002:2557: shing bshad pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis gsang sngags
NK085(ru)002:2558: la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa gsang
NK085(ru)002:2559: ba'i gnas su bshad par bya zhes pa phyi'i gsang
NK085(ru)002:2560: ba'i gnas ni thugs kyi dam tshig tu bshad pa
NK085(ru)002:2561: bzhin rnal 'byor pas gnas yin pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2562: de yo ga man chad kyi yul ma yin pas
NK085(ru)002:2563: gsang ba'i theg pa mchog gi gnas su gyur pas
NK085(ru)002:2564: dbang dang bsgrub pa'i dus su spyad par bya zhes
NK085(ru)002:2565: so // de byin gyis brlabs pa'i thabs ni dbang bskur dam phog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2566: dang po ma smin pa smin par bya zhing snod
NK085(ru)002:2567: rung ba'i phyir dbang rnams rim pa bzhin du bskur
NK085(ru)002:2568: / dam 'bog ste rtsa ba dang yan lag gi
NK085(ru)002:2569: dam tshig rnams dbog /lus ngag yid gsum gyi chos
NK085(ru)002:2570: bshad de lus sbyor thab ka ra na'i bstan chos
NK085(ru)002:2571: / shes par bya / ngag tha mal pa las 'das pa'i phyir mtshon pa thams cad bsdab /
NK085(ru)002:2572: sems lhan cig skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin snang bar
NK085(ru)002:2573: bya ba'i phyir lha'i sku 'ja' tshon lta bu dang
NK085(ru)002:2574: / skyes pa'i ye shes nyid g.yo ba dang thob pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2577: mthar phyin pa rnams shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2581: gsang ba bde stong gi ye shes gsum brda' phrad par bshad do //
NK085(ru)002:2582: lus la rigs lnga'i rdul mtshon dbye zhes pa tha
NK085(ru)002:2583: mal pa'i lus nyid rgyal ba'i yum du byin gyis
NK085(ru)002:2584: brlabs pa las rigs lnga dang zhes pas yul lnga
NK085(ru)002:2585: dang khro mo bzhi bkod pa ni bdud rtsi chen
NK085(ru)002:2586: po rgyud ltar shes par byas la nyams su blang
NK085(ru)002:2587: ba ni dper na sa stegs la mtshon gyis bsgyur
NK085(ru)002:2589: phung po nyid lhar snang bas na rdul mtshon dbye zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2590: thabs la mkhas pas zhes pa kun gyi spang bya'i
NK085(ru)002:2591: btsan du ga zos pas spu sdug la bkrag gsal
NK085(ru)002:2592: ba rma bya lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:2593: dpe de bzhin theg pa 'og ma pa kun gyi
NK085(ru)002:2594: spang bya nyams su blangs pas 'bras bu'i ngo bor
NK085(ru)002:2596: gzhi de nyid nyams su len pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2597: skabs kyis zhes pa gzhan don dbang dang /
NK085(ru)002:2599: gsang mchog kyi skabs kyi nyams su blang ba la sbyar zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2600: rnam grangs phan yon dang bcas pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:2601: dam tshig rnam grangs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2602: skabs su bab na nyams su blangs ba las mi
NK085(ru)002:2603: 'da' ba'i dam tshig /dbye ba'i rnam pa'i grangs bcu
NK085(ru)002:2604: gnyis ni sang kri ti'i skad de nyi shu ste
NK085(ru)002:2605: / gong gi rigs dang mtshan nyid sdoms pa'i chos so //
NK085(ru)002:2606: yang na tshig bcu gnyis dang po ste /
NK085(ru)002:2607: gong du rigs ma'i mtshan nyid brgyad /
NK085(ru)002:2608: mnyen srang la sogs pa rnams spyi yi chos su bzhag nas /
NK085(ru)002:2609: dbang bskur dam 'bog chos gsum bshad pa'i gsum /
NK085(ru)002:2610: yul la lha bkod pa dang bcu gnyis sam /
NK085(ru)002:2611: yang na nyi shu rang du byed na yang mnyen
NK085(ru)002:2612: drang nas rdul mtshon dbye ba'i bar la tshang ste
NK085(ru)002:2613: / de ltar dbye lugs gsum slob dpon kun gyi thugs dgongs la so so na'ang /
NK085(ru)002:2614: dam pa bde bar gshegs pas gong ma nyid bzhed do //
NK085(ru)002:2615: de ltar nyi shu dang ldan pa'i las de nyid kyis /
NK085(ru)002:2616: dngos grub yon tan bsam mi khyab ces pa spro
NK085(ru)002:2617: na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon gsum
NK085(ru)002:2619: dngos po med kyang lhar snang ba thun mong dang
NK085(ru)002:2620: grub na bzhi yan chad gong ma nyid nyams su
NK085(ru)002:2621: blangs ba'i yon tan rang snang bas rags phra bsam
NK085(ru)002:2622: gyis mi khyab pa nyid mdor bsdu na /
NK085(ru)002:2623: slob bu smin cing zhes pa dbang gi dus su
NK085(ru)002:2624: slob ma'i rgyud smin cing rtul zhugs gsum po la
NK085(ru)002:2625: sogs pa zag med kyi lam nyams su blang bar
NK085(ru)002:2626: nus pa dang / zhi rgyas la sogs pa'i las rnams myur du 'grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2627: bsgrub pa nyid khams gsum las 'das pas 'khor ba'i chos kyis ma gos te /
NK085(ru)002:2628: skye gnas las grol ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2629: don de nyid kyis dbugs chen phyin te /
NK085(ru)002:2630: bsgom lam lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor du lung
NK085(ru)002:2631: bstan nas rtsal chen rdzogs pa mthar lam gyi 'bras
NK085(ru)002:2632: bu la sbyor ba ni phyir mi ldog ces pas
NK085(ru)002:2634: de lta bu'i lam de thabs chen po gsang sngags
NK085(ru)002:2635: nang pa'i theg pa 'di nyid du bshad pa las
NK085(ru)002:2636: gzhan pa rnam par bcad do //
NK085(ru)002:2637: yang skye gnas las grol zhes pa rigs ma'i mtshan
NK085(ru)002:2638: nyid de gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang
NK085(ru)002:2639: ldan pa ni sbyangs las byung bas ngan song gi
NK085(ru)002:2640: skye gnas las grol zhing gsang sngags kyi rigs su
NK085(ru)002:2641: nges pa ste / de nyid theg pa 'di nyid yin pa ni bshad pa mthun no //
NK085(ru)002:2642: spyad pa'i gsum pa rdzun du smra ba la bzhi yi dang po lta ba'i rdzun gsum ni /
NK085(ru)002:2643: mtshan nyid 'chad dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2644: mtshan nyid rgya chad pa'i kun btags zhes bshad ste /
NK085(ru)002:2645: 'di ltar snang ba kun rdzob kyi dngos po brtags pa dben /
NK085(ru)002:2648: don byed nus pa gzhi'i mtshan nyid can 'di dper
NK085(ru)002:2649: na ri bong gi rwa dang 'dra ste de nyid
NK085(ru)002:2650: tshig tu grub la don la ma grub bzhin du
NK085(ru)002:2651: / yul can so so skye bo'i ngo la 'phrul pa'i blos brtags /
NK085(ru)002:2652: smig sgyu bzhin snang yang tshig tsam ste ngo bo la ma grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2653: des na phyi nang gi chos thams cad so so
NK085(ru)002:2654: skye bo la 'khrul snang gi mtshan nyid du rgya
NK085(ru)002:2655: chad la / rnal 'byor pa'i blo la sems nyid rang gsal las ma gtogs pa /
NK085(ru)002:2656: dngos po'i chos rdul phra rab tsam la yang ma dmigs pas rgya chad ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2657: don de nyid rnal 'byor pa la de ltar mtshan
NK085(ru)002:2658: nyid chad kyang so so skye bo la 'phrul snang
NK085(ru)002:2659: gi mtshan nyid mi 'gog pas rgya ma chad /
NK085(ru)002:2660: so so skye bo la kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid snang bdo na yang /
NK085(ru)002:2661: rnal 'byor pa la sems nyid rang gsal gyi ngang las ma g.yos pas rgya ma chad ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2662: don de nyid 'khor 'das gnyis gzhi gcig du bstan la /
NK085(ru)002:2663: mi mthun pa'i nang ris gcig la gcig rdzun pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2664: rnam grangs kyi kun brtags ni dngos po gcig la
NK085(ru)002:2665: 'gro drug gi mthong snang lhun grub tu bstan te
NK085(ru)002:2666: chu lta bu gcig la yang dmyal bas btso bsreg
NK085(ru)002:2668: yi dwags kyis rnag khrag tu mthong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2669: byol song gis skom pa sel ba tsam du mthong ba dang /
