NK085(ru)002:2670: mis longs spyod kyi gzhir mthong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2671: lhas bdud rtsi mthong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2672: lha min gyis rtsod pa'i gzhi lta bur mthong ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2673: de rnams skad cig ma la 'dzom yang 'gro drug
NK085(ru)002:2674: so so rang snang gcig nyid bden la lnga po
NK085(ru)002:2675: rdzun te / bden rdzun bsnol mar shar ba'i don
NK085(ru)002:2676: gyis gang yang bden par ma grub ste kun rdzun
NK085(ru)002:2677: rdzun te / pa'o // don de nyid theg pa
NK085(ru)002:2678: dgu'i gzhal bya'i snang ba dgu yang rang ngo thams
NK085(ru)002:2679: cad bden zhing gzhan thams cad rdzun pas mang yang
NK085(ru)002:2680: phyogs gcig par ma grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2681: des na mu stegs rtag chad kyi lta ba'ang de dang mtshungs pas /
NK085(ru)002:2682: rnam grangs mthong snang bcu bdun yang so so rang rang gi kun brtags yin pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2683: bltos pa'i kun brtags ni 'khor ba las ldog pa'i
NK085(ru)002:2684: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kun du brtags pa
NK085(ru)002:2685: dang don des ring thung dang che chung dang /
NK085(ru)002:2686: bzang ngan la sogs pa rnams gcig la brten te
NK085(ru)002:2687: gcig byung bas kun du btags pa'i snang ba ste
NK085(ru)002:2688: / bltos pa'i gzhi ma grub na snang yang mi grub pa'i rdzun zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2689: rnam pa gsum zhes bshad pa'i kun brtags rnam pa gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:2690: snang grags kyi chos thams cad ngo bo nyid tha snyad de dag tu 'dus pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2691: dngos po de nyid la rdzun zhes pa mtshan nyid
NK085(ru)002:2692: rgya chad pa'i kun brtags so so skye bo'i yul
NK085(ru)002:2693: la dngos po de nyid du snang tsam na des
NK085(ru)002:2694: nges par brtags mi tshugs te /
NK085(ru)002:2695: mi rtag cing mi brtan la 'gyur ba'i chos can bas rdzun zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2696: rnam grangs kyi kun brtags mthun par bden pa med
NK085(ru)002:2697: pas rdzun kha sprod nyid rang rang gi dngos po
NK085(ru)002:2698: la snang tsam de nyid na gzhan ngo la mi
NK085(ru)002:2700: bltos pa'ang ring thung la sogs pa'i dngos po de
NK085(ru)002:2701: nyid snang tsam na ring ba ma grub pas thung
NK085(ru)002:2703: bltos pa thams cad la de dang mtshung pas rdzun zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2704: 'o na rnam pa thams cad du bden med dam zhe na ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:2705: thams cad rang rig snang phyir bden zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:2706: kun brtags rnam pa gsum la sogs pa thams cad ma 'gags kyang /
NK085(ru)002:2707: sems rang rig pa nyid du dbyer med cing rang
NK085(ru)002:2708: rig pa nyid chos thams cad du ma 'gags par
NK085(ru)002:2709: snang ba'i phyir dus gsum du mi 'gyur bas bden
NK085(ru)002:2710: pa chen po'o // des na chos thams cad byang
NK085(ru)002:2711: chub sems bden pa gsum dbyer med pa'i ngang du
NK085(ru)002:2713: yod med la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi bye brag
NK085(ru)002:2714: tshig tu ci ltar smras kyang 'dzin pa bral bas
NK085(ru)002:2715: nyes pas mi gos pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2716: zhe la 'dzin pa mi mnga' bas bsags pa dang
NK085(ru)002:2717: sbyangs pa gnyis snang ba'i 'bras bu theg pa mchog
NK085(ru)002:2718: gi rten gyi gang zag gi skyes bu'i yul du
NK085(ru)002:2719: bstan to // gnod pa'i rdzun bzhi nas dkon mchog gsum dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2720: sangs rgyas dkon mchog la gnod pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2721: gzugs brnyan gyi bye brag rnams bshig pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2722: chos dkon mchog brtan pa'i glegs bam la gnod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2723: dge 'dun dkon mchog ste gnyis gnod par 'ongs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2724: rdo rje slob dpon dang grogs mched la gnod pa byed du 'ongs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2725: spyir sems can che 'phra gang dang gang la gnod
NK085(ru)002:2726: pa byed du 'ongs pa'i sdig can gang dang gang
NK085(ru)002:2727: yin pa de la gnod pas mi thengs pa'i thabs
NK085(ru)002:2728: kyi rdzun gang dang gang yin pa bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:2729: dper na dmags mang po yod bya ba'am /
NK085(ru)002:2731: phyir bzlog pa'i thabs kyi sbyor ba byed bya ba
NK085(ru)002:2732: la sogs pa smra ba ni gong ma gsum po
NK085(ru)002:2733: la'o // sems can yong la gnod pa ni mi
NK085(ru)002:2734: dang ri dwags la sogs pa thams cad de mi
NK085(ru)002:2736: gnas pa'i lung pa las gzhan bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2737: phu mda' gnyis kyang so so log par smra ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2738: theg pa 'di yi skabs su de lta bu ni dam tshig yin pas bya zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:2740: gang la gsang bar bya ba zhes pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2742: dam nyams dam med la sogs pa thugs kyis dam tshig gi skabs su bshad pa de dag go //
NK085(ru)002:2743: dngos gang na gsang bar bya ba thugs kyi dam tshig gi rnam grangs rnams te /
NK085(ru)002:2744: nye bar bsdu ba gsang ba bcu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2745: gzhi de nyid la yul rnams kyis dri na gsang
NK085(ru)002:2746: bya'i ngos nas bcu yod pa las de dag mi
NK085(ru)002:2748: de yang lta spyod sgom gsum dang /
NK085(ru)002:2751: grub rtags bzhi la gang dang gang dri na yang /
NK085(ru)002:2752: dngos po min pa'i gang dang gang smra ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2753: bsrung ba bcu ga la de bzhin du sbyar ro //
NK085(ru)002:2754: bsrung ba bcu bdun nyams su blang zhes pa zhabs bsdu ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2755: 'chad pa'i bsrung thabs gnyis po'i sgo nas bsrung ba'i rnam grangs bcu bdun te /
NK085(ru)002:2759: don de nyid lam pa'i nyams su blang bya'i dngos po'o //
NK085(ru)002:2760: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:2761: gsang ba'i don drang po smra ba ma yin cing
NK085(ru)002:2762: phan pa'i chos su 'gyur ba'i rdzun smra ba ni
NK085(ru)002:2763: dam tshig ste / gsang skabs med par rang rgyal bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2764: gzhan la gnod par smra ba ni nyams pa zhes pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2765: ma byin par len pa la gnyis kyi rgyas pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:2766: zhing bcu gyur pa'i nor bcu dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2767: thugs rjes bsgral ba'i zhing du gyur pa'i bshad pa'i
NK085(ru)002:2768: bcu po ni thabs ci'i sgo nas kyang 'dul te
NK085(ru)002:2769: / grangs bcu po de nyid kyi longs spyod kyi
NK085(ru)002:2770: yo byad rnams kyang phrogs la 'chad pa bzhin tshogs
NK085(ru)002:2771: / su 'bul ba'o // 'o na rgyu la sgrol
NK085(ru)002:2772: ba bdun la lha btub na 'bras bu ngan song
NK085(ru)002:2773: gsum la ci ltar bya zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:2774: de ni gong du bstan pa ltar ting nge 'dzin
NK085(ru)002:2775: gyi 'phro 'dus sbyangs nas sdug bsngal thams cad bsreg
NK085(ru)002:2776: pa ni nor 'phrog pa yin no //
NK085(ru)002:2777: de nyid mi gnas par byas pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:2778: tshogs su phul ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2779: mtshan ldan gzungs zhes pa bshad pa'i rigs dang mtshan
NK085(ru)002:2780: nyid dang ldan pa bcu gnyis dang bcu drug la
NK085(ru)002:2781: sogs pa lo'i chos rdzogs pa gnyen drang la sogs
NK085(ru)002:2782: pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa thabs dang shes rab
NK085(ru)002:2783: ya ma bral ba'i rtags su gzungs su gyur pa
NK085(ru)002:2784: ste / de lta bu la brten nas thabs kyi
NK085(ru)002:2785: lam gyis mchog thun gyi 'bras bu snang bas brkus
NK085(ru)002:2786: dang phrogs kyang dam tshig gi ngo bo /
NK085(ru)002:2787: bkra shis rdzas zhes pa de la brten nas dngos grub snang ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:2788: bam skye ba bdun pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2790: sba bar bya ba'i chos kyi ngo bo dam rdzas b+han d+ha mtshan ldan dang /
NK085(ru)002:2791: thugs kyi skabs su bshad pa'i gsang bar 'os pa'i
NK085(ru)002:2792: rnam grangs rnams so so skye bo tha mal bas
NK085(ru)002:2794: byin can rdzas ni gong ma rnams kyi byin rlabs
NK085(ru)002:2795: dang ldan pa b+han d+ha mtshan ldan dang rnge'u chung
NK085(ru)002:2796: dang rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2797: de nyid bsten pa tsam gyis byin rlabs 'byung ba'i
NK085(ru)002:2798: dam rdzas slob dpon pad+ma'i dung grags chen grags chung
NK085(ru)002:2799: lta bu'o // bsrung ba yod dam zhes pa sa
NK085(ru)002:2800: 'og gi gter 'dres bdag pa med pa'i gter ni
NK085(ru)002:2801: lta bu'o // 'dre med pa'o // phyug po ni mi yo byad mang po can la /
NK085(ru)002:2802: ser snas bcings pa ni log lta can dkon mchog
NK085(ru)002:2803: dang chos phyogs su yo byad gtong mi phod pa'o
NK085(ru)002:2804: // de dag ming gis blang zhes dang /
NK085(ru)002:2805: zhing bcur gyur pa'i nor bcu dang gter gnyis dang /
NK085(ru)002:2806: phyug po ser snas bcings pa'i nor rnams ni chags
NK085(ru)002:2807: zhen gyis bslang pa ma yin par yul rnams kyi
NK085(ru)002:2808: don du gyur pas ming gis zhes bya ste mngon
NK085(ru)002:2809: gsum du blangs la lha dkon mchog dang bla ma
NK085(ru)002:2810: la rnal 'byor pa dang yul gyi tshogs su 'gyur
NK085(ru)002:2811: bar bya ba'i phyir yul la bsod nams kyang de
NK085(ru)002:2812: ltar bsngo'o // bdag med kyi gter ni blang ste
NK085(ru)002:2813: de ltar byas pas bsod nams yong la bsngo bar
NK085(ru)002:2814: ltar bsngo'o // mthun no // mtshan ldan gzugs la
NK085(ru)002:2815: sogs pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi chags zhen spangs
NK085(ru)002:2816: te dngos grub gyi rten bya ba'i phyir ming gis
NK085(ru)002:2817: mngon du blangs la tshogs su 'gyur bas bar pa
NK085(ru)002:2820: dam tshig bcu bdun zhes pa bsrung ba las mi
NK085(ru)002:2821: 'da' ba'i dam tshig /zhing bcur gyur pa'i nor bcu
NK085(ru)002:2822: dang / mtshan ldan gzungs la sogs pa bdun dang
NK085(ru)002:2823: bcu bdun ni rten gyis spyad par bya ba'i dam
NK085(ru)002:2824: tshig yin pas bya zhes gdams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2825: don de nyid kyang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:2826: ser snas bcings pa'i yo byad dang /
NK085(ru)002:2827: dngos grub kyi rdzas tha mal pas 'chad pa rnams
NK085(ru)002:2828: blangs te byin rlabs kyi rten du bya ba ni
NK085(ru)002:2829: dam tshig go // rang rgyal du gzhan gyi yo byad phrogs pa ni nyams pa'o zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:2830: ngag barlanga po la gsum gyi dang po ni bzhi bcu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2831: de yang zhing tha ba la sa bon btab ste
NK085(ru)002:2832: rmos nas chu lud kyis bran te 'bras bu smin
NK085(ru)002:2833: nas yang gsos su gyur pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:2834: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i rgyud nyon mongs pa'i tha rgod
NK085(ru)002:2835: la gsang sngags kyi 'phrin las kyis bshad pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:2836: tshogs gnyis su byas nas 'bras bu lhun gyis grub
NK085(ru)002:2837: pas so // yang na zhing de dag theg pa
NK085(ru)002:2838: mchog gi rten kyi gang zag gis yal bar mi
NK085(ru)002:2839: pas so // 'dor bas so // bcu ni rgyu 'bras kyi grangs te bshad pa nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:2840: gdul bya gyur pa'i sems can ni zhing nyid khams gsum pa yin pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2841: yul de nyid la barlanga tshig bcu yi zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:2842: yul nyid khong nas skrag par byed pa la ni
NK085(ru)002:2844: grangs nges pa med kyang yul gyis phye bas bcu zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2845: zhe bcad pa ni bshad pa'i tshig nyid kyis gdugs
NK085(ru)002:2846: sems khong nas zhi ste zhe sdang chags pa lta
NK085(ru)002:2847: bu'o // ci ni de nyid kyi sar mi 'jog pa ste don la sbyor ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2848: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshig ni drag shul spyod pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2849: de yang drag shul ni dngos su sems tshar gcod
NK085(ru)002:2850: par byed par byed pa spyod pa barlanga mo nyid
NK085(ru)002:2851: de / de nyid ma bskul ba las kyi sngags da ha dad pa tsa lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:2852: sgra yi sgo nas sod cig dang /
NK085(ru)002:2853: rgyob cig dang tshos shig chings shig la sogs pas drag sngags rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:2854: de gnyis ni bsgral ba'i zhing bcu la shes cha ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2855: 'o na gong du'ang barlanga tshig smos la /
NK085(ru)002:2856: 'dir yang drag shul spyod pa'i sngags zhes pas ma bldabs sam zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:2858: gong ma ni 'jig rten gyi gtam gyi ngos nas yin la /
NK085(ru)002:2859: 'dir nas 'phrin las kyi dus kyi drag sngags so //
NK085(ru)002:2860: yang na bsgral zhing gang yin pa de rten gyi gang zag ting nge 'dzin la dbang bas /
NK085(ru)002:2861: dang po ngag gi spyo brgyad kyis zhe bcad nas
NK085(ru)002:2862: nga rgyal chag ste sems rnal mar gnas pa ste
NK085(ru)002:2863: / ting nge 'dzin dang drag sngags kyis lus sems
NK085(ru)002:2864: phral ba la ni drag shul spyod pa'i sngags dag
NK085(ru)002:2865: / ces gsung ste / tshig 'tshams kyi cing zhes pas kyang gsal lo //
NK085(ru)002:2866: gzungs la zhes pa bshad pa bzhin du dbang dang
NK085(ru)002:2867: bsgrub pa'i skabs su thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
NK085(ru)002:2868: par dngos su nyams su blang ba'i tshe theg pa
NK085(ru)002:2869: 'og ma'i spang bya barlanga por sbyor ba'i dus su
NK085(ru)002:2870: sa ma ya ho la sogs pa brda' tshig rnams
NK085(ru)002:2872: sa ma ya ho la sogs sgra /
NK085(ru)002:2873: 'jig rten bstan chos la med cing //
NK085(ru)002:2874: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brdar gyur pa //
NK085(ru)002:2876: dang ni rim pa bzhin 'chad pa rnams sdud pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2877: chos kyi snod du rung ba'i slob ma rnams kyi snod bcos pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2878: thos bsam gyi dus su brtson 'grus la bskul ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2879: bsgrub pa la nan tan byed pa'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)002:2880: dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir dang /
NK085(ru)002:2881: chos dang mi mthun pa byed pa rnams spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2882: phyis mi 'byung ba'i phyir mi chos dang lha dam
NK085(ru)002:2883: gyi 'tshang nas bru ba yan chad kyi bka' bkyon
NK085(ru)002:2885: sems med dma' bar byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:2886: de nyid kyis don la sbyor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2887: 'byung po zhes pa mi ma yin pas bar chod kyi tshogs te bsgrub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2888: tha mal pa'i skabs su 'byung po'i cho 'phrul ci
NK085(ru)002:2889: ltar byung yang gdong thug la lta sgom spyod pa'i
NK085(ru)002:2890: gding dang ldan par byas nas yul de dag zhe
NK085(ru)002:2891: gcod par byed pa'i drag po'i phrin las kyi gzhung
NK085(ru)002:2892: nyams su blangs te sngags dang gyer mo rnam pa
NK085(ru)002:2893: gnyis / sems rngam pa ting de 'dzin 'phang mtho ba /
NK085(ru)002:2894: lus rngam pa stangs stabs dang phyag rgya /
NK085(ru)002:2895: ngag rngam pa gad pa ngar gyi sgra dang bcas pa bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2896: snod ldan zhes pa rgyud nas smos pa'i snod kyi mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan te /
NK085(ru)002:2897: bshad pa'i bcos pa'ang mi dgos pa lta bu la barlanga chos te /
NK085(ru)002:2898: lta ba barlanga bar chos mnyam pa nyid gcig tshad du bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2899: spyod pa barlanga ba stan 'gan la sogs pa rnams dngos su bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2900: bsgom pa barlanga pa tshe gcig gis 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ye bshad pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2901: zhabs bsdu ba ni ngag gi zhis pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2902: ngag gi las yin pa nyid nyams su blang ba las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig te /
NK085(ru)002:2903: zhing bcu yul gyis phye bas bcu /
NK085(ru)002:2904: phyin chad la lnga dang bco lnga /
NK085(ru)002:2905: de nyams su blangs ba las mi 'da' ba la bsrung zhes 'chad do //
NK085(ru)002:2906: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:2907: bka' las 'gal zhing mched la 'khus pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2908: dpon dang mched dang 'khor dang gnyen dang 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa rnams /
NK085(ru)002:2909: log cing 'gal bar byed pa la zhib dang nges
NK085(ru)002:2910: pas 'dul na ngag barlanga pos 'chos pa dam tshig
NK085(ru)002:2911: go // 'gal ba med pa dang thub tshad la
NK085(ru)002:2912: ngang barlanga por smra ba ni nyams pa'o zhes so
NK085(ru)002:2913: go // // des na spyad pa'i dam tshig lnga
NK085(ru)002:2914: po yang rten gyi gang zag ni smos pa nyid
NK085(ru)002:2915: go // // do // yul ni sgrol ba la sogs pa lnga po nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:2916: bsrung tshul ni nyams su blang ba'i thabs rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:2917: de nyid nyams su blangs nas ma 'das pa ni bsrung ba rang gi ngo bo'o //
NK085(ru)002:2918: rgyud tshod mthon dman gyi bye brag ni las dang po'i dus su mos pas nyams su blang la /
NK085(ru)002:2919: rigs chen 'byed pa'i skabs su ni ting nge 'dzin dang dngos 'dzom pas nyams su blang la /
NK085(ru)002:2920: zag med mngon du gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyis gzhan snang nyams su myong ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:2921: yul lnga po nyid la rtsing zhib kyi bye brag ni dpyad par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2922: dus ni dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:2923: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga ni dus la bab pa rim par shes nas bsrung zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:2924: yul lnga po nyid thad so gang bab kyi skabs
NK085(ru)002:2925: su nyams su blang ste bsrung ba las mi 'da'
NK085(ru)002:2926: ba'o // mi spang pa'i dam tshig la mdor bstan
NK085(ru)002:2927: pa ni mi spang zhes pa la sogs pa ste
NK085(ru)002:2928: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dug lnga nyid yo ga
NK085(ru)002:2929: man chod kyi theg pa rnams kyi spang bya yin
NK085(ru)002:2930: pa las theg pa 'di nyid kyis ma spang ste
NK085(ru)002:2931: lam gyi ngo bor byas nas de las mi 'da'
NK085(ru)002:2933: de bshad par dam bca' ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:2934: yang dag dug lnga zhes pa bshad pa'i lta ba lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:2936: de nyid ni 'bras bu'i thabs kyi ngo bo nyid
NK085(ru)002:2937: yin pas yang dag ces te log pa dang chos
NK085(ru)002:2938: mthun pa yod pas dug lnga zhes smos kyang 'dir
NK085(ru)002:2939: mtshon pa'i phyir na tha snyad tsam mo //
NK085(ru)002:2940: yang na log dug nyid gong ma'i stobs kyis bcud len bdud rtsir bsgyur ba lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2941: log dug lnga zhes pa 'dod chags la sogs lngas thar pa'i 'bras bu gcod cing /
NK085(ru)002:2942: 'khor ba la log par mched pas dug ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:2943: dug khong du song na sdug bsngal bskyed cing srog
NK085(ru)002:2944: gcod pa dang 'dra bar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bskyed
NK085(ru)002:2945: cing thar pa'i bde ba gcod pas so //
NK085(ru)002:2946: chung yang 'phel ba dang 'dra bar nyon mongs pa
NK085(ru)002:2947: rgyu 'bras stobs su gyur nas 'khor ba 'ba' zhig
NK085(ru)002:2948: du snang ba'o // rgyas pa la gnyis kyi dang po yang dag dug lnga bsten te /
NK085(ru)002:2949: de la lnga las thabs kyis zin pa'i 'dod chags
NK085(ru)002:2950: ni bshad pa'i thabs mkhas zhes pa la sogs pa
NK085(ru)002:2951: ste / ga na'i dam tshig tu bshad pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:2952: thabs mkhas pa ni btsan dug srog gcod pa'i bdag
NK085(ru)002:2953: nyid yin yang sman dang sngags kyis bcud len du
NK085(ru)002:2954: byas te tshe'i rig 'dzin grub pa dang 'dra bar
NK085(ru)002:2955: 'dod chags nyid khams gsum 'grub byed kyi rtsa ba
NK085(ru)002:2956: ste / yin yang / theg pa mchog gi lugs
NK085(ru)002:2957: kyis lta spyod sgom gsum ldan pas nyams su blangs
NK085(ru)002:2958: te de nyid kyis 'bras bu mngon du snang ste
NK085(ru)002:2959: nyon mongs pa ming yang ma dmigs pa ni thabs
NK085(ru)002:2960: ste / yin yang / mkhas pa'o // 'dod chags
NK085(ru)002:2961: ni sbyor thabs sum brgya drug bcu'i sgo nas rang
NK085(ru)002:2962: byung gi ye shes snang ba ste chos mthun pa
NK085(ru)002:2964: lta ba ni 'dod spyod ces pas 'dod pa'i yon
NK085(ru)002:2965: tan rnam pa lnga dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur
NK085(ru)002:2966: pa thams cad don dam byang sems su bshad pa
NK085(ru)002:2967: bzhin sems nyid kyi ngang du gsal te /
NK085(ru)002:2968: mi 'gag pa'i rgyan thams cad rang byung ye shes
NK085(ru)002:2969: su gsal ba'i de nyid shes te goms lhun gyis
NK085(ru)002:2970: grub na / gnas skabs de'i tshe na shin tu
NK085(ru)002:2971: zhen pa zhes pa 'og ma dag gi yul dang
NK085(ru)002:2972: yul can du zhen pa yin la /
NK085(ru)002:2973: 'dir bshad pa'i lta spyod gnyis la yul dang yul
NK085(ru)002:2974: can med de chu dang bsher ba bzhin ched gnyer
NK085(ru)002:2975: med pa la ni shin tu zhen pa zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:2976: ste / de nyid ni theg pa mchog gi ma nor ba'i lam du gsungs te /
NK085(ru)002:2977: sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las dug lnga zhes bya ba'i
NK085(ru)002:2978: dam tshig ni zhes pas la sogs pa rgyas par
NK085(ru)002:2979: gsungs so // 'o na rtsa ba dang yan lag khyad med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:2980: rtsa ba ni lta ba nyid shes bya'i yul du
NK085(ru)002:2981: bstan la 'dir ni de nyid yul dang yul can
NK085(ru)002:2982: med par mi 'byed par nyid 'dod chags zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:2983: ste yan lag gi cha lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2984: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:2985: 'dod chags chos nyid la ting nge 'dzin chags pa dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2986: 'dod pa dngos po la chags pa nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:2987: zhe sdang ni zhing bcu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:2988: de yang bshad pa'i zhing bcu nyid yul dang phrad
NK085(ru)002:2989: pa'i tshe yam bar mi 'dor nas lus sems phral
NK085(ru)002:2990: ba byed pa ni brlag byed ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:2991: 'jig rten pa dang mthun par zhe sdang lta bur snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:2992: 'dir theg pa mchog gi snying rjes gzhi bzung ste
NK085(ru)002:2993: zhing bcu rgyu 'bras sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i ngos nas
NK085(ru)002:2995: nyams su blangs pa nyid kyis dam tshig rdzogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:2996: yul nyid bsags pa med par 'bras bu la sbyor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:2997: de rnams kyis mchog ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:2998: de nas gzhan las kyang gdug la rtag du byams ldan pa zhes pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:2999: de nyid ni spyod pa'i ngos nas yin te /
NK085(ru)002:3000: gong du bshad pa'i ni ngo bo dngos yin la /
NK085(ru)002:3001: 'di nyid ni zhe sdang gi chos mthun tsam mo //
NK085(ru)002:3002: lta ngan zhes pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba ste theg dman gnyis /
NK085(ru)002:3003: rdul phra rab skad cig ma don dam 'dod pa lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:3004: theg chen pa dag bden pa res 'jog du byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3005: kri ya ba dag kun rdzob rigs gsum du brlab bya rlob byed du 'dod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3006: ye shes sems dpa' grogs su bstan nas dngos grub
NK085(ru)002:3007: re ba bzhin ni re 'dzin dang bcas pa nyid
NK085(ru)002:3008: du sgrib byed du gyur pas lta ngan zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:3009: ste / 'di nyid du de rnams bsal spangs med par rtogs pa bzhin dang /
NK085(ru)002:3011: mnyam pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis sems nyid snang stong
NK085(ru)002:3012: dang bral ba bden pa gsum pa'i ngang du 'joms
NK085(ru)002:3013: pas chad 'dzin thams cad dang bral ba ni lta
NK085(ru)002:3014: ba ste / de bzhin te zhes pa bshad pa
NK085(ru)002:3015: bzhin zhe sdang yin kyang gtan tshig gong ma'i mchog
NK085(ru)002:3016: ba ste / ste / thabs la mkhas pas zhes
NK085(ru)002:3017: pa 'di'i sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni bshad
NK085(ru)002:3018: pa bzhin thabs la mkhas pa yin pas nyams su
NK085(ru)002:3019: blang ba las mi 'da' bas na spyod pa yin
NK085(ru)002:3020: ba ste / ste / zhes bya'o // de yang
NK085(ru)002:3021: dam tshig bkod las zhe sdang log pa dang gol
NK085(ru)002:3022: ba la sdang ba dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3023: ma nyes pa dang thub pa la sdang ba nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3024: nga rgyal ni mngon par mthong ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3025: rang rig pa'i mngon gsum du gyur ba'i chos byang
NK085(ru)002:3026: chub sems kyi dam tshig tu bshad pa bzhin ni
NK085(ru)002:3027: gsang sngags yo ga man chad gang gi yang spyod
NK085(ru)002:3028: yul du ma gyur pa dang snang stong la sogs
NK085(ru)002:3029: pa gang gi yang mthas ma reg pa'i phyir ri
NK085(ru)002:3030: rab dang chos mthun pas mtho ba zhes bya ste
NK085(ru)002:3031: / don de nyid la lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:3033: zhes pa dang mtshungs pas yul bral gyi ye shes nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:3034: 'on kyang 'di ni lta ba'i ngang las mi 'gyur ba tsam la brjod do //
NK085(ru)002:3035: ting nge 'dzin zhes pa don skye ba med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3036: yi ge lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:3037: nges pa ni yid kyis 'dres goms su gyur pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3038: de nyid 'gal rkyen gang gis kyang mi shigs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3039: nam mkha' bzhin lhun gyis grub pas gnyen po dang bral ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3040: yul yul can med pas mi 'gyur ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:3041: don des bsran tshugs pa ni shin du rgyal ba
NK085(ru)002:3042: zhes pa 'og ma rnams ni yul dang yun can
NK085(ru)002:3043: yod pas 'gyur ba dang bcas la /
NK085(ru)002:3044: 'di nyid rigs pa la gdeng du thon te nam
NK085(ru)002:3045: mkha' stong gsal las mi 'gyur ba bzhin pas shin
NK085(ru)002:3047: mchog ni don de nyid mthar thug pa dang 'bras bu nyid yin pas so //
NK085(ru)002:3049: nga rgyal bsnyems pa'i dgongs pa yis /
NK085(ru)002:3050: dbye gsal mi mdzad nges pa'i thugs zhes lha mo sgyu 'phrul las gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:3051: dam tshig bkod pa las kyang /
NK085(ru)002:3052: nga rgyal bdud kyis bslus pa'i mi tshugs shing /
NK085(ru)002:3053: rdo rje theg pa la bsran tshugs pa dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3054: bden pa med par log pa'i phyogs la 'chol zhing che ba nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3056: gti mug ni lta ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste thos bsam gyis don thag chad de /
NK085(ru)002:3057: lta ba blo dngos 'phrod nas rig pa la 'jal
NK085(ru)002:3058: bas phyogs ris mi phyed ces pas 'khor 'das kyi
NK085(ru)002:3059: chos thams cad sems nyid kyi ngang du gsal bas
NK085(ru)002:3060: gser las byas pa'i rdzas rnams gser du gcig pa
NK085(ru)002:3061: bzhin / 'khor ba ngan pa byas pa'i phyogs ris dang /
NK085(ru)002:3062: 'das pa bzang po byas pa'i mi phyed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3063: snang grags kyi chos la yul dang dbang po'i phyogs ris mi phyed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3064: che chung la sogs pa'i phyogs ris mi phyed de /
NK085(ru)002:3065: gzung 'dzin gzhi dag pa ni 'byed pa med pa theg pa chen po'i gti mug go //
NK085(ru)002:3066: gding de mnga' nas de dag dang mthun pa'i spyod
NK085(ru)002:3067: pa dam rdzas lnga dang sha lnga la sogs pa
NK085(ru)002:3068: la gtsang ma blang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3069: mi gtsang ba dor ba'i spyod mi bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3070: blang dor med pa nyid nyams su len par bya ba ni lta spyod ya ma bral ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:3071: theg pa chen po zhes pa bshad pa'i lta spyod
NK085(ru)002:3072: gnyis dang ldan pa'i don gyis tshe gcig gis 'bras
NK085(ru)002:3073: bu la sbyor ba ni kun shong kun 'jug 'dir
NK085(ru)002:3074: bde bas / theg pa che zhes brjod pa yin /
NK085(ru)002:3076: gti mug ni thams cad la 'byed pa med pa bshad pa ltar ro //
NK085(ru)002:3077: des na dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3078: gti mug phyogs ris med cing ci la yang mi rtog pa dam pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3079: bstan pa nyan mi shes dge sdig la 'dzem pa med pa nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3080: 'phrag dog ni lta spyod ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3081: lta bas lta spyod dman pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3082: yo ga man chod lta dman yin te phyogs 'dzin
NK085(ru)002:3083: dang bcas pa spyod pa dman te spang blang dang
NK085(ru)002:3084: bcas theg pa so so rnams /
NK085(ru)002:3085: 'di nyid kyi don mthong bar mi nus pas na dman pa zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3086: yul de dag la 'phrag dog pa ni de dag dang mi gcig cing der mi gnas pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3087: rang gi lta spyod las mi 'gyur ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3088: sbyod pa'i ngos nas dam ma 'dres pa dam tshig ma 'dres pa'i sngags su zhugs pa lta bu'am /
NK085(ru)002:3089: thugs kyi dam tshig gi skabs su bshad pa'i yul rnams dang lhan gcig tu mi gnas te /
NK085(ru)002:3090: bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i skabs su spong bar byed
NK085(ru)002:3091: pa ni bshad pa gnyis po dang ldan pas 'phrag
NK085(ru)002:3093: de las mi 'da' bas dam tshig nyams su blangs ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:3095: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3096: 'phrag dog chos nyid las gal mi 'dzug cing yang
NK085(ru)002:3097: dag pa la 'dzin rtog ming yang med par gnas
NK085(ru)002:3099: gzhan nyams pa med par grogs mched la 'phrag dog pa nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3101: log dug lnga la bzhi'i bstan pa'i dang po 'gro
NK085(ru)002:3102: ba la rang chas su ldan par bstan pa ni
NK085(ru)002:3103: log pa'i lam du khrid par byed pa'i bdag nyid
NK085(ru)002:3104: nyon mongs pa lnga ni mdor bstan du bshad pa
NK085(ru)002:3105: bzhin pas khams gsum gyi sems can kun la rang
NK085(ru)002:3106: chas su ldan te rgyu de yi las snang zhing
NK085(ru)002:3107: de dang mi gnyis shing de la longs spyod pas
NK085(ru)002:3108: so // 'phro tshol ba ni de nyid rang rgyud
NK085(ru)002:3109: du grub pa med de dug lnga sems yin par
NK085(ru)002:3110: bstan pa ni dug lnga rang rig rang snang phyir
NK085(ru)002:3111: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3112: de yang zhe sdang mnar sems dgu dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ltar snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:3113: rang rig pa nyid snang ba las ma rtogs pa yul du grub pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3114: 'dod chags yul dang yul can chags shing zhen pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /
NK085(ru)002:3115: gti mug 'byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /
NK085(ru)002:3116: nga rgyal rang gi ngo bo la mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3117: 'phrag dog yul mi 'jug pa ste zhe sdang gi
NK085(ru)002:3118: skabs su bshad pa dang mthun par sems nyid rang
NK085(ru)002:3119: snang ba'i gtan tshigs kyis dran pa ni yul du
NK085(ru)002:3120: gyur pa ste / mig gi yul du gyur pa gzugs snang yang /
NK085(ru)002:3121: shes pa zhes pas yid kyi shes pa yang 'gags
NK085(ru)002:3122: par snang bar gzugs su snang ba las ma gtogs
NK085(ru)002:3123: pa yul du gyur pa phra rab kyang med pa
NK085(ru)002:3124: dang / thams cad kyi sgras dbang po lnga'i yul
NK085(ru)002:3125: lnga ste gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya lnga ci
NK085(ru)002:3126: ltar snang yang gsal ba ma 'gags pa yid kyi
NK085(ru)002:3127: yul du gyur pa la ni dran pa zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:3128: ste gsal ba'i cha tsam mo //
NK085(ru)002:3129: don de nyid la bzang ba la 'dod chags ngan pa la zhe sdang /
NK085(ru)002:3130: bar pa la gti mug /rang gi ngo bo nyid
NK085(ru)002:3131: las mi 'gyur zhing don de nyid kyis gzhan pa
NK085(ru)002:3132: dma' bar 'dod pa ni nga rgyal dang 'phrag dog
NK085(ru)002:3133: dus gcig ste / de thams cad dran par 'dus so //
NK085(ru)002:3134: dran pa nyid gang zhe na yid kyis shes pa ma 'gags par gsal ba snang ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:3135: yid kyi shes pa'i lam mig gi dbang la phyungs
NK085(ru)002:3136: nas yul gzugs la dug lngar bsags dang de bzhin
NK085(ru)002:3137: du snang ba la shul phyungs te sgra dang /
NK085(ru)002:3138: sna la shul phyungs te dri dang /
NK085(ru)002:3140: lus kyi lam las reg bya ni yid kyi shes pa gcig pu snang bar byed pa'i gzhi la /
NK085(ru)002:3141: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad
NK085(ru)002:3142: kyang yid kyi shes pa nyid las snang ba yin
NK085(ru)002:3143: pas shes pa thams cad ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3144: rtsol ba ni yid kyi shes pa /
NK085(ru)002:3146: de yid kyi shes pa skad cig ma nyid yul la g.yo bar byas pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3147: 'on kyang tha snyad tsam du brjod kyang skad cig tsam gyi snga phyi dang bral ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3148: g.yo byed kyi rtsol ba nyid sems phyir zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:3149: yul dang dbang po thams cad rang bzhin rnal ma
NK085(ru)002:3151: ngo bo nyid 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral zhing
NK085(ru)002:3152: dus gsum du mi 'gyur la 'byung gzhir gyur pa
NK085(ru)002:3153: ste dgongs pa 'dus las sems zhes pa ni ma
NK085(ru)002:3155: yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa la bya'o zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3157: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni //
NK085(ru)002:3158: pho mo ma yin ma ning min //
NK085(ru)002:3159: kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin //
NK085(ru)002:3160: zhes pa la sogs rgyas pa gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:3161: des na 'khor 'das thams cad sems nyid la dbyer med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:3162: thabs mkhas zhes pas nam mkha' ni med la zad mi shes /
NK085(ru)002:3163: stong la thams cad 'byung bas thabs mkhas pa ste
NK085(ru)002:3164: sems kyi chos nyid dpe bzhin gar yang ma grub
NK085(ru)002:3165: pa nyid cir yang mi 'gags pas thabs mkhas pas
NK085(ru)002:3166: dug lnga rang rgyud med par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:3167: de nyid ye shes su lhun gyis grub pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3168: thabs mkhas zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'khor 'das
NK085(ru)002:3169: kyi ngo bo nyid sems nyid thabs mkhas pa'i bdag
NK085(ru)002:3170: nyid ni rgyu rkyen dang bral ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3171: yul med te thams cad bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis grub pa la ni rang zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3172: stong pa phyogs gcig pa'am bem po lta bu ma
NK085(ru)002:3173: yin te gsal la 'gag pa med pas reg ces
NK085(ru)002:3174: te / de nyid byas pa pos ma byas shing
NK085(ru)002:3175: glo bur du byung par ma yin pas ye shes
NK085(ru)002:3176: zhes pa ste ye nas gnas pa'i don gsal la
NK085(ru)002:3178: de nyid dpes mtshon na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mun pa gtan nas grub ma myong ste /
NK085(ru)002:3179: gsal nas dag pa ma yin la 'gro ba la
NK085(ru)002:3180: 'grib pa ltar snang yang nyi ma rang ngo la
NK085(ru)002:3182: snang grags kyi chos thams cad bshad pa'i gtan tshigs
NK085(ru)002:3183: kyis rang byung ye shes rang snang ba las ma
NK085(ru)002:3184: gtogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:3185: khams gsum 'khor ba'i chos spang bar bya ba ngang gis med de /
NK085(ru)002:3186: gong du dug lnga'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ltar lhun
NK085(ru)002:3187: gyis grub pas ma 'gags pa tsam snang yang yul
NK085(ru)002:3189: gzhi la ma grub par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:3190: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3191: dran pa thams cad shes pa /
NK085(ru)002:3192: shes pa thams cad rtsol ba /
NK085(ru)002:3193: rtsol ba thams cad thabs mkhas pa /
NK085(ru)002:3194: thabs mkhas thams cad rang rig pa'i ye shes te /
NK085(ru)002:3195: ye shes rang snang ba las ma gtogs pa rtog pa rang rgyud kyis med la /
NK085(ru)002:3196: thabs rang snang ba las ma gtogs pa nyon mongs pa rang rgyud kyis med do zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:3197: des na phyi nang gi chos thams cad ye shes rang snang zhes pas lngar brda' sprad do //
NK085(ru)002:3198: khams gsum na yang spang bya ma grub par bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3199: de shes rang rig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3200: bsnyed pa bshad pa'i don nyid rigs pa la gdeng
NK085(ru)002:3201: du son pa la ni shes zhes bya ste ngo
NK085(ru)002:3202: bo rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes chen
NK085(ru)002:3203: po'o // don de nyid las ma gtogs pa'i spang
NK085(ru)002:3204: bya'i khams gsum ni gzugs bsnyan tha snyad du'ang ma
NK085(ru)002:3205: grub pas dmigs mi 'gyur zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:3206: zhabs bsdu ba yon tan dang bcas pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3207: dam tshig bco lnga la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3208: bshad pa bzhin nyams su blang ba las mi 'da'
NK085(ru)002:3209: ba'i rnam grangs yang dag dug lnga la bcu dug
NK085(ru)002:3211: de bsrung ba la rgyun du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
NK085(ru)002:3212: chen po'ang theg pa 'di nyid kyi lam pa la
NK085(ru)002:3213: don gnyis rdzogs ni mchog dang thun mong dam bdag
NK085(ru)002:3214: gzhan gnyis kyi don te mthar phyin pa dam tshig
NK085(ru)002:3215: gi 'bras bu'o // 'di yang rten gyi gang zag
NK085(ru)002:3216: mthun pa las yul nas smos pa'i bco lnga po
NK085(ru)002:3219: spyod pas nyams su blang ste mi 'gal bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3220: rang gi ngo bo nyid nyams su len pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3221: rgyud tshod mthon dman dang ldan pa'i tshul ni zag
NK085(ru)002:3222: bcas kyi dus su mos pas nyams su len la
NK085(ru)002:3223: / zag med nas ci bzhin par nyams su len pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3224: dus ni dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3225: nyin mtshan med par bsrung zhes pas tshul gnyis pos de ltar nyams su blang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:3226: dang du blang ba la gsum gyi mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3227: kun gyis blang ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste
NK085(ru)002:3228: yo ga man chod kyis spang bar 'dod kyang zag
NK085(ru)002:3229: bcas kyi skabs su kun la rang chas su ldan
NK085(ru)002:3231: 'dir gsang sngags nang par zhugs 'tshal kun gyis ched
NK085(ru)002:3232: du blang ba las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig ste
NK085(ru)002:3234: rgyas pa la gsum gyi dang po rdzas kyi ngo
NK085(ru)002:3235: bo ni dri chen zhes pa la sogs pa ste
NK085(ru)002:3238: mang sa sha chen po dang /
NK085(ru)002:3240: dngas mar gyur pa pad ma rag ta dang /
NK085(ru)002:3241: lhag pa'i byang chub sems gong ma rnams bsdus te /
NK085(ru)002:3242: gzhi de la yon tan 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs ni /
NK085(ru)002:3243: grub pa bzhi yis brgyan pa'i phyir zhes pa la
NK085(ru)002:3244: sogs pa mdor bstan yang yin te 'chad pa'i rang
NK085(ru)002:3248: byin rlabs kyis grub pa bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:3249: de nyid kyis bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga la mtshan dpe dang 'dra bar brgyan te /
NK085(ru)002:3250: yon tan de dag rang snang ba'i phyir gtan tshigs sam dgos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3251: grub pa bzhi'i dang po mthus grub pa bstan te /
NK085(ru)002:3252: nad lnga bsal phyir blangs pa dang zhes pa dri chen gyis dug nad sel te /
NK085(ru)002:3253: de yang sbyor ba'i dug rnams kyang yin la khyad
NK085(ru)002:3254: par du klu yi bsam pa'i dug khad pa'i rnam
NK085(ru)002:3255: pa sel to // dri chus grang nad sel te
NK085(ru)002:3256: khyad par du yang pho ba la zhen pa'i grang
NK085(ru)002:3257: pa sel to // nad sel to // sha chen gyis mdze nad thams cad sel te /
NK085(ru)002:3258: khyad par du yang chu ser gyi nad sel to //
NK085(ru)002:3259: raka tas 'brum bu'i nad thams cad sel te /
NK085(ru)002:3260: khyad par du yang 'brum nag dang khyi 'brum sel to //
NK085(ru)002:3261: byang chub sems kyi tsha nad sel te khyad par
NK085(ru)002:3262: du yang tsha ba gnag pa sel bas ga bur
NK085(ru)002:3264: chos can lnga yi mthun lngas nad lnga bsal ba'i
NK085(ru)002:3265: phyir rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang ba zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:3266: dang / byin rlabs kyis grub pa ni gtsang sme sdig sbyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3267: mi gtsang bar 'dzin pa'i rtogs pa chos can lnga dngos su bshad pas nus te /
NK085(ru)002:3268: don des na gtsang ba smed 'dzin pa ni nyes pa'ang che la gzung 'dzin spang yang dka' ste /
NK085(ru)002:3269: bdud rtsi lnga blangs pas de dag dag par byas
NK085(ru)002:3270: nas 'dzin pa zhi nas blo mnyam pa nyid du
NK085(ru)002:3271: gyur pa ni sdig pa sbyang ste bya ba'ang yin
NK085(ru)002:3272: pas dgos ched de yi phyir nyams su blang ba'ang
NK085(ru)002:3273: gces so // de ni bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i ngo bo'i byin rlabs yin par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:3274: thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang bcas pa ngo bos grub pa snang ba bstan pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3275: yon tan lnga po 'di dag 'jig rten pa dang
NK085(ru)002:3276: thun mong du gyur pas na thun mongs zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:3277: ste de dag grub pa'i dgos pa chos can gyi
NK085(ru)002:3278: ngos nas lnga mtshon pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3279: des na nyams su blang ba'ang dri chen bsten pas bcud len gyis tshe ring ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3280: dri chus skad snyan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3281: tshangs pa'i skad du sgrog nus pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3282: sha chen bsten pas mthu che ste mi ma yin
NK085(ru)002:3283: pa thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis 'khol ba dang
NK085(ru)002:3284: / raka tas bkrag gsal ste 'gro ba gzhan la 'phags pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3285: byang chub sems kyis brjid pa'i gzugs thob ste 'gro ba gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3286: rang bzhin gyi grub pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3287: rigs lngar grub ces pa byang chub sems kyis rdo rje sems dpar snang la /
NK085(ru)002:3288: dri chen rnam par snang mdzad /
NK085(ru)002:3290: raka ta snang ba mtha' yas /
NK085(ru)002:3291: dri chu don yod grub pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3293: byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' dkar /
NK085(ru)002:3294: dri chen gser mdog rnam snang mdzad /
NK085(ru)002:3295: mang sa rin chen 'byung ldan sngo /
NK085(ru)002:3296: raka ta snang ba mtha' yas dmar /
NK085(ru)002:3297: dri chu don yod grub pa ljang zhes pa chos
NK085(ru)002:3298: can lnga nyid rigs lngar grub pa'i yon tan dang
NK085(ru)002:3299: ldan no // don des khams gsum gyi sdug ba
NK085(ru)002:3300: sngal rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa las grol zhing
NK085(ru)002:3301: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad snang
NK085(ru)002:3303: lam gyi ngo bor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3304: bcud lnga btung dbang lam gyi mchog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3305: bcud lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3306: de yang snod gang gi bcud zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:3307: lte ba'i rtsa nas sha chen gyi bcud /
NK085(ru)002:3308: long ka'i rtsa nas dri chen gyi bcud ro ma nas dri chu /
NK085(ru)002:3310: kun d+har ma nas byang sems kyi bcud la lnga po btung ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:3311: nyams su blang ba la dbang thabs na lam gyi
NK085(ru)002:3312: mchog ces pa thabs lam la bya ste smad par
NK085(ru)002:3313: bya ba'i rdzas kyis 'bras bu mngon gsum du snang
NK085(ru)002:3314: bas so // 'o na dud 'gro la sogs pas
NK085(ru)002:3315: nyams su blang ba la yon tan med par mngon
NK085(ru)002:3317: thabs kyi lung la bsten shes na /
NK085(ru)002:3318: zhes pa grub pa bzhis brgyan pa'i thabs chen po
NK085(ru)002:3319: gsang sngags kyi lung la bsten shes pa ni lta
NK085(ru)002:3320: spyod sgom gsum la ma cha ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3321: dus skabs de yi tshe na de nyid kyi yon
NK085(ru)002:3322: tan grub pa bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan bshad
NK085(ru)002:3323: pa rnams dang / gzhan yang yon tan bsam gyis
NK085(ru)002:3324: mi khyab pa rnams bdud rtsi'i rgyud du kun du
NK085(ru)002:3325: bzang pos rdo rje chos la gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:3327: phye ba'i dam tshig ces pa rnam grangs bshad bzhin
NK085(ru)002:3328: gyi nyams su blangs ba las mi 'da' ba'i dam
NK085(ru)002:3329: tshig gong gi lnga bzhi nyi shu dang /
NK085(ru)002:3330: rgya che ba ni rigs lnga /
NK085(ru)002:3331: zab pa ye shes lnga dang sum bcu ce'am /
NK085(ru)002:3332: yang na gong gi nyi shu'i thog du zab pa ye shes lnga /
NK085(ru)002:3333: rtsa ba bdud rtsi lnga dang sum bcu nyid skabs
NK085(ru)002:3334: kyis zhes pa mchog dang thun mong gi bsgrub pa
NK085(ru)002:3335: gnyis dang / dbang gi skabs su dang du blang
NK085(ru)002:3336: bar gsungs zhes pa kun tu bzang pos nang pa'i
NK085(ru)002:3338: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3339: dang du blang ba lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3340: dam rdzas lnga po nyid chos nyid la rtogs pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3341: rang bzhin grub pa'i mthu yod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3342: ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3343: skyon yon gyis dug dang bdud rtsi yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3344: de nyid dngos grub chen po'i rgyu dang rkyen yin
NK085(ru)002:3345: pas gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i thabs dam par spyod pa
NK085(ru)002:3347: rtogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin du mi ldan zhing
NK085(ru)002:3348: gsang med par byol song bzhin du bab chol du
NK085(ru)002:3349: spyod pa ni nyams pa'o zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:3350: 'di yang rten gyi gang zag smos pa nyid kyis
NK085(ru)002:3351: yul dang du blang ba lnga la tshul lta dgongs
NK085(ru)002:3352: dang ldan pas ngo bo nyams su blang ba nyid
NK085(ru)002:3353: du chud pa'o // rgyud la ldan pa ni zag
NK085(ru)002:3354: bcas mthon dman gyi bye brag gis mos pa dang
NK085(ru)002:3356: zag med yan chad nas spang blang thams cad dang bral ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3357: dus ni dam tshig bkod pa las dang du blang pa lnga ni dus bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)002:3358: dus drug du bsrung zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:3359: dngos su nyams su blang ba ni gsung gi dam
NK085(ru)002:3360: tshig nyams su blang ba'i skabs dang 'dzom la rgyun
NK085(ru)002:3362: bsgrub par bya ba la gsum gyi mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3363: bsgrub pas na bsgrub pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3364: lam gyi chos rnams dang bsgrub par bya bas na ste /
NK085(ru)002:3365: 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:3366: de nyid kyang rgyu yi theg pa ltar mi 'dra
NK085(ru)002:3367: bas mi 'dra ba bsgrubs pa lta bu ma yin
NK085(ru)002:3368: te yi ge slob pa ltar 'bras bu nyid la
NK085(ru)002:3369: da lta nyid nas sbyang bas na bsgrub pa bya
NK085(ru)002:3370: ba ste / lnga ni re re la yang lnga lnga rdzogs pas so //
NK085(ru)002:3371: 'chad pa rnams yo la zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3372: mdor bstan pa nyid gzhi'i ngo bo la /
NK085(ru)002:3374: rigs lnga ye shes yab yum las /
NK085(ru)002:3375: gcig la lnga lngar shes par bya zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:3377: lngar byung lngar snang lngas 'dul sgrol ces pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3378: 'chad pa bzhin pas gdul bya 'dul byed thams cad rigs lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3380: sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
NK085(ru)002:3381: yon tan rin po che'i rigs dang /
NK085(ru)002:3384: nyon mongs pa lnga las snang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3385: de nyid gdul bya'i phyir nges te /
NK085(ru)002:3386: rgya che ba na de ltar yin yang /
NK085(ru)002:3387: zab pa'i dbang du ye shes lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3388: thugs rdo rje 'gyur ba med pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnams par dag pa'i ye shes dang /
NK085(ru)002:3389: de nyid cir yang mi 'gag pa 'char ba chos
NK085(ru)002:3390: kyi dbyings las gdul bya ltar gshegs pa gsal ba
NK085(ru)002:3391: 'gag pa med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes
NK085(ru)002:3392: dang / de nyid gdul bya dang mthun par snang
NK085(ru)002:3393: yang skyon mi gos pa gsung pad ma'i rigs so
NK085(ru)002:3394: so'i rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
NK085(ru)002:3395: de nyid cir yang snang yang chos kyi dbyings las
NK085(ru)002:3396: dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba rtog pa med kyang
NK085(ru)002:3397: dgos 'dod skong ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
NK085(ru)002:3398: dang / gsung pad ma'i rigs ci ltar snang ba'i
NK085(ru)002:3399: 'gro ba'i don la yin bzhin du rol cing lhun
NK085(ru)002:3400: gyis grub pa las kyi rigs te gcig char du
NK085(ru)002:3401: lhun gyis grub pas skad cig ma snga phyi'i rgyu
NK085(ru)002:3402: 'bras ni ngang gis mi dmigs te dbang gi rgyal
NK085(ru)002:3403: po'i yon tan chos sna tshogs kyis mtshon pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:3404: dang / no // yab lnga ni mi skyod pa la sogs pa lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3405: don nyid tshig gis mtshon pa'i sgo nas brjod pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3406: chos kyi dbyings ye shes mtha' gang gis kyang mi skyod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3407: me long ye shes gsal la 'gag pa med pa
NK085(ru)002:3408: rnam par snang mdzad mnyam pa nyid ye shes snang
NK085(ru)002:3409: stong gi mtha' dang bral ba nyid yon tan gyi
NK085(ru)002:3410: 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan dang
NK085(ru)002:3411: / so sor rtog pa gdul bya'i bsam pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:3412: mthar thug pa med pas snang ba mtha' yas dang
NK085(ru)002:3413: / / bya grub ye shes 'khor ba ma stong gyi bar du 'phrin las mi zad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3414: bar ma dor chud mi za zhing 'bras bu la sbyor bar byed pa don yod grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3415: de lnga ni ma 'gag pa la snang ba'i cha 'dzin pas yab ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3416: yum lnga ni rgyu'i dus nas 'byung ba lnga chos
NK085(ru)002:3417: thams cad kyi skye byed du gnas pa yin la
NK085(ru)002:3418: / de gnas su dag pa chos kyi dbyings lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3419: de yang chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang 'dra ste
NK085(ru)002:3420: du ma med kyang yul can gyi ngos nas brjod
NK085(ru)002:3421: de ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dang /
NK085(ru)002:3424: dbyer mi phyed par bzhugs zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3425: mtshon pa'i tha snyad yin yang don la dbyer med de brjod gzhi dang bral ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3426: de nyid ma 'gag pa'i rtags tsam du mi spyod
NK085(ru)002:3427: pa'i yum kun tu bzang mo ste chos dbyings ye
NK085(ru)002:3428: shes la gzung 'dzin gyi cha phan sems phra ba'ang
NK085(ru)002:3429: mi gnas pas tha snyad du bzang zhes bya la
NK085(ru)002:3430: / rang bzhin dang yul gyi cha 'dzin pa'i ngos nas mo'o //
NK085(ru)002:3431: me long ye shes gsal la 'gag pa med pa
NK085(ru)002:3432: rang bzhin sangs rgyas spyan ma ste mi 'gag par
NK085(ru)002:3434: phyi ma bshad pa bzhin 'chad pa kun la'ang sbyar ro //
NK085(ru)002:3435: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ma 'gag par snang
NK085(ru)002:3436: ba rin chen 'byung ldan ni rtog pa med kyang
NK085(ru)002:3437: dgos 'dod skong ba'i bdag nyid du zhugs te /
NK085(ru)002:3438: de yi yum ma ma ki la yon tan thams
NK085(ru)002:3439: cad kyi skyed byed dam gzhir gyur pas ma ma
NK085(ru)002:3440: ki ste don dang mthun pa'i ming ngo //
NK085(ru)002:3441: rlan gyis thams cad bskyed du gnas pas chos mthun pa'ang yin la /
NK085(ru)002:3442: 'byung ba de nyid gnas su dag pa'ang yin no //
NK085(ru)002:3443: snang ba mtha' yas kyi yum na bza' dkar mo
NK085(ru)002:3444: ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi chos spyi
NK085(ru)002:3445: dang rang gi mtshan nyid mkhyen pa'i gtan tshigs des
NK085(ru)002:3446: 'khor 'das kyi skyon gtan nas dag pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3447: gdul bya dang yul gcig la rol kyang de'i skyon
NK085(ru)002:3448: gyis mi gos pa ni dper na dkar po la
NK085(ru)002:3449: mtshon gzhan gyis ma gos pa dang 'dra bar na
NK085(ru)002:3450: bza' dkar mo zhes bya ste gos kyi lhags pa
NK085(ru)002:3451: las skyobs pa dang 'dra bar mkhyen pa gnyis kyis
NK085(ru)002:3452: 'khor 'das kyi mtha' las skyob pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3453: don des skyon gyis ma gos pas dkar mo zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3454: 'byung ba mes dngos po thams cad bsreg par byed pa yang chos mthun no //
NK085(ru)002:3455: don yod grub pa'i yum dam tshig sgrol ma ste /
NK085(ru)002:3456: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'khor ba nas
NK085(ru)002:3457: thar pa sgrol ma las mi 'da' bas dam tshig
NK085(ru)002:3458: ste / don de nyid dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya la /
NK085(ru)002:3459: mthar sangs rgyas kyi sa la skyol bar byed pa ni sgrol ma'o //
NK085(ru)002:3460: de ni 'byung ba rlung ga nas su dag pa'ang yin te chos mthun ma'ang sbyar ro //
NK085(ru)002:3461: las ni rigs pa la sogs pa thams cad dbye ba'i gzhir bzhags pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3462: gcig la'ang lnga lngar zhes pa gong gi rigs la
NK085(ru)002:3463: sogs pa gcig la yang rdo rje la sogs pa
NK085(ru)002:3464: lnga lnga ste bshad pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:3465: shes pa bya zhes pas shes pa'i dam tshig lta
NK085(ru)002:3466: ba bsgrub pa'i sngon du 'gro bar khas blangs pa'o
NK085(ru)002:3467: // sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:3468: la sogs pa sku lnga ste chos thams cad de
NK085(ru)002:3469: kho na nyid rtogs pa mthar phyin pa dus gsum
NK085(ru)002:3470: du mi 'gyur cing dngos gzhi thams cad bral ba
NK085(ru)002:3471: nyid yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung khungs su gyur
NK085(ru)002:3472: // pa dang / 'og min gyi gnas na bzhugs
NK085(ru)002:3473: pa longs spyod thams cad la rol pa rnam par
NK085(ru)002:3474: snang mdzad lta bu sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK085(ru)002:3475: rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong bar byed pa'i
NK085(ru)002:3477: dngos gzhi ma grub kyang gdul bya 'gro drug gi
NK085(ru)002:3478: ston pa spyi dang bye brag gi dbang gis grangs
NK085(ru)002:3479: bsam gyis mi khyab pa chu zla dang me long
NK085(ru)002:3480: bzhin snang ba tha dad pa rnams dang rdo rje
NK085(ru)002:3481: sku zhes te sprul pa'i sku'i cha lag ste rdo
NK085(ru)002:3482: rje gzhom du med pa bzhin sprul pa'i skus gdul
NK085(ru)002:3483: bya dang 'khor ba la mthun snang du rol kyang
NK085(ru)002:3484: skyon gyis mi gos pa'i rdo rje'i sku dang /
NK085(ru)002:3485: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku zhes bya ste sku
NK085(ru)002:3486: gsum dbyer med kyi yon tan gyi cha rang rig
NK085(ru)002:3487: pa'i ye shes la ma skyes pa dang ma 'gag
NK085(ru)002:3488: pa gnyis kyis mtha' gnyis las rgyal bar mngon zhing
NK085(ru)002:3489: don de nyid kyis mtha' gnyis ma dmigs pas bya
NK085(ru)002:3490: ba gnyis dang / yongs su rdzogs pas chub pa gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3491: lnga po la sku zhes brjod pa ni chos sku'i skabs su brjod pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:3493: chos kyi sku yi gsung dpe nam mkha' la lta bu ste ngo bo ma grub /
NK085(ru)002:3495: 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur thams cad la khyab cing mtha' med pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3496: don de nyid mthar lam pa'i rig pa la go
NK085(ru)002:3497: zhing rtogs te brda 'jal du btub pas kyang gsung
NK085(ru)002:3498: zhes brjod la / bder gshegs thams cad dgongs pa
NK085(ru)002:3499: mthun par de nyid las mi gzhan pas kyang gsung
NK085(ru)002:3500: zhes brjod la / zhes bya'o // longs sku me long lta bu'i gsung ste /
NK085(ru)002:3501: dper na me long la brten te bzhin gyi dri
NK085(ru)002:3502: khebs rtogs pa bzhin ston pa'i sku la bltas pas
NK085(ru)002:3503: 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa
NK085(ru)002:3504: sbyong zhing dag par byed pa ni brda 'phrod cing
NK085(ru)002:3506: sprul pa'i sku yi gsung ni gsung dbyangs mes po'i
NK085(ru)002:3507: ngag lta bu zhes pas 'jig rten gyi mes po
NK085(ru)002:3508: tshangs pas gsung gcig gis stong chen pa'i 'jig rten
NK085(ru)002:3509: gyi sems can thams cad kyi skad dang mthun par
NK085(ru)002:3511: ston pas gsung gcig bsgrags pa ltar snang bas 'khor
NK085(ru)002:3512: 'gro drug gis rang rang gi skad du brda 'jal
NK085(ru)002:3513: ba ste / lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad /
NK085(ru)002:3515: de yang yan lag sum brgya drug bcu zhes pas
NK085(ru)002:3516: rtsa ba 'gro ba drug gi skad drug las re
NK085(ru)002:3517: re la yang yan lag bcu bcur phye ba la
NK085(ru)002:3518: sogs pa'o // de la ni sprul sku tshig sdeb sbyor legs pa'i gsung zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3519: rdo rje'i gsung rdo rje lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:3520: sprul pa'i skus 'khor ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ci
NK085(ru)002:3521: ltar brjod kyang 'dzin pa rtsa ba nas dag pas
NK085(ru)002:3522: brag cha dang mtshungs te nyes pa'i gzhi bral ba'o
NK085(ru)002:3523: // de nyid rig pa la 'jal te go rtogs su gtub pas gsung zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3524: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'i gsung gi dpe nyi ma'i snying po lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:3525: nyi ma nas mun pa bsal nas dag pa ma yin gtan nas grub ma myong /
NK085(ru)002:3526: dpe de bzhin du 'khor 'das thams cad kyi rang bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:3527: rang rig pa'i ye shes la gzung 'dzin gsal lam spangs nas dag pa ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:3528: gtan nas grub ma myong ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3529: de nyid la phyogs 'dzin can dag 'khor ba ni glo bur pa'o zhes smra'o //
NK085(ru)002:3530: de nyid go zhing rtogs su btub pas na gsung zhes smos so //
NK085(ru)002:3531: thugs ni ye shes lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3532: cir yang mi dmigs pa bde ba chen po'i thugs dang /
NK085(ru)002:3533: cir yang ma 'gag pa me long lta bu'i thugs dang /
NK085(ru)002:3534: cir yang mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid kyi thugs dang /
NK085(ru)002:3535: cir yang snang ba so sor rtogs pa'i thugs dang /
NK085(ru)002:3536: cir yang ma 'gag pa 'gro ba sgrol thugs so //
NK085(ru)002:3537: de dag kyang du ma'i cha nas brjod pa ma
NK085(ru)002:3538: yin te yon tan cha nas so sor brjod kyang
NK085(ru)002:3539: ngo bo dbyer med pa dbang gi rgyal po bzhin
NK085(ru)002:3540: no // yon tan lnga ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
NK085(ru)002:3541: sku las snang ste zhing khams rnam par dag pa
NK085(ru)002:3542: 'og min dang bde ba can lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:3543: pho brang rnam par dag pa rin po che las
NK085(ru)002:3544: grub pa'i gzhal yas khang gsang ba'i snying po'i gleng
NK085(ru)002:3546: gdan khri phun gsum tshogs pa thugs mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su seng+ge'i khri dang /
NK085(ru)002:3547: sku stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags su glang po'i khri dang /
NK085(ru)002:3548: yon tan rdzu 'phrul gyi skang ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su rta'i khri dang /
NK085(ru)002:3549: gsung dbang bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags su rma bya'i khri dang /
NK085(ru)002:3550: 'phrin las bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su shang shang gi khri'o //
NK085(ru)002:3551: thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan dang /
NK085(ru)002:3553: re ba skong ba rin po che'i gdan no //
NK085(ru)002:3554: 'od zer rnam par dag pa ni sku yi ba
NK085(ru)002:3555: spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'gro ba drug
NK085(ru)002:3556: 'dul ba'i 'od zer kha dog drug phyogs bcur gdul
NK085(ru)002:3557: bya'i gnas su spros pas drug bcu drug bcu zhes
NK085(ru)002:3558: brjod do // che ba'i rgyan phun sum 'tshogs pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3559: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rtags snyan cha dang /
NK085(ru)002:3561: do shal la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3562: de dag kyang rgyan dang rgyan can lta bu ni ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:3563: rig pa nyid rgyan dang rgyan can gyi tshogs su
NK085(ru)002:3564: snang ba tha snyad du sems nyid du gcig ces
NK085(ru)002:3565: brjod do // las ni lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3571: spyir mdzad pa ma 'gag pa thams cad 'phrin las
NK085(ru)002:3572: bzhi'i ngo bo yin pa ni zhib par mi spro
NK085(ru)002:3574: yongs grags kyis sbyin sreg bzhi ni /
NK085(ru)002:3575: rgya mtsho las chu yi thig pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:3576: bshad pa'i sku la sogs pa gcig la yang sku lnga phye ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3577: lnga gnyis kyi sgras gsung la sogs pa bzhi yang lnga lngar phye ba'i dus skabs na /
NK085(ru)002:3579: bcu lnga'i bye brag rnams zhes pa bshad ba'i grangs te /
NK085(ru)002:3580: lnga tshan bcu gcig gi bye brag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang /
NK085(ru)002:3581: rang bzhin ci lta ba shes par byas nas lta ba rtog pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3582: de nyams su len pa la bsgrub pa zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3583: des na bsgrub bstan pa'i skabs su shes pa'i tshig
NK085(ru)002:3584: nyis kyis bsgrub pa'i sngon du lta ba gal che
NK085(ru)002:3585: bar gdams pa'o // 'di rten kyi gang zag smos
NK085(ru)002:3586: pa nyid kyis yul bsgrub par bya ba nyid bsrung
NK085(ru)002:3587: ba'i tshul du drug gam dus bzhi'am /
NK085(ru)002:3588: chu bo ltar rgyun chad med par nyams su blangs
NK085(ru)002:3589: nas ma 'das pa ni bsrung ba rang gi ngo
NK085(ru)002:3590: bo'o // rgyud la ldan tshul ni zag bcas kyi
NK085(ru)002:3591: dus su rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor ces bya ste mos
NK085(ru)002:3592: pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3593: zag med ni rang gi mtshan nyid ldan nas mthar lam la lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3594: dus ni dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3595: dus dang rgyun chad med par bsrung zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:3596: zag bcas zag med kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gis mthar lam gyi bar du'o //
NK085(ru)002:3597: khas blangs pa'i lta ba la gsum gyi mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3598: zhes pa lnga las bye brag tu zhes pa bsgrub
NK085(ru)002:3599: pa'i gzhi gzhal bya phyi nang gi chos la grub
NK085(ru)002:3600: mtha' ye shes sku rigs la sogs pa nyams su
NK085(ru)002:3601: len pa'o // lnga zhes pa gzhal bya'i chos thams cad kyang lnga tshan du 'dus la /
NK085(ru)002:3602: de'i 'bras bu'ang lnga mtshan du snang bas so //
NK085(ru)002:3603: lam zhes pa la'ang zhes par bsgyur te /
NK085(ru)002:3604: man ngag lnga tshan de nyid la bye brag tu zhes pa nying lag bstan pa'i tshig go //
NK085(ru)002:3605: de nyid rgyas par bshad pa la gzhal bya 'khor
NK085(ru)002:3606: ba'i chos ni phung po lnga zhes pa la sogs
NK085(ru)002:3607: pa / gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa lnga ni shes zad do //
NK085(ru)002:3608: de nyid ma spang par gnas su dag pa rdo
NK085(ru)002:3609: rje sems dpa' la sogs yab lnga'i rang bzhin te
NK085(ru)002:3611: e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni /
NK085(ru)002:3612: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK085(ru)002:3614: 'byung ba lnga ni nam mkha' la sogs pa lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3616: sa chu spyan dang ma ma ki //
NK085(ru)002:3617: me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
NK085(ru)002:3618: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes pas so //
NK085(ru)002:3619: dbang po zhes pa mig gi dbang po nas lus kyi dbang po'i bar lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3620: yul la shes par mched pa'i bya ba byed pa dang bcas pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3623: dbang po lnga ni yab lnga'i rang bzhin zhes pas so //
NK085(ru)002:3624: yul lnga ni gzugs nas reg bya'i bar lnga ste yum lnga'o //
NK085(ru)002:3625: de yang de nyid las yul lnga ni yum lnga'i de nyid ces so //
NK085(ru)002:3626: yan lag ces pa bzhi mgo dang lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3627: de yang rigs lnga'i rang bzhin te /
NK085(ru)002:3628: thabs kyi zhags pa las dbu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs /
NK085(ru)002:3629: lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje'i rigs //
NK085(ru)002:3630: g.yon pa rin po che'i rigs //
NK085(ru)002:3631: rkang pa g.yas pa las kyi rigs //
NK085(ru)002:3632: g.yon pa pad+ma'i rigs zhes rgyus par bshad do //
NK085(ru)002:3633: sor zhes pa sor mo lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3634: de yang g.yas pa rnams la yab bkod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3635: g.yon pa rnams la yum bkod pa gsang ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'i le'u bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:3636: yan lag gi dbang gis lnga bzhi nyi shu ni grangs so //
NK085(ru)002:3637: nyon mongs zhes pa 'dod chags la sogs pa lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3638: de yang thabs kyi zhags pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3639: zhe sdang ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)002:3640: 'dod chags ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig /gti mug
NK085(ru)002:3641: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig /nga
NK085(ru)002:3642: rgyal rin chen rigs kyi dam tshig /
NK085(ru)002:3643: 'phrag dog las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig ces smos so //
NK085(ru)002:3644: dam rdzas ni dam tshig nyams su blang ba'i rdzas te bdud rtsi lnga'o //
NK085(ru)002:3645: de nyid kyang bshad pa'i bdud rtsi'i lung gi rigs lnga'i ngo bo'o //
NK085(ru)002:3646: sha ni sha chen la sogs pa lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3647: 'di nyid kyi gzhung gis sha chen ni las kun bsags gzhi'i bdag nyid las /
NK085(ru)002:3648: thugs rdo rje'i rigs glang po che ni 'degs stobs
NK085(ru)002:3649: che bas stobs bcu dang ldan pa sku de bzhin
NK085(ru)002:3650: gshegs pa'i rigs / rta ni rkang lag bzhi mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa /
NK085(ru)002:3651: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yon tan rin po che'i rigs /
NK085(ru)002:3652: bya ni rma bya ste spu sdug cing skad snyan pa 'gro ba dbang du sdud pa /
NK085(ru)002:3653: gsung dbang bcu dang ldan pa /
NK085(ru)002:3654: pad+ma'i rigs snang ba mtha' yas /
NK085(ru)002:3655: khyi ni 'phrag dog gi bdag nyid de 'dir 'phrag dog gnas su dag ste /
NK085(ru)002:3656: bdag gzhan mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa las kyi rigs don yod grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3657: ni zhes pa rnam grangs gzhan yang sdud pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3660: phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ste rgyas pa'i dam tshig gi le'u bzhin rigs lnga'i ngo bo'o //
NK085(ru)002:3661: kha dog ces pa sngo nag phyogs gcig pas lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:3662: de yang rigs lnga'i ngo bo nyid ni dam tshig rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:3663: 'gro ba zhes pa spyir drug yin kyang nyon mongs pa las snang bas rgyu lnga nges pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3664: 'bras bu'ang mi la brten te 'gro ba rnams kyi sa bon sog pa'i bzhi yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:3665: rgyu spyi dkar btang ba mi ma rtogs pa lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:3666: yang na lha ma yin stod ris lhar brtsi /
NK085(ru)002:3667: smad ris dud 'gror rtsi bas 'bras bu spyi kar btang ba ste lngar brtsi ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3668: de yang rgyu nyon mongs pa lnga las snang bas rgya mtshor gsher na rlabs gsher ba bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:3669: rigs lnga'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:3670: snyigs ma zhes pa bskal pa'i dngas ma 'grib nas
NK085(ru)002:3671: snyigs ma'i dus la bab pa da lta lta bu
NK085(ru)002:3672: ste / de yang tshe'i dngas ma brgyad khri las 'grib nas bcu pa 'gyur pa lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:3673: dus te bdud rtsi la longs spyod cing longs spyod thams cad 'grub sla ba las /
NK085(ru)002:3674: da lta gyi dus su longs spyod kyi ched du srog 'dor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3675: kha zas kyi ched du mi gsod pa la sogs pa ni dus kyi snyigs ma /
NK085(ru)002:3676: dngas ma'i dus su dge bcu dang rang bzhin gyis ldan kyang /
NK085(ru)002:3677: mi dge ba bcu'i rgyun chags su gnas pa ni las kyi snyigs ma /
NK085(ru)002:3678: zhi ba dang des pa dang 'jam pa la sogs pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3680: gtum pa dang bsad bcad la dga' ba ni rang bzhin gyi snyigs ma'o //
NK085(ru)002:3681: nyon mongs pa lnga skye bar dka' la yal bar
NK085(ru)002:3682: sla ba las skyes pa rgyun rtag nas yal ba
NK085(ru)002:3683: ni nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'o //
NK085(ru)002:3684: de nyid kyang bsal spangs med par sku dang ye shes su lhun gyis grub ste /
NK085(ru)002:3686: snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:3687: bag chags zhes pa rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:3688: bdag 'dzin nyon mongs pa can gyi yid /
NK085(ru)002:3689: dri ma can gyi 'khor bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:3690: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag la chags pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3694: yang na 'gro ba rigs drug gi sa bon lngar
NK085(ru)002:3695: bsdus ba nyid bshad pa ltar kun gzhi la gnas
NK085(ru)002:3696: pa'o // bcu bdun la sogs zhes pa bshad pa'i grangs rnam pa bdun cu tham pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3697: sogs khongs su 'khor ba'i chos tha snyed kyi yan lag ma lus pa thams cad bsdus pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3698: de nyid logs rtog rang snang gzung 'dzin 'khrul chos
NK085(ru)002:3699: thug pa med pas snang ba la ni 'khor ba
NK085(ru)002:3700: zhes bya la / don de byed pa med kyang
NK085(ru)002:3701: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las mi 'da' ba ni chos
NK085(ru)002:3702: zhes bya la / so // de ni gzhal bya ste lam pa rnams kyi 'jug pa'i sgo'o //
NK085(ru)002:3703: gtan tshigs gang gis gzhal na thun mong gi gtan tshigs kyis gtan mi phigs te /
NK085(ru)002:3704: 'dir gsang sngags rang gi thun mong ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs rtogs pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:3706: mnyam pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs bzhis gzhal bas /
NK085(ru)002:3707: byis pa yi ge lobs pa mthar phyin pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:3708: nyid mthar phyin pa grub mthar mngon du snang ste
NK085(ru)002:3710: spyod yul ka dag par bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3711: ye shes sku'i rigs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3712: bshad pa bzhin ye shes lnga dang sku lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:3716: 'khor ba'i chos bshad pa nyid kyi don gyi skabs su sbyar ba bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:3719: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK085(ru)002:3720: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid ces so //
NK085(ru)002:3721: don de nyid byas pa med par rang bzhin nam /
NK085(ru)002:3722: ngo bo nyid kyis 'khor ba gzung 'dzin gyi dri
NK085(ru)002:3723: ma 'phra rags rnams ngang gis ma grub ste gong
NK085(ru)002:3725: nyon mongs pa ngang gis ka dag pa'i don thos
NK085(ru)002:3726: pa'i shes rab kyis don spyi yid kyi yul du
NK085(ru)002:3727: byas / bsam pa'i shes rab kyis rig pa la
NK085(ru)002:3728: nyams su len te yul dang yul can med par
NK085(ru)002:3729: rig pa rang gsal rang snang shar ched byas phra
NK085(ru)002:3730: ba'ang med pa ni lta ba blo dngos 'phrod ces
NK085(ru)002:3731: byas / bya ste / la la dag gis du ma ro gcig ces kyang 'chad do //
NK085(ru)002:3732: de lta bu'i rten gyi gang zag ni spyod pa ni dbang po la /
NK085(ru)002:3733: de yul du gyur pa'i chos thams cad lta ba'i
NK085(ru)002:3734: ngang du lhun gyis grub pas lta ba la dam
NK085(ru)002:3735: pa 'dzin pa dang yang bral te blo mnyam pa
NK085(ru)002:3736: nyid nam mkha' ltar gyur nas zhe 'dod phra ba
NK085(ru)002:3737: ma dmigs pa ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya
NK085(ru)002:3738: ste / de lta bu'i dgongs pa mnga' ba la ni /
NK085(ru)002:3739: shes bya'i yul gzhi'i don gyi rnal ma la rig pa rtogs pa'i blo 'byor pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3740: de lta bu la ni lta ba zhes bya ste
NK085(ru)002:3741: sngar ma mthong ba'i don mthong ba yin kyang da
NK085(ru)002:3742: rung bsgom pa la rag las pas zag bcas kyi
NK085(ru)002:3744: 'di yang rten gyi gang zag gong du smos pa
NK085(ru)002:3745: nyid kyis yul shes par bya ba lta ba'i ngo
NK085(ru)002:3746: bo la tshul thos bsam gyis rtogs pa'i thabs la
NK085(ru)002:3747: 'bad pa'o // lta ba rtogs pa'i don las mi 'da' ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3748: rgyud la ldan pa'i tshul ni las dang po ba'i dus su mos pas bsrung /
NK085(ru)002:3749: zag med nas rang gi mtshan nyid ci bzhin par ldan /
NK085(ru)002:3750: mthar lam la lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3751: dus ni thog ma 'jug pa'i dus nas mthar lam gyi bar du mi 'da' ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3752: yan lag ni gnyis pa thun mong gi mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3753: thun mong gi dam tshig mdor bsdus na zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:3754: 'chad pa 'di dag theg pa dgu kun kyi bsrung bya thun mong pa yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3755: phyi rol pa rnams dang 'jig rten pa ya rabs rnams kyi 'ang bsrung bya mang bas so //
NK085(ru)002:3756: de nyid gsang sngags la gnas pa rnams kyis bsrung bas dam tshig ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3757: rgyas par bshad na 'bum sde'i grangs mi rdzogs pas
NK085(ru)002:3758: nyung ngu mdor bsdus na 'chad pa'i bdag don du
NK085(ru)002:3759: bsrung ba dang / gzhan don la sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ces so //
NK085(ru)002:3760: dang po bdag don la gnyis kyis spang bya'i skyon
NK085(ru)002:3761: bstan pa ni rgyan 'byed ces pa la sogs pa
NK085(ru)002:3762: ste / rgyan btsug nas de thob pa'i thabs kyi 'byed pa ni gang zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:3767: lus mdzes zhes te lus mdzes par byed pa'i thabs kyi yan lag rnams 'chang bas so //
NK085(ru)002:3771: tshong khang la sogs pa mi mang po 'du ba'i sar 'gro ba spang ste /
NK085(ru)002:3772: dgra sdang sdig 'phel ma basngagasa 'chi nyen can //
NK085(ru)002:3773: de phyir mkhas pas 'khrug pa'i ltad mo spang //
NK085(ru)002:3775: chang dang bcas pa gsang sngags phyi nang rang sa spang ste /
NK085(ru)002:3776: kri ya las sha chang sgog tsong spang zhes rtsa ba'i dam tshig tu byas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3777: yo ga rdo rje rtse mo las /
NK085(ru)002:3778: phung khrol kun kyi rtsa ba'i //
NK085(ru)002:3779: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
NK085(ru)002:3780: zhes dam tshig du phog pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3781: ma h+aa yo ga'i ma rgyud dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
NK085(ru)002:3782: der ni chang yang btung bar bya zhes pa tshogs kyi skabs su gnang la /
NK085(ru)002:3783: der ni'i sgras gzhan dus thams cad du spang bar bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3784: bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba las /
NK085(ru)002:3785: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i skabs su chang dgos pas de'i thabs su yab kyi sbyor ba rnams bshad kyang /
NK085(ru)002:3786: byin gyis ma rlabs pa'i chang 'thungs na dmyal ba
NK085(ru)002:3787: ngu 'bod du skye bar gsung pa pha rgyud kyi
NK085(ru)002:3788: bshad rgyud gdong drug pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3789: nyes pa thams cad skyed pa'i chang ni sngags pas spang bar bya zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3790: dpa' yang dag grub pa las /
NK085(ru)002:3791: bsgrub po rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi 'gal rkyen chang spang par gsungs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3793: thugs thub ras chod nga rgyal ri //
NK085(ru)002:3794: dregs byed dbang po nyams pa'i bcud //
NK085(ru)002:3795: snyoms las le lo'i gzhir gyur pa //
NK085(ru)002:3796: dpa' byed rkyen yang rnams par bsdam //
NK085(ru)002:3797: zhes pas rnam pa thams cad du spang bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3798: dregs spyod ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi chos te /
NK085(ru)002:3799: lus kyi sgo nas mchong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3803: ma zhi bas spyod pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:3806: gzhan gyi zhe bkal zhing rang spangs mtho ba'i tshig thams cad do //
NK085(ru)002:3807: sems kyi sgo nas kheng sems zhes pas mtho ba bla ma lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:3808: bar ma grogs po lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)002:3809: dma' ba sems can tha mal ba la mi gus shing nga rgyal dang ldan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3810: rdo rje gsum pos phyag byed ni /
NK085(ru)002:3811: lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta
NK085(ru)002:3812: bur byin gyis rlabs nas de ma yin pa la
NK085(ru)002:3813: phyag byed pa'o // de yang zhar la dgongs pa mthon pos dma' ba la phyag byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3814: dbang grangs mang bas nyung ba la phyag byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3815: dbang zab pas mi zab pa la phyag byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3816: phyi rol dang bstun nas slob dpon gyis phyag byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3817: zhar la nyan thos kyi sdom pa mtho dman dang /
NK085(ru)002:3818: tshang mi tshang rnams kyang shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3819: che ngag ni rang de tsam min par gong ma mched po rnams kyi gsung gi tshul dang /
NK085(ru)002:3820: skad kyi gdangs ltar bcos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3822: gzhan gyis dge ba che phra'i bye brag gang byas kyang /
NK085(ru)002:3823: kho khe grags 'dod pa yin bya ba lta bu'am /
NK085(ru)002:3825: kho la de tsam ma bab /
NK085(ru)002:3826: kho la de tsam mi 'ong zer ba lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:3827: sdig bstod ni gzhan gyi rnams par barlanga ba'i las che 'phra ci byas kyang kho dpa' bo yin /
NK085(ru)002:3830: phyung 'jal nus zhes bstod ra gtong ba lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:3831: le lo ni gzhan bsgrub rgyu med par yengs ma shor ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:3834: bla ma dang dkon mchog dang grogs po dang bsgrubs
NK085(ru)002:3835: pa'i phyogs su zas nor gtong mi nus pa ste
NK085(ru)002:3836: 'chi ba'o // gnyid ni dge ba srog dang 'dra
NK085(ru)002:3837: ba'i dgra ste rang dbang med par sems nang du
NK085(ru)002:3839: g.yeng ba ni 'jig rten gyi bya bas khrid nas
NK085(ru)002:3840: dge ba la mi brtson pa ste zur ka'i 'jag
NK085(ru)002:3841: ma lta bu blo phyogs gcig du mi gnas pa'o
NK085(ru)002:3842: // 'khro gtum ni lus 'khro zhing sems gtum pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3843: zhe sdang gis bslang ba'i las mngon du snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3844: ye shes sngon mi gtong zhes dper na rang byung
NK085(ru)002:3845: gi ye shes ye nas rang chas su ldan pa
NK085(ru)002:3846: dang 'dra bar rang rgyud ngan pa ste nyon mongs
NK085(ru)002:3847: pa lnga gang dang gang shes che ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3848: mtshan nyid gyong ba lta bu bla ma dang grogs
NK085(ru)002:3849: pos bstan cing bcos kyang rang gi sngon gyi rgyud
NK085(ru)002:3850: mi gtong ba'o // bka' cog ni bla ma dang grogs po'i 'o //
NK085(ru)002:3851: sdig pa'i grogs bsten ni mi dge ba la zhugs
NK085(ru)002:3852: pa'i gang zag gnyis po dang rngon pa lta bu
NK085(ru)002:3853: dang chos don du mi gnyer ba dang 'grogs pa
NK085(ru)002:3854: lta bu'o // bag med spyod ni zhing dag pa
NK085(ru)002:3855: rnams kyi thugs kyis ma babs pa'i spyod pa dang
NK085(ru)002:3856: lta bu'o // / bar pa rnams kyi yid la gnod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3857: dman pa rnams la dngos su spyod pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3861: bsod nams kyi phyogs byed par dam bcas nas gzhung du mi btsud de 'dor ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3862: chog mi shes pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags zas
NK085(ru)002:3863: nor gyi bye brag yod kyang chog mi shes te
NK085(ru)002:3865: 'dod chags gnyis pa'ang de dang mtshungs so //
NK085(ru)002:3867: dge ba dang chos kyi don dang /
NK085(ru)002:3868: yo byad rnams gzhan gyis mthong zhing tshor ba'i phyir dam po la dga' ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:3871: dge ba bcu shes pa dang mtshungs pas spangs pa nyid kyis dam tshig rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3873: bshad pa nyid kyi grangs so //
NK085(ru)002:3874: bzlog ces pa yang te mi gnas par byas pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3876: bdag don mchog tu 'gyur pa ste zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:3879: de nyid la gzhan thams cad dga' ba bas /
NK085(ru)002:3880: gzhan gyi don du 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3881: don des bdag gzhan gnyis ka 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i don dang /
NK085(ru)002:3882: de nyid kyis chos kyi don du'ang 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3885: skye bo dang gsang sngags kyi bar kun gyis nyams
NK085(ru)002:3886: su blangs pa'i sbyor ba bdag nyid khur ba ni
NK085(ru)002:3887: bkur ba ste don 'gyur bzhi'i 'bras bu'ang yin la
NK085(ru)002:3889: gzhan don la gnyis kyi ngo bo nyams su blangs pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3890: pha rol phyin drug ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:3891: sbyin pa la sogs pa drug dang /
NK085(ru)002:3893: yi ge 'dri dang mchod sbyin dang //
NK085(ru)002:3894: nyan dang klog dang 'dzin pa dang //
NK085(ru)002:3895: 'chad dang kha thon byed pa dang //
NK085(ru)002:3896: de sems pa dang bsgom pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3898: rnams bzhi las kyi spyod pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3899: zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhi las kyi spyod pa'am /
NK085(ru)002:3900: yang na 'dir thun mong gi theg pa'i sgo nas /
NK085(ru)002:3901: gzhan don byed pa'i skabs yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:3905: don mthun pa rnams pa bzhi'i 'phrin las kyi sgo nas gzhan don spyod pa'i gsungs so /
NK085(ru)002:3906: gzhan yang gdul bya dang mthun par don la 'jug
NK085(ru)002:3907: pa'i thabs ma 'gag pa'i spyod pa ni gang zhe
NK085(ru)002:3908: na / nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa dgu dang /
NK085(ru)002:3909: gzhi de las gol ba'i mu stegs dgu ste /
NK085(ru)002:3910: mdo chos kyi me long las bshad pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:3911: gzhan yang gdul bya 'gro ba drug rang 'thad kyi spyod pa rnams kyang /
NK085(ru)002:3912: gang la gang 'dul de la snang ba nyams blang ste /
NK085(ru)002:3913: 'di nyid kyi glad du'ang nang rig la la mun pa snang phyir dang /
NK085(ru)002:3915: gcig gis 'thad pa ma yin la /
NK085(ru)002:3916: la la cha mthun spyod pa'i rigs zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:3917: de dag zhib par dbye ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:3919: 'dzin dang nyam nga med par spyad ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:3920: gong ma lta bur gdul bya'i don ci ltar bshad kyang sems nyid kyi ngang du shes pas /
NK085(ru)002:3921: yul dang yul can med de /
NK085(ru)002:3925: 'gro drug gi spyod pa rnams gdul bya dang mthun par spyod kyang /
NK085(ru)002:3926: bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis lhung dogs kyi nyams nga ba dang bag tsha ba med de /
NK085(ru)002:3927: don des nyam nga med par spyad ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:3929: sangs rgyas mdzad par de gsungs so zhes gdams so //
NK085(ru)002:3930: bsrung thabs kyi sgo nas zhabs bsdu ba ni gnyis las /
NK085(ru)002:3931: phyug po'i lug rdzi'i lus rtsi ba dang mthun par bsrung ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:3932: bsrungs ba de dag grangs btabs nas //
NK085(ru)002:3934: dper na phyug po'i lug mang po rdzi bus 'tsho ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:3935: grangs mang ba dag gal che ma gtor na bya dga' 'thob gtor na chad pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:3937: go cha chen po dang ldan te /
NK085(ru)002:3938: nyin gcig lan gsum tshang mi tshang brtsi ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3939: ma tshang na tshor ba'i thabs la 'bad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3940: mtshan pa de bzhin du brtson 'grus bya ba bzhin du /
NK085(ru)002:3941: mchog gi theg pa la zhugs pa'i rten gyi gang
NK085(ru)002:3942: zag 'jug pa'i sgo dbang gi dus su dam tshig
NK085(ru)002:3943: rnams phog nas / de nyid rtsa ba yan lag rgyas par shes par bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:3944: mchog dang thun mong gi yon tan thams cad kyi
NK085(ru)002:3945: gzhi'i phyir gal che bas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
NK085(ru)002:3946: gsum bsngo bgrang bya ste ma tshang na bskang ba'i
NK085(ru)002:3947: thabs la 'bad pa dang nas zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:3948: de tsam gyi sar bzhag pas mi chog ste /
NK085(ru)002:3949: rgyun du mi yeng par byas pa /
NK085(ru)002:3950: rgyal po'i mdzod sgo bsrung ba'i tshul du nyams su blang ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:3951: dran dang shes bzhin gyi spyod pa zhes pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3952: rgyal po'i mdzod sgo bsrung ba ni bsrung thub na yig tshang thob la /
NK085(ru)002:3953: bsrung ma thub na chad pas phog pas /
NK085(ru)002:3954: rgyun gyi dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis ma yengs par gnas pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:3955: 'dir yang bsrung thub kyi skyon yon 'chad pa bzhin 'gyur bas /
NK085(ru)002:3956: nyin mtshan dus drug gi bsngo ba bgrangs byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:3957: de dag gi bar skabs su phyal bar 'dug pa lta bu ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:3958: dran pas ma yeng par byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:3959: shes bzhin gyis yengs ma yengs kyi bya ra byas te /
NK085(ru)002:3960: de lta bu rgyun par gnas pa nyams su blang ba la ni /
NK085(ru)002:3962: nyes pa'i gtan nas mi gos te /
NK085(ru)002:3963: dam tshig gi ngo bo lhun gyis grub pa la ni /
NK085(ru)002:3964: lam nyams su len pa las mi 'da' bas rnal 'byor te /
NK085(ru)002:3965: lam dang 'bras bu'i yon tan thams cad las rang dbang du bsgyur bas dbang phyug ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:3967: theg pa mchog 'di nyid 'ba' zhig las ma gtogs pa /
NK085(ru)002:3969: zhes dpal kun du bzang po'i rgyud du gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:3970: kun tu bzang po dang skal ba mnyam zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:3971: spyi don bzhi pa nyams par gyur pa'i rgyu bsten pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:3974: nyams pa gyur pa'i rgyu dag ni //
NK085(ru)002:3976: spyir ni nyams pa'i rgyu bag la nyal nyon mongs pa lnga yin kyang /
NK085(ru)002:3977: theg pa mchog 'dir 'og ma dang mi 'dra bas /
NK085(ru)002:3978: rgyu nyon mongs pa lnga nyid spangs pa med par ye shes su dag ste /
NK085(ru)002:3979: don dam byang chub sems su bshad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:3980: yan lag gi mi spangs pa lnga dang /
NK085(ru)002:3981: shes pa'i dam tshig du bshad pa ltar /
NK085(ru)002:3983: nyon mongs pa ngang gis mi gnas pa /
NK085(ru)002:3984: nyi ma'i snying po'i dpes bstan pa ltar ro //
NK085(ru)002:3985: don des na 'dir ni nyi ma la blta ba
NK085(ru)002:3986: po'i ngo la glo bur sprin gyi sgribs pa ltar
NK085(ru)002:3987: / mngon du rgyu ba'i tshogs rnams /
NK085(ru)002:3988: bskul byed kyi rkyen yang yin la /
NK085(ru)002:3989: de nyid kyi stobs kyis snang bas rgyu zhes 'dogs so //
NK085(ru)002:3990: de dag kyang gang yin zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:3991: mi chos blon po'o las byed pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3992: lha chos la dgar ba'i mi chos smos te /
NK085(ru)002:3993: blon po ni 'jig rten gyi rang yan chod pas bkur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:3994: man chod pa bskyang pa gnyis kyi las kyis /
NK085(ru)002:3995: 'jig rten gyi 'dun ma byed pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:3996: de'ang rang phyogs rgyal ba dang gzhan phyogs pham pa'i thabs so //
NK085(ru)002:3997: de dag gal che bas zhib par bshad na /
NK085(ru)002:3998: las de nyid kyi chags sdang bsags pa'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:3999: slob dpon grangs kyi thugs dang 'gal ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4000: grogs kyi thugs dang 'gal ba dag /srid pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4001: blon po'i las g.yeng ba'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:4002: gsung gi dam tshig las g.yel bar 'gyur ba dang /
