NK085(ru)002:4003: de dag gis dbang gis thugs kyi dam tshig gsang chu 'dzags su shor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4004: spyad par lnga yul dang 'phrad kyang yal bar dor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4005: mi spang ba lnga'i dgongs pa nyams su ma len pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4006: dang du blang ba lnga dus las 'das pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4007: shes pa lnga tshig gi lta ba la shor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4008: bsgrub pa lnga yal bar bor ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4009: thun mong gi yan lag rnams kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4010: le lo dang g.yeng bas dus 'das pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4011: blon po'i las ni dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu che bas che ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4012: bdag bstod ni chos dang 'jig rten pa'i sgo nas bdag bstod pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4013: de'ang sku yi dam tshig las nyams pa las kha thag nye ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4014: chos kyi sgo nas thugs dam nyams pa las kha thag nye ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4018: bdag gzhan gnyis kyi ngos nas gnyis su brtsis te /
NK085(ru)002:4020: sku dam nyams pa la kha thag nye'o //
NK085(ru)002:4022: bla ma dang grogs po ste /
NK085(ru)002:4023: 'adi'ang sku dam tshig las kha thag nye la /
NK085(ru)002:4024: gzhan ma'ang zhib par dpyad par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4026: 'jig rten gyi grags pa 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir
NK085(ru)002:4027: 'du ba'i tshogs nyams su len cing brten pa ni
NK085(ru)002:4030: 'bul 'byed chen po byed pa lta bu ste /
NK085(ru)002:4031: de ni blon po'i las byed pa dang mtshungs par shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4032: rdzas ni zas nor gyi phyogs la chags sems ni gtong mi phod pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4033: de'ang sku dam la kha thag nye la /
NK085(ru)002:4034: gzhan ma'ang cha 'phra bar yod par shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4035: rang phyogs che zhing rang nyid gcig pu'i phyogs bskyod cing /
NK085(ru)002:4036: gzhan pa yal bar bor ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:4037: de'ang sku dam la kha thag nye la /
NK085(ru)002:4038: gzhan pa cha 'phra bar shes so //
NK085(ru)002:4039: chang dang ni de gcig pu la dga' ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4040: de'ang mi chos blon po'i las dang mtshungs pas /
NK085(ru)002:4041: rtsa ba dang yan lag kun gyi nyams pa'i gazhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:4045: yon tan che bar rlom pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4046: de'i dbang gis gzhan la brnyas pa shas cher sku dam la kha thag nye la /
NK085(ru)002:4048: lta spyod snyoms las su btang nas g.yel ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4049: byang chub sems kyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4051: thugs dam nan tan chung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4052: yan lag gi dam tshig yo nyams pa'i rgyu 'gyur pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4053: don de nyid kyi slob dpon dang grogs po'i thugs dang 'gal ba'i rgyu'o //
NK085(ru)002:4054: lta spyod snyoms las su 'gro ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4055: gtan yid ches pa'i dad pa med pas /
NK085(ru)002:4056: brtson 'grus kyi lcags dang bral te /
NK085(ru)002:4057: snyoms pa ni ma rtogs pa'i btang snyoms te /
NK085(ru)002:4058: lta ba snyoms las su gyur pas /
NK085(ru)002:4059: byang chub sems kyi dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu dang /
NK085(ru)002:4060: spyod pa snyoms las su song bas /
NK085(ru)002:4061: gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu dang /
NK085(ru)002:4062: gsang ba'i dam tshig snyoms las su song bas /
NK085(ru)002:4064: des yul dang phrad pa'i spyod pa'i dam tshig snyoms las su song ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4065: mi spang ba nyams su ma lon pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4066: dang du blang par yal bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4068: lta sgom las g.yel ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4069: thun mong gi yan lag rnams yal bar dor ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4070: chos la phyogs ris zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:4071: rang phyogs la bstod cing gzhan phyogs la 'thab pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4072: chags sdang dang bcas pas byang chub sems dang 'gal ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4073: don de nyid kyis sku dam dang 'gal ba'i rgyu dang /
NK085(ru)002:4074: phyogs ris kyi bstod smad kyis thugs kyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4075: yan lag rnams kyang shes rab zhib mo'i shes par bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:4077: phyogs ris dang bcas pa ni dam tshig thams cad
NK085(ru)002:4078: nyams pa'i rgyu yin la phyogs ris dang bral ba'i
NK085(ru)002:4082: chos dang 'jig rten gyi bya ba gnyis la ngom po la dga' ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:4083: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu dang /
NK085(ru)002:4084: don des sku dam pa'i yul gnyis dang 'gal ba'ang srid pas /
NK085(ru)002:4086: gsang chung ba ni gsang mi thub pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4087: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams rgyu'o //
NK085(ru)002:4089: gsang chung ba thi gi mtshungs kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4091: yon tan rlom pa dang bcas pa'i ngos nas yin la /
NK085(ru)002:4092: skyon yon gang gi'ang dmigs par med pa smra ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4095: le lo che na ni bsgrub pa la mi gus pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4096: gsung dang nyams rgyu kha thag nye la /
NK085(ru)002:4097: sku dam yang snang 'bring gi ngos nas rngo mi thob pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4098: byang chub sems kyang le lo la shor bas nyes pa'i rgyu'o //
NK085(ru)002:4099: shas che chung tsam smos kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4100: spyir rtsa ba yan lag kun nyes pa'i rgyu'o //
NK085(ru)002:4102: chas cher dang du blang ba'i dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu kha thag nye la /
NK085(ru)002:4103: kun la'ang phra rags su sbyar ro //
NK085(ru)002:4104: sgro bskur ni skyon btags pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4106: byang chub sems la mtshan ma'i sgro bskur brjod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4107: slob dpon dang grogs po la skyon yon kyi sgro skur dang /
NK085(ru)002:4108: spyad pa'i dam tshig yin min gyi sgro skur dang /
NK085(ru)002:4109: spyir phra rags kyis kun la yin min gyi sgro skur brjod pa nyams pa'i rgyu'o //
NK085(ru)002:4110: grogs po rnams kyi nyams ci 'dra ba len pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:4111: ya ta ma ta'i gtam brjod pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4113: de nyid ni shes che bar grogs po'i dbang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:4117: de dag gi zas nor 'phel bar 'dod pa la chags shing zhen pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4118: ngo bo dang nyes pa mi chos blon po dang mthun kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4119: gong ma ni spyir bstan la /
NK085(ru)002:4120: 'di nyid ni gnyis rigs rgyud kyi sgos su bstan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4122: dgon pa na mi 'dug pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4123: nyes pa mi chos blon po dang mtshungs so //
NK085(ru)002:4125: tshogs pa la dga' ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:4126: sems ni rnams par g.yeng ba'i mi //
NK085(ru)002:4127: nyon mongs che ba'i phrag na gnas //
NK085(ru)002:4129: nyams pa'i rgyur gyur pa mi chos blon po'i las dang mtshungs so //
NK085(ru)002:4130: nyi shus bcas pa gong du bstan pa'i grangs te /
NK085(ru)002:4131: de dag ni dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu 'gyur pa yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:4133: rgyu med na 'bras bu nyams pa mi 'ong ste /
NK085(ru)002:4134: des sdug bsngal mi myong bar bstan no //
NK085(ru)002:4135: 'di dag ni 'dun pas sems pa'i rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig gi yul te /
NK085(ru)002:4137: dbugs chen 'byin nas mthong lam gyi skabs su /
NK085(ru)002:4138: rgan mo la bu nad mi sdig pa ltar gtan nas dag go //
NK085(ru)002:4139: spyi don lnga pa nyams pa'i snga rtags kyi mdor bstan ni /
NK085(ru)002:4140: snga rtags sngon du 'byung ba ni //
NK085(ru)002:4141: zhes pa las dang po'i gang zag shes pa bem
NK085(ru)002:4142: po lta bus dam tshig nyams pa ma tshor yang
NK085(ru)002:4143: / rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig gang dang gang nyams te /
NK085(ru)002:4144: phyi ma la ngan song du 'gro ba'i snga rtags /
NK085(ru)002:4145: sngon ni rtsa ba'i skad de /
NK085(ru)002:4146: tshe 'di la dbang po'i mngon gsum du 'byung ba'am /
NK085(ru)002:4147: yang na phyi mar sdug bsngal ba'i snga rtags /
NK085(ru)002:4148: sngon du tshe 'di nyid la 'byung ba ni gang zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:4149: gsum gyi dang po skyon 'di la snang bas phyi
NK085(ru)002:4150: ma la ngan song du 'gro ba'i snga rtags ni
NK085(ru)002:4151: / nyams nga ba'i nad rnams dang zhes pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:4152: de yang sdug bsngal che bas bsran klags med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4157: gang gis mthong zhing thos pa rnams skyi g.ya' ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4158: gang yang nyer mi btub pa'i rigs rgyud rnams 'byer ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4159: kun gyis kles la bor nas sems kyi rgyab tu bskyur ba ni gzhan nyams nga ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4160: de lta ba'i nad rnams ni gang zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:4164: rim gyi bye brag dang tshar pa dmar bshal yi rigs rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:4165: yul dgra bgegs gnyis la dben pa mi 'jug ste /
NK085(ru)002:4167: bgegs la byin rlabs med pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4168: chos skyong dam can rnams mi nye bas so //
NK085(ru)002:4170: longs spyod yid du 'ong ba dang 'bral te /
NK085(ru)002:4173: rab tu byung ba na 'khor dang nye gnas rnams gang bzang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4174: yid du 'ong ba rnams dang bral te /
NK085(ru)002:4176: longs spyod yid du 'ong ba snying la sdug pa rnams dang 'bye ste /
NK085(ru)002:4177: srog chags kyi tshogs rnams shi ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4179: gos zas kyi tshogs kyang ngo bo nyid kyis 'bral ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4180: rang gi ma nyes pa'i ya kha glo bur du phog pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4181: chos la mi gnas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4182: rnam smin la mi 'dzem pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4183: mthu med pa la sogs pa'i ma tshangs kyi ya kha phog pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4184: rang ma nyes pa'i kha yogs chen po phog ste /
NK085(ru)002:4186: lkod la sogs pa'i mang po 'jal dgos pa dang 'phrad do //
NK085(ru)002:4187: ci dang ci brtsam pa'i las la 'bras bu med de /
NK085(ru)002:4188: 'jig rten mi bya ba dang chos gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:4189: chos la'ang mthu dang byang chub bsgrub pa rnam pa gnyis la /
NK085(ru)002:4192: gzhi med pa'i nam mkha' la me tog rmo ba bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:4193: mdor bsdus na yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung /
NK085(ru)002:4196: gzhan yang lo nyes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4199: ngo bo nyid kyis kun kyi yid du mi 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)002:4200: don de nyid dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4201: sku yi dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtags ni /
NK085(ru)002:4202: 'jig rten 'dir yang mdze dang shu ba la sogs pa'i nad ngan sna tshogs byung nas /
NK085(ru)002:4203: skye bo yongs kyis spang pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4204: nye du la sogs pa rnams kyis 'grogs shing brten pa'i dbang med do //
NK085(ru)002:4205: gzhan yang mi rnams kyis smad par 'gyur nas /
NK085(ru)002:4207: gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtags ni /
NK085(ru)002:4209: bgegs stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis glag tshol ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4210: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis skabs tshol ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4211: ye 'drog sum brgya drug cus bar du gcod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4212: lkug shing dbang po rmong ba la sogs pa'i nad sna tshogs byung nas /
NK085(ru)002:4213: gsang ba'i bka' nub pa dang bar chod kyi bgegs kyis glo bur du 'chi zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:4214: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa yang /
NK085(ru)002:4215: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang mthu dang rdzu 'phrul chung zhing /
NK085(ru)002:4219: dbang po nyams mi gsal zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:4220: nyams pa la rtags med na phyi mar ltung tshabs che bar bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4221: gal te nyams la rtags med par //
NK085(ru)002:4224: brgya la ni dam tshig nyams par bdag gzhan kun
NK085(ru)002:4225: kyis shes bzhin gzhi de las nyams pa'i rtags bshad
NK085(ru)002:4227: gtor rgyud las snga rtags smos pa rnams byung snga
NK085(ru)002:4228: ma la nyams pa 'dir bsnyen pas bskang gsol la
NK085(ru)002:4229: 'bad ces so // yon tan gyi legs pa snang ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4230: de nyid mi rung ba chen po yin te /
NK085(ru)002:4231: bde ba zad byed ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:4232: tshe snga ma'i bsags pa'i las kyi rnam smin bzang po bde ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:4233: tshe 'di nyid la zad par byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:4234: phyi mar ngan song gsum dang rdo rje dmyal ba kha brgyud nas /
NK085(ru)002:4235: 'chad pa bzhin 'thon par dka' bas gtan du sdug ces so //
NK085(ru)002:4236: ma nyams par rtags byung na bzang bar bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4237: gal te ma nyams pa zhes pa la sogs pa gal te 'am /
NK085(ru)002:4238: brgya la na dam tshig rnams ma nyams par bdag gzhan kun kyis shes bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:4239: bshad pa'i rtags rnams byung na de ni bzang ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:4240: 'dir dam tshig la nan tan byas pa'i stobs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:4241: tshe rabs sngon nas bsags pa'i rnam smin rtsub mo rnams gsang sngags zab mo'i byin rlabs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:4242: gtan nas zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:4247: rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskang zhing nyams pa rnams slar gso ba'i las bshad ma thag pa nyid la /
NK085(ru)002:4249: las kyi sgrib pa gtan nas dag ste /
NK085(ru)002:4250: phyi ma la ngan song gsum dang rdo rje dmyal
NK085(ru)002:4251: ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur zhes bstan to
NK085(ru)002:4252: // spyi don drug pa nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa'i mdo ni /
NK085(ru)002:4253: nyams par gyur pa'i skyon bshad pa //
NK085(ru)002:4254: zhes pa nyams pa lnga las /
NK085(ru)002:4255: zlas nyam zhar nyams gnyis shugs kyis bshad la /
NK085(ru)002:4256: gsum po dngos su bshad pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4257: de'ang rtsa ba nyams pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4258: yan lag nyams pa ni dngos su bshad la /
NK085(ru)002:4259: spyi nyams pa shugs la bshad 'dir dngos su bshad pa'i rtsa ba dang yan lag gnyis dang /
NK085(ru)002:4260: zhar la bshad pa gsum dang lnga /
NK085(ru)002:4261: gang dang gang nyams pa shas che ba tshe phyi ma la bsnyen pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4263: de bshad pa zhal kyis bzhes pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4264: dang po byang chub sems nyams pa'i skyon ni /
NK085(ru)002:4266: kun rdzob dang don dam bshad pa nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:4268: ma mos pa dang mi dad pa'i dbang gis smod bskur /
NK085(ru)002:4269: spangs pa gyur na skal pa chen po'i bar du /
NK085(ru)002:4270: dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs po che ci bsags kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4271: byang sems dam tshig spangs pas /
NK085(ru)002:4272: dge ba'i gzhir rten med de /
NK085(ru)002:4273: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin pas /
NK085(ru)002:4274: 'bras bu sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:4275: rgyu 'bras mi bslu ba tsam nyid 'khor bas khams su smin nas /
NK085(ru)002:4277: rnam byang gi sa bon gtan med do //
NK085(ru)002:4278: des na rtogs pa chung ba la ni /
NK085(ru)002:4284: gtan nas bshags sems med pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4288: sku yi dam tshig ces pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:4289: bshad pa'i slob dpon dang grogs po la /
NK085(ru)002:4290: rten gsum gang gi sgo nas nyams par 'gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:4291: la nga'i nad sogs sdug bsngal che zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:4292: gong du bshad pa bzhin gyi nad rnams 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4293: sogs khongs su mi bde ba thams cad bsdus te /
NK085(ru)002:4294: don des lus sdug cing sems zug zer gyi sdug bsngal chen pos gtses te /
NK085(ru)002:4296: dus la ma bab pa tshe zad de /
NK085(ru)002:4299: rgyu dam tshig nyams pas bsrung bya'i lha g.yer nas shi nas ci 'gyur zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:4300: gtor rgyud las gsum nyams na /
NK085(ru)002:4301: sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ste bskal pa gnyis /
NK085(ru)002:4302: thugs dam nyams na bskal pa gsum ste /
NK085(ru)002:4303: me tog sad kyis khyer ba 'dra /
NK085(ru)002:4304: dge ba ci byas pas mi phan ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:4307: bskal pa dpag med dmyal bar skye zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:4308: yan lag nyams na shing ta la'i 'go bcad pa dang 'dra ste /
NK085(ru)002:4309: bskal pa bco brgyad du sdug bsngal myong ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:4310: bskal pa rdo rje dmyal bar ltung zhes pa bskal pa'i tshad ni brjod dka' ste /
NK085(ru)002:4312: rgya mtsho chen po'i skra'i nyag mas blangs te gtor na zad pa nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:4313: gsung la la dag gis tshad smos pa med pas /
NK085(ru)002:4314: de nyid la bskal pa'o gsung /
NK085(ru)002:4315: lcags kyi ri rab tshad ldan brgyad rim pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:4316: bya rigs 'jam gyi pags pas drud na zad pa
NK085(ru)002:4317: ni / rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe tshad do ces so //
NK085(ru)002:4318: de'i rgyu ni lta ba'i don ma rtogs pas chags
NK085(ru)002:4319: sdang gis rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa la
NK085(ru)002:4320: nyes pa'i bye brag rnams so ces so //
NK085(ru)002:4321: gtor rgyud las bla ma la nyams na sol ba la ljon pa ma skye ba dang 'dra ste /
NK085(ru)002:4322: skal pa gcig pu dmyal bar gnas pa la dge ba ci byas kyang phan med ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:4323: de ni dam tshig bkod pa'i lung gis 'di nyid du'ang /
NK085(ru)002:4324: bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su de nas thon par mi 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)002:4326: rdo rje dmyal ba'i gnas ni /
NK085(ru)002:4327: drang ba dag gis mnar med dang mnyam pa'i phyogs gcig na /
NK085(ru)002:4328: dgon pa'i tshul du yod do gsungs /
NK085(ru)002:4330: sems nyid de dang der snang ba las /
NK085(ru)002:4331: gnas kyi nges pa phyogs gcig tu smra ba ma mchis so gsung /
NK085(ru)002:4332: bde bas rab tu brel bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)002:4334: bde ba'i gnas skabs rdul phra rab tsam yang med de /
NK085(ru)002:4335: dus rgyun du sdug bsngal gyis lus sems g.yen g.yos pa ni bar 'tshams med pas /
NK085(ru)002:4337: de bas na dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4338: rdo rje dmyal ba de la ni tshe'i tshod kyang med de /
NK085(ru)002:4339: thams cad du thon mi srid pa'i phyir ro ces so //
NK085(ru)002:4340: gsung dam nyams pa'i skyon ni /
NK085(ru)002:4341: gsung gi dam tshig ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:4342: bshad pa'i sngags gsum phyag rgya bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:4343: de dag nyams par 'gyur ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4345: ma log kyang le lo'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:4346: lo zla 'das pa ni nyams pa 'gyur na zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:4347: de'i skyon ni gsung dam nyams pa'i chos skyong g.yel te /
NK085(ru)002:4348: des bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams thogs babs 'ong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4349: des lus la nad rims kyi gnod pa mang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4350: dgra bgegs gnyis kyi glo bur du bar chad kyi
NK085(ru)002:4351: rkyen gyis dgra dang nad drag pos btab pa'i ye
NK085(ru)002:4353: gsung dam nyams pa'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:4354: gang bsgrub pa'i chos la byin rlabs med par 'gyur zhing /
NK085(ru)002:4355: rgyu des bshad pa bzhin shi nas bskal pa chen po gnyis su rdo rje dmyal bar ltung ngo //
NK085(ru)002:4357: thun mong dang mchog gi bsgrub pa gang brtsam kyang
NK085(ru)002:4358: 'bras bu dus tshod la mi 'byung bas 'gyang bar
NK085(ru)002:4359: gsung zhes so // dam tshig bkod pa las ni
NK085(ru)002:4360: rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe chad mnyam par gsungs so
NK085(ru)002:4361: gsung zhes so // // thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4362: thugs kyi dam tshig ces pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4363: gsang ba rnam pa bcu ste /
NK085(ru)002:4364: de nyid snod min pa la bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4365: snod yod kyang rang la bstan pa'i lung med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4366: 'du 'dzi'i dbang gis chu 'dzags su zag par 'gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:4367: smyo 'bog dbang po nyams dang 'chal zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:4368: smyo ba ni sems kyi dran pa med pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4370: ngag nges pa med par smra ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4372: mig gis gzugs mi 'dzin pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4373: de nyid la nyams pa zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4375: kha na mi smra dgu smra ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4377: lkug pa ni tshig med pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4378: de rnams mngon du snang ba la /
NK085(ru)002:4380: thugs kyi dam tshig gsang ba gzhan la 'phel bas /
NK085(ru)002:4381: mchog dang thun mong gi bsgrub pa gang bsgrub kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4382: rtags dang 'bras bu med ces so //
NK085(ru)002:4384: rang gis ma bsgrub par gzhan la bsten na /
NK085(ru)002:4385: de nyid phyis rang gi bsgrub par daka'o gsung /
NK085(ru)002:4386: bar chod kyis dus ma yin par 'chi nas /
NK085(ru)002:4387: rdo rje dmyal bar bskal pa gsum du gnas te /
NK085(ru)002:4388: sngar gsang ba nyams pa lce'i las yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:4389: dmyal ba'i skabs su yang sdug bsngal gzhan dang mthun par lhag po lce la zhing rmo ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4390: sogs khongs su dra ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4392: phye mar btang ba la sogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4396: rtsa ba kun nyams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4397: byang chub sems dang sku gsung thugs nyams pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4401: de lta bu'i rten gyi gang zag gis gsol ba
NK085(ru)002:4402: la nye bar mi brtson nas tha mal pa 'dug
NK085(ru)002:4403: na / tshe phyi ma la rdo rje dmyal ba ltung ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:4404: rdo rje dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yi tshe tshad ni /
NK085(ru)002:4405: dmyal ba phal pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa dmyal khams bco brgyad ni /
NK085(ru)002:4406: theg pa thun mong las nyams pa'i 'bras bu yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:4408: de dag thams cad ma lus pa kun kyi sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4409: rdo rje dmyal ba de'i 'bum gyi char yang mi phod zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:4410: dmyal ba phal pa'i sdug bsngal nang gi chung ba'i tshad ni /
NK085(ru)002:4411: yang sos kyi sdug bsngal te /
NK085(ru)002:4413: 'di nas nyin gcig mdung thung sum brgya yi /
NK085(ru)002:4414: rab tu drag gtabs sdug bsngal gang yin te /
NK085(ru)002:4415: des ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chung ngu'i kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4416: 'ol yang mi bya'i char yang mi phod do //
NK085(ru)002:4418: 'o na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
NK085(ru)002:4419: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can yin na /
NK085(ru)002:4420: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal las ci'i phyir mi sdongs zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:4421: sngar sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa las nyams pa'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:4422: dpyang thag chad pas thugs rje'i stongs med par bstan te /
NK085(ru)002:4423: skal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi brgya stong gi
NK085(ru)002:4424: 'od zer ma lus pa dang 'jig rten kyi khams
NK085(ru)002:4425: gzhan na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer
NK085(ru)002:4426: dang / thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa'i 'phrin las /
NK085(ru)002:4428: rdo rje dmyal ba las phan par mi 'gyur ba'i thog tu /
NK085(ru)002:4429: slar sdug bsngal gyi snod du snang ba'i gtan tshigs ni /
NK085(ru)002:4430: sman ma zhu ba dang 'dra ste slar gnod pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4431: sngar dpyang thag chad pa'i stabs so //
NK085(ru)002:4435: skal pa chen po'i grangs ther 'bum mo //
NK085(ru)002:4436: sogs khongs su grangs med pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4437: yun ring po rdo rje dmyal ba de ni /
NK085(ru)002:4438: sdug bsngal las thar bar mi 'gyur zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:4439: 'o na skal pa chen po gcig na /
NK085(ru)002:4441: rdo rje dmyal ba de ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:4442: 'jig rten khams de nyid zhig pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe skabs na /
NK085(ru)002:4443: ma zhig pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'apho'o //
NK085(ru)002:4444: 'o na 'pho ba'i bar na sdug bsngal la ngal bsor yod dam zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:4446: yun thung ba ni se gol gcig gis phyin par byed ces so //
NK085(ru)002:4447: nyen che bas nan tan du gdams pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4448: gong ma rnams sdug bsngal shin tu che bas gtan tshig de bas na /
NK085(ru)002:4449: lus ngag yid gsum gyis bsrung ba la shin tu nan tan gyis shig pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4450: de bas na dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4451: rdo rje dmyal ba las brgya la thar na yang /
NK085(ru)002:4452: dmyal khams bcu drug rim pa bzhin dma' ba nas brgyud de /
NK085(ru)002:4453: so so'i tshe tshad kyis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4455: yi dwags rim bzhin brgyud pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4456: de las thar nas byol song du brgyud pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4457: de las thar na ru tra nag por skye ba /
NK085(ru)002:4458: le'u drug pa las rgyas par gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:4459: yan lag nyams pa'i skyon la gnyis kyi mdo ni /
NK085(ru)002:4461: yan lag gi dam tshig lnga tsho lnga ste /
NK085(ru)002:4462: gang dang gang nyams nas bsrung ba gzhung du ma
NK085(ru)002:4463: srongs na longs spyod ni yo byad kyi tshogs yin
NK085(ru)002:4464: la / mang du 'phel ba spus ni /
NK085(ru)002:4468: theg pa chen po gsang zhugs su zhugs nas /
NK085(ru)002:4469: lta ba de nyid 'dzin cing spyod pa lan lag gi dam tshig rnams yal bar dor ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4471: don des thun mong dang mchog gis dngos grub rnams bsgrubs kyang myur bar mi 'grub ste /
NK085(ru)002:4472: shin tu ring bar 'gyur ba dang //
NK085(ru)002:4474: gtan med pa ma yin zhes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4475: yang dang yang du blang ba las nyams thun mong gyi dngos grub rnams ring ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4476: mi spang ba dang shes bsgrub rnams yal bar dor bas /
NK085(ru)002:4477: mchog gi dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4478: spyad par lnga dor bas de nyid kyi gdul bya rnams kyi don rnams mi 'grub ste /
NK085(ru)002:4480: lta spyod ya char 'gyur ba nyid //
NK085(ru)002:4482: lta ba nang pa ltar spyad cing spyod pa phyi
NK085(ru)002:4483: par gyur pa nyid kyis theg pa phyi nang ste
NK085(ru)002:4484: / spyod pa phyi pa ltar byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:4485: lta ba nang pa ltar byas pa nyid kyis /
NK085(ru)002:4486: gsang sngags phyi nang 'dres pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4487: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa 'dres pas /
NK085(ru)002:4488: dper na mar dang spyin du bsres na mar gyi mdog bsnum pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4489: spyin gyi zung gnyis so sor nyams pa'am /
NK085(ru)002:4490: nas dang bra bo 'dres na so sor longs spyod mi bde ba bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:4491: don des bka'i byin rlabs 'grubs par dka' ste /
NK085(ru)002:4492: gsang sngags kyi bka' zab mo ni byin rlabs mngon gsum du mi snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4493: yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:4494: chos skyong ma dga' ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4495: bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4496: bong bu la seng ge mi 'phrugs pa ltar /
NK085(ru)002:4497: gnyis 'dzin la mnyam pa nyid kyi don mi snang bas /
NK085(ru)002:4501: skal pa chen por ngan song gsum gyi kha brgyud pas /
NK085(ru)002:4502: de dag gi sdug bsngal nyams su myong ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:4505: spyod pa ni lta sgom gnyis kyi 'bras bu mngon du snang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4506: zag bcas zag med du sbyor ba'i gsos sam bcud kyi rlan dang mtshungs pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4507: yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor pa la spyod pa'i rlan med pas /
NK085(ru)002:4510: spyi don bdun pa ma nyams pa'i yon tan la gsum gyi mdo ni /
NK085(ru)002:4511: rnal 'byor skyes bu chen mo yis //
NK085(ru)002:4517: lam la yang zag bcas zag med gnyis las /
NK085(ru)002:4518: 'dir zag bcas 'dun pas sems pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
NK085(ru)002:4519: de ni lta ba'i ngos nas /
NK085(ru)002:4520: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ma bcos pa'i rnal ma la /
NK085(ru)002:4522: de nyid ting nge 'dzin du 'byor ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4523: dam tshig gi gzhung tshugs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4524: skyes bu ni tshogs bsags pa las snang ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:4525: tshe gcig gis zag pa pa'i lam mngon du bya ba dang ldan pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4526: chen po nas 'og ma'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4527: 'jig rten gyi dpa' rtsal can lta bu las slar gyur pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4528: de lta bu'i rkyen kyi gang zag gis ces pas rten bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:4530: rtsa ba'i dam tshig la byang chub sems kyi dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)002:4531: sku dam thun mong du bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4532: dam tshig ma nyams gzhung thob na //
NK085(ru)002:4535: sku yi dam tshig gnyis ma nyams te gzhung thob pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4536: nyams su len pa kho na'o //
NK085(ru)002:4538: lus la 'byung ba dang gdon gyi nad med pa dang mtshan ldan zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:4539: 'khor lo bsgyur ba la yod pa lta bu dag 'byung zer ba'ang ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:4540: 'gro ba kun gyi yid du 'ong ba'i skur snang
NK085(ru)002:4541: ba dang 'khor rnam pa gnyis dang longs spyod kyi
NK085(ru)002:4542: tshogs thams cad ma brtsal yang rang 'phel ba dang
NK085(ru)002:4543: / don des skal pa ngan song myong mi 'gyur ces so //
NK085(ru)002:4544: nyams pa'i skyon rdo rje dmyal ba las bzlog pas /
NK085(ru)002:4545: de la sogs pa ngan song gsum po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ces pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4546: theg pa thun mong gi sgo nas /
NK085(ru)002:4547: nyes byas thams cad 'bras bu byin par mi nus pas na /
NK085(ru)002:4549: nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin pas rag ma lus par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:4550: srid pa gsum du dbang bskur zhing zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:4551: dam tshig gi yon tan chen po bdun nyid de /
NK085(ru)002:4553: dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis //
NK085(ru)002:4554: sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlobs //
NK085(ru)002:4555: zhes pas don gyis 'jig rten pa kun kyis bkur gnas su byed pas dbang byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4556: 'das pa rnams kyis byin gyis rlobs pas dbang bskur ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4557: 'gyur ni yon tan brjod pa'i tshig gi 'phrod do //
NK085(ru)002:4558: theg pa chen po'i don thob 'gyur //
NK085(ru)002:4560: sku'i dam tshig ma nyams pa rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs zin nas /
NK085(ru)002:4561: theg pa chen po'i gzhung gi don dang gdam ngag rnams thob par 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4562: byang chub sems kyi dam tshig ma nyams pas theg pa chen po'i don ni lta ba dngos te /
NK085(ru)002:4563: de nyid nyams su len par 'gyur ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4564: des na dam tshig bkod pa las kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4566: lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4568: gzhon zhing yang tsa la bab pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4569: yan lag lhag chad med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4570: dbang po ma nyams pa rnams dang /
NK085(ru)002:4572: longs spyod dang 'byor pa 'phel ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4573: 'khor ma mo dang mkha' 'gro bka' bzhin nyan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4574: srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4575: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gzhan gyis dpag gis mi lang ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4576: man ngag lung gi don rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4577: rig 'dzin rnam gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4578: kun tu bzang po dang skal ba mnyam pa /
NK085(ru)002:4581: gsung gi lha mnyes zhes pa la sogs ste /
NK085(ru)002:4582: gsung gi dam tshig sngags bzla /
NK085(ru)002:4583: phyag rgya bzhi ma nyams par bsrung ba'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)002:4584: ye shes kyi lha mnyes pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4585: des bar chad dang bral bas /
NK085(ru)002:4587: gsung gi dam tshig rgyun mi chad par nyams su blangs pa'i stobs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:4588: 'phrin las bzhi la sogs pa thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i mthu dang ldan pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4589: de'i byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhan la snang bas /
NK085(ru)002:4590: gzhan don kyi las rnam bzhi yang /
NK085(ru)002:4592: thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4593: mdor bsdus na ci dang ci bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad myur bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)002:4594: des na dam tshig mthar phyin pa'i rgya rtags rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:4595: mang pos bkur zhing grags pa thob pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4596: yid 'ong 'byung zhing 'dod pa grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4597: dam can 'du zhing mthu rtsal che ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4598: mngon shes 'byung zhing rig pa 'char ba rnams rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4599: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4600: gsung gi yon tan lha nye ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4603: bka' nyan pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4604: kun tu bzang po nga dang spyod pa mnyam par 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)002:4607: thugs kyis skyo dub med pa dang //
NK085(ru)002:4609: gsang ba bcu ma nyams pa'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)002:4610: thugs kyi sgo nas yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:4612: bsgom pa'ang mchog dang thun mong gnyis dang /
NK085(ru)002:4613: bla ma'i bya ba la bral 'dod pa'i skyo ba med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4614: ngal zhing dub pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4616: bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gnyis kyi man ngag snod du 'gyur bas /
NK085(ru)002:4619: mchog thun gyi dngos grub gang bsgrubs kyang nye bar 'grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4620: thugs dam ma nyams pa'i stobs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:4621: dgongs pa zab mo rtogs dka' ba mnyam pa nyid kyi don mkhas pa'i gdeng du 'gyur pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4622: ye shes kyi lha rnams kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba sku'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:4623: de yang dam tshig bkod las /
NK085(ru)002:4627: man ngag gi snod du 'gyur pa la sogs pa rgyas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4628: kun tu bzang po nga dang rtogs pa mnyam par 'gyur ce'o //
NK085(ru)002:4629: yan lag gi yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)002:4630: yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na //
NK085(ru)002:4632: yan lag yang nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dam tshig ma nyams te nyams su lon na /
NK085(ru)002:4633: skyon bzlog pa nyid ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:4634: gong gi skyon las bzlog pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4635: longs spyod mang du 'phel ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4636: theg pa che la dpya ma 'dogs te lta spyod mthun pas /
NK085(ru)002:4637: mchog thun mong kyi dngos grub rnams shin tu nye bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4638: 'dul bya'i don rnams dus su 'grub pa dang lta spyod ya char ma gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:4639: gsang sngags nang par chud pas /
NK085(ru)002:4640: theg pa phyi nang ma 'dres pas /
NK085(ru)002:4641: bka'i byin rlabs dus su 'grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4642: bsrung ba'i lha rnams kyis skyob pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4643: zab mo'i chos myur bar rtogs shing /
NK085(ru)002:4644: bskal par ngan song gi sdug bsngal mi myong ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4645: rnal 'byor pa spyod pa'i rlan gyis zin pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4648: spyad pa lngas lha yi bu'i bdud bcom /
NK085(ru)002:4649: mi spang ba lngas nyon mongs pa bdud bcom /
NK085(ru)002:4650: dang du blang ba lngas 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom /
NK085(ru)002:4651: shes pa lngas phung po'i bdud bcom /
NK085(ru)002:4652: bsgrub pa lnga spyi ltar rtsi'o //
NK085(ru)002:4654: rgyu sa bon gting nas dag pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4656: theg spyad par bya ba lnga pos /
NK085(ru)002:4657: theg chen lta spyod gzhung srongs zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:4658: theg pa mchog gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang spyod pa ya ma cha bas gzhung srongs pas /
NK085(ru)002:4659: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams 'go bas /
NK085(ru)002:4660: ci bsam pa thams cad 'grub la /
NK085(ru)002:4662: bdag gzhan kyi don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)002:4664: theg chen dam tshig la gnas pas //
NK085(ru)002:4666: theg chen 'di nyid kyi rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig ma nyams par gnas pas /
NK085(ru)002:4667: thun mong gi yan lag gi skabs su /
NK085(ru)002:4668: theg pa 'og ma'i nyan thos kyi 'dul khrims dang /
NK085(ru)002:4669: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa rdzogs la /
NK085(ru)002:4670: gsang sngags phyi nang gi dam tshig rnams /
NK085(ru)002:4671: ched du bsrung ba med par /
NK085(ru)002:4672: don rnams yongs su rdzogs te /
NK085(ru)002:4674: dper na shing gi phung po chen po la yan
NK085(ru)002:4675: lag phra ba'i phra ba'ang ma nyams pa lta bu'o
NK085(ru)002:4676: // de yang rten gyi gang zag de la 'dul
NK085(ru)002:4677: ba'i ngos ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i dge
NK085(ru)002:4679: sdom pa'i ngos nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4680: gsang sngags phyi pa'i ngos nas rnal 'byor dang /
NK085(ru)002:4681: nang pa gsum gyi ngos nas /
NK085(ru)002:4682: rnal 'byor chen po yin zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4683: don la ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4685: nyams pa bskang ba'i thabs la gsum gyi dang po mdor bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4686: nyams na zhes pa la sogs pa te /
NK085(ru)002:4687: de yang rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)002:4688: skyes bu ya rab kyis nyams pa'i sar mi 'jog ste /
NK085(ru)002:4689: nyams pa nyid bskang ba'i thabs /
NK085(ru)002:4690: rtsa ba'i bskang thabs so so dang /
NK085(ru)002:4691: yan lag so so rnams ni /
NK085(ru)002:4693: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4694: 'di dag nyams pa las slar gso ba'i thabs ni ci mnga' /
NK085(ru)002:4696: mi 'gyur bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol /
NK085(ru)002:4697: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:4698: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal pa /
NK085(ru)002:4699: 'di dag gso ba'i thabs ni mnga' ste /
NK085(ru)002:4701: shi zhing nyams kyang gso ba'i thabs manga'o //
NK085(ru)002:4702: gser skyogs dngul skyogs dang 'dra ste /
NK085(ru)002:4703: zhoms yang bsrang ba'i thabs manga'o //
NK085(ru)002:4704: dper na mtshon gyi ri mo dang 'dra ste /
NK085(ru)002:4705: yal yang gso ba'i thabs manga'o //
NK085(ru)002:4708: sku'i dam tshig nyams na slar gso zhing bskang pa'i cho ga gang lags /
NK085(ru)002:4709: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:4712: byang chub sems kyi bskang thabs ni //
NK085(ru)002:4713: byang chub sems kyi dam nyams na //
NK085(ru)002:4714: zhes pa la sogs pa gong du bshad pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:4715: kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis la ma mos pa
NK085(ru)002:4716: dang / nyams su ma blang ste /
NK085(ru)002:4717: phyal bar song bar rnams ni dam nyams pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4719: bla ma rgyud kyi gzhung dang dgongs pa'i nyams la mkhas pa la /
NK085(ru)002:4720: sngon du dad pa dang yo byad kyis mnyes par byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:4722: de'i ngang la dus gsum du gnas par bya ba las ma gtogs pa /
NK085(ru)002:4723: thabs kyi brtsal ba gzhan gang gis kyang mi skongs so //
NK085(ru)002:4724: gtor rgyud las sku'i nyams na ga la nyams pa'i gnas su bskang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:4725: gsung bdud rtsi 'di la bsgrub pa gsum gyis bskang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:4726: thugs ni pa ti las su rung bas bskang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:4727: yan lag ni tshogs gtor brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskang ngo zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:4728: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4730: chos thams cad dngos po dang rang bzhin med par shes na /
NK085(ru)002:4733: 'dzin pa dang chags pa med pas so //
NK085(ru)002:4734: de bas kyang chos thams cad gnyis su med cing mnyam pa nyid du shes na /
NK085(ru)002:4735: dam tshig la nyams pa'i dus med do //
NK085(ru)002:4737: rnam rtog gi phyogs ris ming yang med pas /
NK085(ru)002:4741: sku'i bskang thabs la lnga'i dang po /
NK085(ru)002:4743: sku'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)002:4744: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4745: de yang sku dam bla ma dang grogs po gnyis te /
NK085(ru)002:4746: lus ngag yid gsum gyis bshad pa ltar nyams su ma len nas /
NK085(ru)002:4749: thugs mi bde bar byas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4752: de gsum yang gong ma dang 'og ma dang bar ma'i rigs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:4753: nyes pa che chung gi bye brag ste /
NK085(ru)002:4756: gcig gi khyad kyang shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4758: man ngag la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du gnas la /
NK085(ru)002:4759: grogs po bzhi 'ang 'tsho ba gsum phrogs pa sngar dang 'dra ba las /
NK085(ru)002:4760: 'dres pa dang nye ba'i rim pa nyes che chung shes par bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:4761: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4762: rdo rje slob dpon gyi skabs na //
NK085(ru)002:4763: sku la bsdos dang thags thub spyad //
NK085(ru)002:4764: ma rigs ka ma li ma barlamasa //
NK085(ru)002:4765: ngan du brjod dang log par smras //
NK085(ru)002:4766: sku la smad cing thugs la bsdos //
NK085(ru)002:4767: bka' rkun lung med yongs su bslad //
NK085(ru)002:4771: gcig lan gcig gis byed pa ni //
NK085(ru)002:4772: be'u sbrel g.yang du ltung ba bzhin //
NK085(ru)002:4773: gnyis ka dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)002:4774: gang gis bsring pa de rgyal bas //
NK085(ru)002:4775: gnyis kas bsring na rgyal ba des //
NK085(ru)002:4776: rtsod pa rgyal yang pham pa bzhin //
NK085(ru)002:4778: des na nyams pa'i dngos po da lta bu mngon du byung bar gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:4779: gang la nyams pa der song nas /
NK085(ru)002:4781: slob dpon drug gang la nyams pa 'am /
NK085(ru)002:4782: grogs mched gang la nyams pa'i yul de'i spyan sngar song la /
NK085(ru)002:4784: nor zas 'byor ba mnyes phul nas //
NK085(ru)002:4786: kun 'dus rig pa nas smos pa'i rin che lta bu'am /
NK085(ru)002:4787: gsang ba'i snying po nas smos pas /
NK085(ru)002:4788: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
NK085(ru)002:4789: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4790: zas kyi bye brag rang gi 'byor tshad dam /
NK085(ru)002:4791: yang na yul mnyes pa'i tshad du phyin par phul nas /
NK085(ru)002:4792: gang nyes tshig tu bshags byas la //
NK085(ru)002:4794: rang gis nyams pa'i dngos po gang nyes pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4795: sems gnong ba dang bcas pas /
NK085(ru)002:4796: tshig tu zur phyin par bshags par bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:4797: ma mos shing mi dad pa lta bu ma yin par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:4799: da nyes ni ma nyes ste /
NK085(ru)002:4800: bshags pa ni byed zer ba lta bu ni mi dag par gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:4801: de ltar bshags pa byas pa'i rting la /
NK085(ru)002:4802: phyin chad de las mi 'da' ba'i sdom pa legs par baca'o //
NK085(ru)002:4803: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4804: rnam par dag pa'i bsam pas mthol //
NK085(ru)002:4805: don gyis mi gnas tshig 'dis gshegs //
NK085(ru)002:4806: rang bzhin med par bzod par gsol //
NK085(ru)002:4808: yul de med na de'i slob dpon la skongs thabs ni //
NK085(ru)002:4809: gal te grongs chad gyur pa na //
NK085(ru)002:4812: yul gnyis gang yin pa de /
NK085(ru)002:4814: chad ste bar du rtsa chen po'i bcad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4815: gcan zan gtum pos bcad pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4816: rgyal khams mi gcig pas chod de /
NK085(ru)002:4817: bgrod thabs med par gyur pa na /
NK085(ru)002:4818: yul gnyis po de'i slob dpon gang yin par khugs par gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:4819: gnas skabs de'i tshe gong ma bzhin ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:4820: yul gang yin par der song la /
NK085(ru)002:4821: sngon du nor zas kyis mnyes par byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:4822: nyes pa gang yin pa de tshig tu dag par bshags la /
NK085(ru)002:4823: phyin chad sdom pa legs par bcang ba la ni bshags zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4824: yul gang gis kyang myur du tshangs pa sbyin par bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:4825: de ma byas na gnyis ka lhung ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4827: de ltar bshags pa byed na yang //
NK085(ru)002:4828: slob dpon la sogs mched rnams kyis //
NK085(ru)002:4829: gang zhig nongs par dran pa dang //
NK085(ru)002:4830: rjes su 'gyod pa skyes nas su //
NK085(ru)002:4831: slan chad sdom par 'tshal ba dang //
NK085(ru)002:4832: tshangs pa 'phral du gsol bar bya //
NK085(ru)002:4834: de yang dam tshig gi rgyud las /
NK085(ru)002:4835: gal te nyams pa ma bskangs par //
NK085(ru)002:4836: bla ma slob dpon mched lcam dral //
NK085(ru)002:4837: rkyen kyis grongs chad gyur pas na //
NK085(ru)002:4838: de'i slob dpon bzhugs pa la //
NK085(ru)002:4839: gong ma bzhin du bshags par bya //
NK085(ru)002:4841: mnyam pa brgya la bshags pa ni //
NK085(ru)002:4842: med na mnyam pa brgya la gshags //
NK085(ru)002:4844: slob dpon de yang grongs chad du gyur nas med na /
NK085(ru)002:4845: yul gnyis po gang rung dang /
NK085(ru)002:4846: dgongs pa mnyam pa brgya btsal te /
NK085(ru)002:4847: dngos 'dra ba brgya ma rnyed kyang dod brtsi ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4848: nyan thos kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'bum /
NK085(ru)002:4849: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang mnyam la /
NK085(ru)002:4851: gsang sngags phyi pa'i tshigs gcig dang mnyam la /
NK085(ru)002:4853: gsang sngags nang pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang mnyam /
NK085(ru)002:4854: de lta bu'i brgya tshang ba la bshags pa'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)002:4856: rjes kyi bya ba rnams bshad pa ltar nyams su blang ste gshegs so //
NK085(ru)002:4857: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4858: de'i slob dpon mi bzhugs na //
NK085(ru)002:4859: de dang mnyam pa brgya rnams la //
NK085(ru)002:4860: de tshe gong ma bzhin du gshegs //
NK085(ru)002:4862: de ma rnyed na sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4863: de yang rnyed pa ma gyur na //
NK085(ru)002:4864: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4865: mnyam pa brgya po de yang rnyed par ma gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:4866: nyams pa'i yul gang yin pa de dang /
NK085(ru)002:4867: lta spyod bsgom gsum mnyam pa gsum /
NK085(ru)002:4868: bkug pa de nas spyan drangs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4870: gcig rdo rje rgyal po ste /
NK085(ru)002:4871: ting nge 'dzin 'phro 'du gcig pu'i las byed /
NK085(ru)002:4872: gcig rdo rje rgyal tshab ste /
NK085(ru)002:4873: ting nge 'dzin dang phrin las gnyis kyi gzhung bsrang /
NK085(ru)002:4875: 'phrin las dang las bsgrigs thams cad bya ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4876: sbyin sreg me thab ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:4877: las thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i sbyin sreg ste /
NK085(ru)002:4878: de yang me lha drang srong la sbyin pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4879: dkyil 'khor yi dngos gzhi la bsreg pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4880: gzhi med la brten pa'i gzhi las /
NK085(ru)002:4881: 'dir zhi ba'i thabs zlum po dang /
NK085(ru)002:4882: kha dog dkar po la sogs pa mtshan nyid dang mthun pa brtsigs nas /
NK085(ru)002:4883: zhi ba'i khyad par kyi chos rnams dang /
NK085(ru)002:4885: bsregs rdzas rnams lta gon du gnas pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4886: zhi bar smos pas shing brtsig pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4887: rang nyid las kyi lha yi rnal 'byor sta gon byas nas /
NK085(ru)002:4888: mtshan nyid dang mthun pa'i me sbar ste /
NK085(ru)002:4889: zhi ba'i me lha skyed de /
NK085(ru)002:4894: der me lha me'i rang bzhin du byas pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor lha zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:4898: yang na bla ma nyid kyi thugs dam gang yin pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4900: dbang mnos pa'i dal thun mong gang yin pa'am /
NK085(ru)002:4901: yang na grogs po'i yi dam mo //
NK085(ru)002:4902: de dag me'i nang du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed /
NK085(ru)002:4904: ye shes pa spyan drangs te bstim /
NK085(ru)002:4905: de nas mchod pa rnams gzhung dang mthun par 'bul ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:4906: yang spyan drangs zhes pa nyams pa'i yul gang yin pa'ang /
NK085(ru)002:4907: yang nas yang du spyan drangs shing dkyil 'khor la bstim /
NK085(ru)002:4908: rdzas su zhes pas bsreg rdzas rnams mngon par rtogs pa'i gral rim pa bzhin 'bul te /
NK085(ru)002:4910: gsang mtshan la sogs zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:4911: ye shes lha sngags kyi rting la bdag che ge mo zhes pa'i gsang mtshan dang /
NK085(ru)002:4912: dam tshig nyams pa shin+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK085(ru)002:4914: bsdus pa'i don te rim par mchod do //
NK085(ru)002:4915: yang na sbyin sreg gi dus su bla ma dang grogs po gang yin pa de spyan drangs te /
NK085(ru)002:4916: tshul ci ltar na gsang mtshan kyi sgo nas sam sogs khongs su /
NK085(ru)002:4917: 'jig rten pa la grags pa'i mtshan no //
NK085(ru)002:4919: de la sbyin sreg gi mchod pa gzhung bzhin du bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4920: de yang tshar nas me lha'i cho ga rnams kyang byas te /
NK085(ru)002:4921: spyir sbyin sreg bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig la
NK085(ru)002:4922: sogs pa tshar nas gong du smos pa'i yo byad
NK085(ru)002:4924: bshags thabs dang po'i skabs su smos pa'i nor zas 'byor pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:4926: klad du smos pa'i mnyam pa gsum mo //
NK085(ru)002:4927: yang na dbang po zhes bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4928: bshags pa'i dpang po bshad ma thag pa'i slob dpon gsum mo //
NK085(ru)002:4929: de dag mnyes pa'i thabs su 'bul bar bya /
NK085(ru)002:4931: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4932: de yang rnyed par ma gyur na //
NK085(ru)002:4933: sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsigs nas //
NK085(ru)002:4934: de dang mnyam pa gsum bkug nas //
NK085(ru)002:4935: mchod rdzas sna tshogs bsham par bya //
NK085(ru)002:4936: gsum po de yang dpang por bzhag /bla ma la sogs mched rnams kyi //
NK085(ru)002:4937: gsang mtshan la sogs spyan drangs te //
NK085(ru)002:4938: sbyin sreg mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya //
NK085(ru)002:4939: dkyil 'khor lha la tshul bzhin bya //
NK085(ru)002:4940: bzhugs la gshegs pa'i cho ga gdags //
NK085(ru)002:4941: de tshe zin par gyur pa'i tshe //
NK085(ru)002:4942: gong du smos pa'i yon rnams kyang //
NK085(ru)002:4943: dpang po gsum la dbul bar bya //
NK085(ru)002:4944: des kyang yongs su bshad par gtang //
NK085(ru)002:4945: de bzhin lan grangs bdun du bya //
NK085(ru)002:4946: de ltar byas na skongs par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)002:4947: mched la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:4949: dpang po gsum gyis kyang tshangs rgya sbyin pa gal che'o //
NK085(ru)002:4950: yul gyis myur du tshangs pa sbyin pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4951: gal te gus pas mi lan na //
NK085(ru)002:4953: gal te nyams pa can gyis de ltar gdung pa'i sems kyis bshags pa dang du blangs kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4956: gus pas bshags pa mi len na /
NK085(ru)002:4957: brnag sems che bar gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:4958: nyes pa shin tu che ste /
NK085(ru)002:4959: spyir theg pa chen po'i lugs kyis sems can chud mi gson cing /
NK085(ru)002:4960: byams pa dang snying rjes bzung la /
NK085(ru)002:4961: gsang sngags ni de bas kyang thabs la mkhas pa yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:4962: thabs ci'i sgo nas kyang gzhan don 'ba' zhig nyams su len pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:4963: des na gnyis ka zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:4964: yul gyis bshags pa ma blangs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:4965: de nyid kyis yul can gyi dri ma ma dag pas nyes pa mnyam pas /
NK085(ru)002:4966: gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar ltung zhe'o //
NK085(ru)002:4967: nyes pa che ba de bas yul gyis kyang myur ba gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:4968: rang ngo nas tshangs par byas la /
NK085(ru)002:4969: gzhan ngor tshangs pa btsal bar yang bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:4970: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:4971: de la tshangs pa ma btsal na //
NK085(ru)002:4972: gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar skye //
NK085(ru)002:4973: de la sdug bsngal bzod klags med //
NK085(ru)002:4974: de bas tshangs pa rtsal bar bya //
NK085(ru)002:4976: de ltar nyes pa dag par gyur nas kyang /
NK085(ru)002:4978: de phyir mi gtogs zer ba lta bu ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:4979: snga bas kyang nye ba dang gdung sems dang /
NK085(ru)002:4980: zhabs 'bring las 'bad par bya ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:4982: de ltar tshangs pa thob nas kyang //
NK085(ru)002:4983: gshegs par 'dod pa gang yin pas //
NK085(ru)002:4984: zhabs la spyi bos blang bar bya //
NK085(ru)002:4985: slad chad mi gnyis gcig par bya zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:4987: gsung gi dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:4988: de yang gsung gi dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)002:4989: sngags gsum phyag rgya bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:4990: rnal 'byor rab 'bring gis dus tshod las 'das pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:4993: yid kyi shes pa 'dzin rtog gi dbang du song bas te /
NK085(ru)002:4994: slob dpon lung med cing man ngag la mi mkhas pa na /
NK085(ru)002:4995: don des rnal 'byor pa rtogs pa dang lta ba chung zhing /
NK085(ru)002:4996: gsung gi dam tshig gzhung du ma bsnyags pas so //
NK085(ru)002:4998: yag nyes thams cad 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa lus ngag yid gsum /
NK085(ru)002:4999: lha yi sku gsung thugs nyid du gsal ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:5001: ngag yi dam gyi gsung gi rang bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5002: sems mnyam pa nyid bde bar gshegs pa thams cad
NK085(ru)002:5003: kyi thugs su tshig tsam ma yin pa dag rig
NK085(ru)002:5004: pa la gding chud pa nyid /
NK085(ru)002:5005: nges par shes ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:5006: de lta bu'i don mngon du gyur pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5007: nyams pa skongs ba dus gcig pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5008: des na lam gyi rtsol ba zad pa nyid 'bras bu dang mtshungs so //
NK085(ru)002:5009: rtogs pa'i 'bras bu las snang bas 'gyur ces bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:5011: lus kyi bsgul skyod ze ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin yin la /
NK085(ru)002:5013: bzlas par bya ba'i snying po yin la /
NK085(ru)002:5014: sems kyi dran rtog thams cad thugs ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin zhes so //
NK085(ru)002:5015: de ni nyams pa nyid lta ba'i bskang thabs so //
NK085(ru)002:5017: bzlas pa bldab kyis bsab pa dang //
NK085(ru)002:5019: gsung gi dam tshig phyag rgya bzhi la brten te /
NK085(ru)002:5022: nyis brgya btang ba lta bu'am /
NK085(ru)002:5024: de zhi ba'i phyir phur pa'i bsgrub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5026: bdud rtsi sman gyi bsgrub pa dang gsum gyis bskang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:5028: thugs kyi dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5029: gsang ba bcu'i dam tshig ma gsang nas snod min la bsgrags te /
NK085(ru)002:5030: skye bo kun kyis shes par gyur pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5034: 'gro drug sems su gsal rtogs na zhes pa drug
NK085(ru)002:5035: gis 'gro ba thams cad don dam pa'i byang chub
NK085(ru)002:5036: sems su bshad pa ltar sems nyid du dbyer med
NK085(ru)002:5037: par kha tsam tshig tsam ma yin par rig pa
NK085(ru)002:5040: de lta bu'i don mngon du gyur na /
NK085(ru)002:5041: chos thams cad sems nyid du gcig pas /
NK085(ru)002:5042: yul yul can ma grub pa'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:5043: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid lta bu'i yul du snang ba'ang bdag nyid las mi gzhan pas /
NK085(ru)002:5044: bdag la gsang ba med ces bya ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:5045: gnyis can ma grub pas so //
NK085(ru)002:5046: don de'i ngang las thams cad bdag nyid chen por
NK085(ru)002:5047: rtogs pas yod med dang snang stong la sogs pa'i
NK085(ru)002:5048: mtha' gang du'ang mi rtogs pa'i blo ting nge 'dzin
NK085(ru)002:5049: la klung zhugs / zhes bya ste /
NK085(ru)002:5050: bar chod med pa dang thams cad de nyid du shes pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5053: ma yeng blo la 'dris par bya //
NK085(ru)002:5055: gong ma'i don de nyid las /
NK085(ru)002:5056: dus gsum du spyod lam rnam par g.yeng ba drug gi dbang du ma song bar /
NK085(ru)002:5059: de ltar ma yin pa skongs pa'i thabs rnam par bstan to //
NK085(ru)002:5060: de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)002:5061: nam mkha' la yang dog med pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5062: blo chos nyid du gyur pa las /
NK085(ru)002:5063: 'jig rten gyi bag chags spangs pas /
NK085(ru)002:5064: gang zhig smras shing brjod na yang /
NK085(ru)002:5065: snod dang mi ldan pa rnam par shes par byas la /
NK085(ru)002:5066: bsrung du med pa'i ngo bo rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor pas /
NK085(ru)002:5067: chos nyid tshig dang yi ge las 'das /
NK085(ru)002:5070: nam mkha' la yang dog rnams bzhi /
NK085(ru)002:5071: sems dpa' chen po 'di lta bu'i man ngag nos la /
NK085(ru)002:5072: khongs su chus par gyis shig /thugs kyi dam tshig skongs pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5073: 'di lta bu la yengs pa rnam par gyis shig /thugs kyi dam tshig mi nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5074: 'di'i don la 'gyur ba med par gyis shig /thugs kyi dam tshig mi 'da' ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:5075: yan lag gi bskang thabs ni /
NK085(ru)002:5076: yan lag dam tshig ces pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:5077: 'dir thun mong ma yin pa'i yan lag gi dam
NK085(ru)002:5078: tshig grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga po'i gang dang gang
NK085(ru)002:5080: gang nyams pa de'i snga sor bcug ste bsdams pa la /
NK085(ru)002:5081: gzhan yang tshogs chen zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:5082: yi dam gyi sgo nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:5084: bsdam pa nyid kyis chog go //
NK085(ru)002:5085: de nyid kyi skongs ba'i thabs kyang /
NK085(ru)002:5086: dam chen po las dpel na shing ta la rtsa
NK085(ru)002:5087: ba myu gu byung na yan lag shugs kyis skye
NK085(ru)002:5088: ba bzhin / rtsa ba rnams na yan lag shugs kyis skongs par 'gyur la /
NK085(ru)002:5089: gal te nyams par tshor na yang /
NK085(ru)002:5090: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)002:5091: dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i phrin las kyis bskang /
NK085(ru)002:5092: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
NK085(ru)002:5094: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK085(ru)002:5095: rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bshad pa de ltar
NK085(ru)002:5096: rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs na skongs par 'gyur
NK085(ru)002:5097: te / de'i yon tan ni snga rtags sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur /
NK085(ru)002:5100: tshe 'di la smin pa'i sdug bsngal rnams 'byung ba mi 'gyur la /
NK085(ru)002:5101: don des phyi ma la smin pa'i 'bras bu ngan pa mi snang zhes brjod do //
NK085(ru)002:5103: dpe la gsum gyi mdor bstan pa /
NK085(ru)002:5104: dam tshig chen po zhes pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:5105: dam tshig ni rtsa ba dang yan lag rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:5106: chen po ni yo ga phyin chod kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pas bshad pa rnams so //
NK085(ru)002:5108: theg pa mchog gi dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)002:5109: rin po che dbang gi rgyal po dang 'dra ste /
NK085(ru)002:5110: don thams cad lhun gyis grub pas /
NK085(ru)002:5111: de nyid kyi dbang gis dpes mtshon la /
NK085(ru)002:5112: dpe res don re tsam mtshon nus pa'i dbang gis /
NK085(ru)002:5113: yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i tshe re'i ngos nas /
NK085(ru)002:5114: dpe re re ste grangs bcu gcig gi sgo nas bstan pa gang zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:5116: sa gzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin la //
NK085(ru)002:5117: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5118: dper na sa gzhi chen po ni /
NK085(ru)002:5120: de'i longs spyod du gyur pa /
NK085(ru)002:5121: sa bon las 'bras bu smin pa'i bar thams cad sa gzhi la brten te /
NK085(ru)002:5122: skye zhing snang ste smin par byed la /
NK085(ru)002:5123: sa gzhi rnam gang yang snang ba ltar /
NK085(ru)002:5124: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig kyang /
NK085(ru)002:5125: dpe de lta bu'i rang bzhin bas lam gyi sngon du 'gro ba'i gzhi lta ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:5126: nyams su blangs pa'i ngo bo /
NK085(ru)002:5127: ting nge 'dzin bskyed rdzogs kyi gnyis dang /
NK085(ru)002:5128: de las snang ba'i 'bras bu sku lnga rgyan gyi 'khor los /
NK085(ru)002:5129: so so'i mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams kun /
NK085(ru)002:5130: sa gzhi dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig med na /
NK085(ru)002:5131: las 'bras gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:5132: thams cad dam tshig la snang bar bstan no //
NK085(ru)002:5133: bsrung thub ma thub kyis legs nyes su 'gyur ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5134: so mtshams mkhar kyi zhes pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:5136: so 'tshams che ba'i sa na mkhar btsan po gcig
NK085(ru)002:5137: yod na de bsrung thub ste dgra la ma shor
NK085(ru)002:5138: na / bdag phyogs rgyal zhing dgra phyogs pham la /
NK085(ru)002:5139: bsrung ma thub na mkhar dgra la shor bas /
NK085(ru)002:5140: dgra phyogs rgyal zhing bdag phyogs gtan pham pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5141: 'dir dam tshig kyang de'i rang bzhin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5142: so 'tshams dang 'dra bas 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bar na mkhar dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)002:5143: bsrung ba thub ste rtsa ba dang yan lag rnams
NK085(ru)002:5144: ma nyams na legs pa stobs chen po byed de
NK085(ru)002:5145: / 'jig rten gyi bde legs kyis kyang mi nye
NK085(ru)002:5146: bas lam dang 'bras bu'i yon tan thams cad snang
NK085(ru)002:5147: / ba'o // bsrung ba ma thub ste /
NK085(ru)002:5148: rtsa ba dang yan lag rnams nyams pa las nyes pa stobs po che snang ste /
NK085(ru)002:5149: rdo rje dmyal bar 'tshed nas thar pa'i byang chub gtan chad pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5150: bsrungs pas dgos 'dod skang ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5151: rin chen zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5152: dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
NK085(ru)002:5153: 'dam khung du bsnubs na yon tan mi snang la
NK085(ru)002:5154: / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te /
NK085(ru)002:5155: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod na /
NK085(ru)002:5158: dam tshig kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5159: rgyal mtshan kyi rtse mo la btags te /
NK085(ru)002:5160: mchod pa dang 'dra ba'i ma nyams par bsrung na /
NK085(ru)002:5161: dngos grub ni sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5162: lam rig 'dzin rnams snang la dgos 'dod ni rnal 'byor pa'i blo'i dgos pa skong ste /
NK085(ru)002:5163: bshad pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnams dang /
NK085(ru)002:5164: rgya rtags rnam pa bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)002:5166: re ba thams cad dam tshig la snang ngo //
NK085(ru)002:5167: chos thams cad dam tshig tu 'dus pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5168: nam mkha' lta bu'i zhes pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:5170: nam mkha' ni dngos po rnams kyang /
NK085(ru)002:5171: snang srid kyi chos thams cad nam mkha' las snang zhing /
NK085(ru)002:5172: nam mkha' dang mi gnyis shing dbyer med la /
NK085(ru)002:5174: dam tshig kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5175: de ma nyams par yod na /
NK085(ru)002:5176: yon tan gyi rtsal phrin las bzhi nas sangs rgyas pa'i bar thams cad dam tshig las snang zhing /
NK085(ru)002:5177: de dang mi gnyis shing dbyer med pa la shong par 'gyur /
NK085(ru)002:5179: 'khor ba'i d+r+wa ba gcod pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5180: rno dbal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5182: bya la sogs pa'i srog chags gang rung cig d+r+wa bar bcug na /
NK085(ru)002:5183: 'phur ba la sogs pa'i bde blag med de /
NK085(ru)002:5184: 'ching ba mtshon rnon po dbal ngar ma dang /
NK085(ru)002:5185: chas pas d+r+wa ba bcad na /
NK085(ru)002:5186: 'ching byed med pas nam mkha' la sogs pa la longs spyod bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5187: dam tshig kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin bas /
NK085(ru)002:5189: thar pa'i bde blag med pa dang 'dra bas nyon mongs pa'i d+r+wa ba ma lus pa gcod de /
NK085(ru)002:5190: thar pa'i bde blag longs spyod pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5191: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba bskyed pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5192: pha ma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5193: dper na sems can rnams pha ma la skye zhing /
NK085(ru)002:5194: des bskyed de snang ba ltar /
NK085(ru)002:5195: dam tshig kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5196: 'das pa la sogs dus gsum gyi mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba'i rgyal ba ma lus pa thams cad /
NK085(ru)002:5197: dam tshig bskyed cing de las snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:5198: dngos grub kyi rlabs 'byung ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5199: rgya mtsho zhes pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:5200: dper na mtha'i rgya mtsho las /
NK085(ru)002:5201: rin po che la sogs pa'i rlabs 'byung ba yang /
NK085(ru)002:5202: dus su 'byung zhing dus las mi 'da' /
NK085(ru)002:5203: dam tshig kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin pas yon tan kyi rlabs che ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:5204: dpe las khyad par du gyur pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5205: rten gyi gang zag gi rtogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5206: sa tshod kyi gnas skabs kyis dus su 'byung bar 'gyur te /
NK085(ru)002:5211: 'phrin las gang yang thogs pa med par 'grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5212: mngon shes dang ye shes rnams dam tshig las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)002:5213: khyad du mi gsod cing bgas dang ldan pa'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5214: me dpung zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5215: dper na me yi phung po chen po la btsa'
NK085(ru)002:5216: zhing bsten na yon tan thams cad snang la ma
NK085(ru)002:5218: gang reg pa thams cad 'tshig pa bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5219: dam tshig kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin bas /
NK085(ru)002:5220: mi btsa' ba dang 'dra bas dam tshig bsrung ba la ma 'das na /
NK085(ru)002:5221: yon tan thams cad snang la /
NK085(ru)002:5224: dam tshig dang 'gal ba thams cad thar pa'i sa bon 'jig par 'gyur zhes bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:5225: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5226: de bzhin rtsi sman zhes pa ste bshad pa bzhin
NK085(ru)002:5227: gzhan yang dam tshig gi rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin
NK085(ru)002:5228: 'dra ste / tsha grangs gi nad gang la nad dang mthun pa'i kha zas te /
NK085(ru)002:5230: ma nor ba'i bsil drod rnams pa gnyis kyi sman gyis nad dang mthun par bstan cing btang na /
NK085(ru)002:5231: nad gtan nas byang bar byed pa dang 'dra bar dam tshig kyang de lta ba'i rang bzhin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5232: ma nyams na khams gsum 'khor ba'i thog ma med pa'i mu nas ltas pa'i /
NK085(ru)002:5233: gzung 'dzin gnyis sdug bsngal bskyed cing thon dka' ba'i rong lta bu /
NK085(ru)002:5234: che 'phra ma lus pa thams cad 'byin cing mi gnas pa mdzad do //
NK085(ru)002:5235: byas pa chud mi za ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5236: rgyal po lta bu zhes pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:5237: dper na rgyal khrims yod pa'i rgyal po /
NK085(ru)002:5239: rgyal khrims la gnas nas rgyal po'i srid btsa' shes na /
NK085(ru)002:5240: len pa ci byas thams cad chud mi za ste /
NK085(ru)002:5241: 'bangs ngan pa las bzang por 'gyur la /
NK085(ru)002:5242: de las kyang mthar blon por 'gyur pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5244: nyes pa'i gral rim bzhin khrims phog la /
NK085(ru)002:5245: nyes chen mgo gcod pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5246: dam tshig kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5247: phyogs 'ga' brten pa'i zhes pa zag bcas kyi dus su mos pas bsrung ba tsam gyis phyogs pas /
NK085(ru)002:5248: de'i yon tan rnams snang la /
NK085(ru)002:5249: de nyid rim gyis stobs su gyur nas /
NK085(ru)002:5250: zag med kyi gnas skabs su /
NK085(ru)002:5251: stobs su gyur pa'i phyogs nyid kyis /
NK085(ru)002:5254: dam tshig dang 'gal na mgo gcod pa dang 'dra bas thar pa'i sa bon tshig go //
NK085(ru)002:5255: de na slob dpon a ro ye shes 'byung gnas kyis /
NK085(ru)002:5256: gsang sngags skye ba gnyis yin te //
NK085(ru)002:5257: rdo rje dmyal dang sangs rgyas pa //
NK085(ru)002:5259: las dang po nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi 'bral ba'i dpe ni /
NK085(ru)002:5260: rgya mtsho nor len zhes pa la sogs te /
NK085(ru)002:5261: rgya mtsho'i klong nas nor bu rin po che len pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5262: gsang sngags kyi 'bras bu bsgrub pa don mthun te /
NK085(ru)002:5263: mtsho dang 'dra ba'i khams gsum 'khor ba las brgal ba la /
NK085(ru)002:5264: gzings dang 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi theg par zhugs
NK085(ru)002:5265: nas chu srin dang 'dra ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs
NK085(ru)002:5266: lam gyi bar chad rnams yod pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5267: chu srin bsal ba'i thabs su /
NK085(ru)002:5268: dung 'du ba'i thabs 'o ma yin la /
NK085(ru)002:5271: gcig ni shi theb yin pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5272: lam gyi bden pa gnyis so //
NK085(ru)002:5274: bya rog gnyis gso ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:5275: dran dang shes bzhin gyi bya ra bas lam pa'i rgyud la brtags pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5276: rgya mtsho'i phyogs su brtags pa'i tshe /
NK085(ru)002:5277: brag dmar po'i ri chen gi gong na tshur nyi zla 'char ba lta bu yod /
NK085(ru)002:5278: chu srin kha la'ang de bu yod pas /
NK085(ru)002:5279: chu srin yin na gzings gson po gre bar nub pas /
NK085(ru)002:5280: de yin min brtag pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:5282: khyu chags pa'i phyir bdun no //
NK085(ru)002:5283: de yang chu srin yin na tshur log la /
NK085(ru)002:5284: chu srin min na de nyid la bab ste /
NK085(ru)002:5285: de'i chos mthun byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no //
NK085(ru)002:5286: zur bzhi gdan bzhi btsugs te /
NK085(ru)002:5287: mthun pa'i rlung dang 'phrad na pha bong steng du bzhag pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5288: ba dan bsgreng nas 'gro ba dang mthun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)002:5289: mi mthun pa'i rlung byung na /
NK085(ru)002:5290: ba dan dril te bsdad pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:5292: lcags thag 'dom dgus btags chu nang du dpyangs bas /
NK085(ru)002:5293: rgya mtsho 'jings 'dom dgu'i so na g.yo ba med pas gzings gang du'ang mi 'gyur ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:5294: pha bong bzhi dang 'dra ba'i tshad med pa bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:5295: de lta bu'i gzings la brten te /
NK085(ru)002:5297: de nyid kyi tshogs len te /
NK085(ru)002:5298: 'gro ba dbul 'phongs rnams la sbyin pa btang ba bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5299: theg pa'i sgor 'jug ste nyams su blangs nas /
NK085(ru)002:5300: 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur nas /
NK085(ru)002:5301: gzhan don gyi mdzad pas gdul bya rnams kyis dgos pa skong bar byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5302: de nas gzings kyi dgos pa'i bya ba thams cad tshang yang /
NK085(ru)002:5303: tshong dpon lan mang po song ba rgan pa nyid
NK085(ru)002:5304: gzings la dang po zhugs nas mthar yul du ma
NK085(ru)002:5306: de nyid med ka med pa dang 'dra bar /
NK085(ru)002:5307: thog ma nas mthar 'dis phyin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5308: zhes pa 'dir 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i rten kyi gang zag mthar sangs ma rgyas bar du /
NK085(ru)002:5309: tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig la rag las te /
NK085(ru)002:5310: rgan pa dang 'dra ba'i thog med pa'i sangs rgyas pa thams cad kyang dam tshig las snang la /
NK085(ru)002:5311: lan mang song ba dang 'dra ba'i dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
NK085(ru)002:5312: byang chub sems dpa' ril yang /
NK085(ru)002:5313: mthar dam tshig 'dis phyin par byed pas /
NK085(ru)002:5314: 'di nyid bsrungs ba la bshad pa bzhin nan tan che bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:5315: spyi don bcu pa mdo bzhis brjod bya'i zhabs bsdu
NK085(ru)002:5316: ba la dbu nas brten pa'i rang bzhin gyi mdo
NK085(ru)002:5317: la gsum gyi / rang bzhin gyi dam tshig bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5318: dam tshig dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5319: gsang sngags phyi ba dang nang pa'i gnyis sam /
NK085(ru)002:5320: yang na rtsa ba dang yan lag gam /
NK085(ru)002:5321: don dam dang kun rdzob rnam pa gnyis so //
NK085(ru)002:5322: bsrung bya'i rnam grangs de dag sems nyid las ma gtogs pa'ibaduda cig na /
NK085(ru)002:5323: logs su yod pa ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:5324: 'o na ci ltar yin zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:5325: rnam grangs su bcas pa'i dam tshig ma lus pa thams cad rang gi sems nyid du 'dus la /
NK085(ru)002:5326: rang gi sems nyid dam tshig tu snang ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:5327: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis de ltar yin pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5328: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5329: ci snyed ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5330: rnam grangs mang po'i chos dbang po drug gi yul
NK085(ru)002:5331: du snang ba'i kun rdzob kyi chos rnams ma lus
NK085(ru)002:5332: pa kun yul las gzhan pa gcig ma yin te
NK085(ru)002:5333: / sems rang rig kha dog gi chos kyis ma
NK085(ru)002:5334: reg /dbyings kyi chos kyis ma reg /rigs dang gnas
NK085(ru)002:5335: kyis ma reg pas kun bral la /
NK085(ru)002:5336: de nyid 'gyur ba med cing thams cad dbyer med pas gzhan pa ma dmigs pa nyid /
NK085(ru)002:5337: mi 'gag par rang snang ba'i gtan tshigs kyis /
NK085(ru)002:5339: dbang po'i yul du gyur pa thams cad ci srid de /
NK085(ru)002:5340: dbang po'i spyod yul du ma gyur kyang /
NK085(ru)002:5341: gling gsum dang ri rab lta bur yod nges pa rnams /
NK085(ru)002:5342: 'ongs bsdus med par rang rig pa nyid du 'dus la /
NK085(ru)002:5343: rang rig pa nyid de dag du gsal bas /
NK085(ru)002:5344: de lta bu'i gdengs mnga' ba'i skyes bu la /
NK085(ru)002:5347: spyod lam rnam bzhir gar song yang /
NK085(ru)002:5349: chos thams cad kyi dwangs bcud dang /
NK085(ru)002:5350: chos thams cad kyi 'byung ba'i gzhi dang /
NK085(ru)002:5352: sems kyi chos nyid kyi don la /
NK085(ru)002:5353: skad cig kyang 'da' mi srid de /
NK085(ru)002:5354: chu dang gsher ba lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:5358: byed pa pos ma byas pas rang bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5359: dus rgyun du de las mi 'da' bas dam tshig
NK085(ru)002:5360: /yo ga phyis chod kyi spyod yul ma yin pas
NK085(ru)002:5361: na chen po'o // de nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis 'da' ba med par bstan te /
NK085(ru)002:5363: de nyid shes par bya ba lta ba'i mdo ni /
NK085(ru)002:5364: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5365: nam mkha' stong gsal byas pa rnams bzhin /
NK085(ru)002:5366: bshad pa'i dam tshig rgyu rkyen dang bral te /
NK085(ru)002:5367: de nyid ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa lhun 'grub /
NK085(ru)002:5368: dus rgyun du de las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig /las zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:5369: tha snyad tsam du rtogs bya'i yul lo //
NK085(ru)002:5371: yid kyi shes pa'i rang bzhin rtogs nas /
NK085(ru)002:5372: yul dang yul can med par rang gsal ba nyid
NK085(ru)002:5373: kyis bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyi dam tshig /phyin ci
NK085(ru)002:5374: ma log par rang gi ngo bo ci lta bar
NK085(ru)002:5375: rtogs pa'i tshe / sngon snang zhes pas /
NK085(ru)002:5376: mngon gsum du snang ba gzugs kyi cha gzhi la ma grub ste /
NK085(ru)002:5378: der ma zad btags pa tha snyad tsam gyi chos su 'dzin pa'ang med pas /
NK085(ru)002:5379: don de nyid yul dang yul can med de rang gsal ba ni lta ba zhes brjod la /
NK085(ru)002:5380: de la dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba'i dam tshig
NK085(ru)002:5381: bsrung 'tshams ris su 'chad pa rnams kyi ngo bo
NK085(ru)002:5382: nyid yin kyang / de dag gis ma gos pas chen por /
NK085(ru)002:5383: bshad ces pa dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las so //
NK085(ru)002:5384: gsang snying las kyang mnyam la mnyam pa sbyor ba yi /
NK085(ru)002:5385: mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na /
NK085(ru)002:5386: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas //
NK085(ru)002:5387: 'das nas sangs rgyas ma yin no //
NK085(ru)002:5389: goms byed ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo ni /
NK085(ru)002:5390: de don zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK085(ru)002:5391: lta ba'i dam tshig de'i don bshad pa nyid /
NK085(ru)002:5392: goms pa ting nge 'dzin lam gyi ngo bo yin pas /
NK085(ru)002:5393: rnal 'byor pa'i blo la 'dris par gyis //
NK085(ru)002:5395: de yang thun du bcad pa tsam gyis dam tshig lhun gyis grub par mi 'ong pas /
NK085(ru)002:5396: spyod lam bzhi po kun tu mnyams pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5398: de nyid dus gsum du yengs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
NK085(ru)002:5399: rgyun chad med pas chu bo'i rgyun lta bur /
NK085(ru)002:5400: ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig las mi 'da' ba ste /
NK085(ru)002:5401: de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas nyid dang /
NK085(ru)002:5402: dgongs pa spyod yul gcig la rol bas /
NK085(ru)002:5403: lus mi yang sems sangs rgyas te /
NK085(ru)002:5404: dman pa'i lus la dam pa'i dgongs pa can /
NK085(ru)002:5407: 'di la bsrung ba gcig kyang med //
NK085(ru)002:5409: dngos po nye bar mtshon pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5410: lta sgom dbyer med par bshad ma thag pa nyid do /
NK085(ru)002:5412: gong du mngon snang btags pa'i chos med /
NK085(ru)002:5414: dngos po gzung 'dzin gyis bslangs ba'i rnam grangs kyi chos /
NK085(ru)002:5415: phra ba gcig kyang med pas /
NK085(ru)002:5416: de 'dul ba'i gnyen po ris su bcad pa'i bsrung ba sna gcig tsam yang med ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:5417: 'o na bsrung ba dang bral bas /
NK085(ru)002:5418: nyams pa mi 'gyur ram ce na /
NK085(ru)002:5420: nyes pa rdul tsam 'byung mi srid ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:5421: dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5422: rtsa ba gzung 'dzin las snang bas na /
NK085(ru)002:5424: des bskyed pa'i nyams pa'i nyes pa /
NK085(ru)002:5425: rgyu 'bras bu rdul phra rab tsam yang 'byung bar mi srid de /
NK085(ru)002:5426: nam mkha' dngos po mi snang ba bzhin no //
NK085(ru)002:5427: nyams pa ci'i phyir mi 'byung zhe na /
NK085(ru)002:5430: yul drug gi chos nyan thos bzhin du ma bkag ste /
NK085(ru)002:5431: rang la rang rol pas spyod pas /
NK085(ru)002:5433: so so skye bo'i mtha' bsal ba ni /
NK085(ru)002:5434: gzung 'dzin rang rgyud gtan nas ma grub pas so //
NK085(ru)002:5435: khyad par gyi dam tshig bzhin zhabs bsdus pa ni /
NK085(ru)002:5436: lhag pa'i dam tshig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5437: lhag pa ni lus man chod kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5438: de ni dam tshig rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)002:5439: gong gi ma bkag spyod la 'dzin med pa'i /
NK085(ru)002:5440: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la lung man chod rnams
NK085(ru)002:5441: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig so sor
NK085(ru)002:5444: rtsa ba dang yan lag rnams la 'di nas rtsa ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:5445: 'di ni yan lag go zhes pa'i gza' gtad med pa'i phyal ba dang /
NK085(ru)002:5446: bsrung ba'i rnam grangs ci ltar snyad kyang /
NK085(ru)002:5447: mnyam pa chen po 'byed pa med pa'i ngang las /
NK085(ru)002:5449: theg pa mang po'i bsrung bya thams cad mnyam pa'i
NK085(ru)002:5450: ngang chen por ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK085(ru)002:5454: bshad pa'i rang bzhin mdo la sogs pa bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)002:5457: theg pa dgu'i bsrung bya ma lus pa rnams /
NK085(ru)002:5458: dam tshig gi mdor 'dus pa dang /
NK085(ru)002:5460: de la sems nyid du 'dus pa'i phyir /
NK085(ru)002:5461: dam tshig smos pas rtsa ba dang yan lag kun kyi mdo 'di nyid du 'dus pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5462: lam gyi spyi grong gis bsdus pa lta bu'o //
NK085(ru)002:5464: yan lag rnams ni rtsa ba las byung la /
NK085(ru)002:5467: rtsa ba chen po zhes smos pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5470: sgyu 'phrul ces pa la sogs pa ste /
NK085(ru)002:5472: sgyu 'phrul rtsa ba gsang ba'i snying po dang /
NK085(ru)002:5473: dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud dang /
NK085(ru)002:5475: sogs khongs su gong ma gnyis bsdus la /
NK085(ru)002:5476: zab mo'i rgyud rnams la dam tshig shas re shas
NK085(ru)002:5477: re mi ston pa med pas de dag yongs bsdus
NK085(ru)002:5479: rgya che la gting dpag dka' ba'i dpe ste /
NK085(ru)002:5480: bshad rgyud chen po rnams las /
NK085(ru)002:5481: bstan chos kyi ngo bo ni /
NK085(ru)002:5485: 'dis mtshon pa'i dam tshig rnams te /
NK085(ru)002:5486: de'i yon tan gyi rtsal las /
NK085(ru)002:5487: bsgrub byed kyi lam thams cad snang ba'o //
NK085(ru)002:5489: rtog 'dul gnyen po dam tshig grangs //
NK085(ru)002:5492: dam tshig dang 'bras bu rgyu 'bras lta bu ma yin te /
NK085(ru)002:5493: dam tshig mthar phyin pa nyid 'bras bur snang bas /
NK085(ru)002:5494: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che //
NK085(ru)002:5497: grangs bcu gcig gi don la dam tshig mtshon pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5499: gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum dbyer med pa'i dpe ste /
NK085(ru)002:5500: 'khor lo rtsib gcig 'khor na kun 'khor ba ltar /
NK085(ru)002:5501: 'di nyid du gzhi bstan pa'i skabs su yang /
NK085(ru)002:5506: tshul de ltar shes par bya'o //
NK085(ru)002:5507: ngang chu'i tshul gyis zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:5508: dper na mtsho nang du chu dang 'o ma 'dres na /
NK085(ru)002:5509: ngang pa'i rgyal po rab rga'i mchu la skyur rtsi yod pas /
NK085(ru)002:5510: chu dang 'o ma 'byed cing 'o ma sdud pa'i tshul gyis /
NK085(ru)002:5511: rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i rgyud kyi gzhung smos pa rnams la /
NK085(ru)002:5512: 'o ma dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig rnams /
NK085(ru)002:5513: ngang pa'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i slob dpon chen po
NK085(ru)002:5514: sgeg pa'i rdo rje'i blos brgyud nas 'thor ba bsdus
NK085(ru)002:5515: te / gzhung nyid du snang ba 'di la /
NK085(ru)002:5516: phyi rabs la phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas bslangs te /
NK085(ru)002:5517: sgo gsum dub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas kun kyang ste /
NK085(ru)002:5519: sgos btsan du dam tshig la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams 'dam nas zhes pa /
NK085(ru)002:5521: 'gro ba kun byang chub thob par shog /zhes pa'o /
NK085(ru)002:5522: yang na dge ba'i rtsa bas kun kyang zhes pa
NK085(ru)002:5523: gsang sngags su zhugs pa des zhus zhes pa dam
NK085(ru)002:5525: slob dpon nyid kyis bstan chos brtsams pa'i dge ba'i
NK085(ru)002:5526: rtsa ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dam tshig la gnas
NK085(ru)002:5527: nas / de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas 'gro ba kun byang chub thob par shog ces pa /
NK085(ru)002:5528: slob dpon nyid kyi thugs dgongs mthar phyin pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5529: dam tshig rdo rje gsal bkra zhes bya ba /
NK085(ru)002:5531: gsang sngags spyi'i dam tshig /rgyud na 'thor ba 'dir mdor bsdus pa'am /
NK085(ru)002:5533: de las bsdus pa stong rtsa brgyad /
NK085(ru)002:5534: de las bsdus pa sum brgya drug bcu /
NK085(ru)002:5535: de las bsdus pa brgya rtsa brgyad /
NK085(ru)002:5536: de las bsdus pa 'di nyid do //
NK085(ru)002:5537: 'di la'ang brgya drug bcur dbyer btub bo //
NK085(ru)002:5539: slob dpon sgegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)002:5540: zab cing brtag dka' mchog gi skye ba'i yul //
NK085(ru)002:5541: rtog ge'i dri mas ma gos lam mchog nyid //
NK085(ru)002:5542: kun gyi bdag nyid bsrung ba'i ngo bo nyid //
NK085(ru)002:5543: mos pa'i ched du gsal bar byas pa yis //
NK085(ru)002:5544: rnal 'byor mchog rnams dam dang mi 'bral zhing //
NK085(ru)002:5545: mthar thug 'gro ba ma lus sgrol bar shog /gsang sngags spyi yi dam tshig gi bshad pa'ang //
NK085(ru)002:5546: rnal 'byor mig gi sgron ma zhe bya ba'i //
NK085(ru)002:5547: ban d+he rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis //
NK085(ru)002:5548: brjed byang tsam du bris pa'o //
NK085(ru)002:5549: rdzogs so ////bla ma kahthoga pa sh+aakya'i dge slong badz+ra
NK085(ru)002:5550: ke tus mdzad pa 'di nyid legs par yongs su
NK085(ru)002:5552: +ai th+ai ///gang zhig sngon sbyang las can dag /thar pa'i grong mchog snyegs 'dod na //
NK085(ru)002:5553: rig pa rang byung rta pho la //
NK085(ru)002:5554: dbang dang dam tshig sga stan thob //
NK085(ru)002:5555: shes rab gsum gyi 'khor gsum thogs //
NK085(ru)002:5556: bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis go cha gon //
NK085(ru)002:5557: bsod nams bsags pa'i skyes bus zhon //
NK085(ru)002:5558: byams dang snying rje'i kha khrid gtso //
NK085(ru)002:5559: dad dang brtson 'grus lcags kyis brab //
NK085(ru)002:5560: dam pa rin chen lam mkhan bsko //
NK085(ru)002:5561: dran dang shes bzhin so pa mngag /thabs lam zab mo srung ma khrid //
NK085(ru)002:5562: rnam rtog dgra dang gzung 'dzin dmag /re dogs kyi jag pa'ang skyengs nas thal //
NK085(ru)002:5563: lam gol sa med de drang nas gda' //
NK085(ru)002:5564: 'jigs pa med de lam grogs bzang //
NK085(ru)002:5565: khong 'gros chung gi nyin lam dpag med la //
NK085(ru)002:5566: nyin gcig gi 'gros kyis slebs ste mchi //
NK085(ru)002:5567: da res don gnyer yags pa yin //
NK085(ru)002:5568: phyin chad lam la 'grim don med //
